summary: In Pill Puzzle: One Move, you need to place the right pills in the pill box with just one move, so, your production can be delivered to your customers.

name: Pill Puzzle 2
summary: Business is good! In Pill Puzzle 2, you need to fit the right pills into the pack and also organize the bandages to be delivered to your customers.

name: Pirate Story
summary: "Pirate Story" is a hardcore 2D platformer about the misadventures of a brave Pirate. On his way to the treasure, he can't be stopped by dangerous traps, nor cannon balls!

name: Pinball FX3: Carnivals and Legends
summary: Zen Studios presents the Carnivals and Legends two-table pack featuring original designs, "Adventure Land" and "Son of Zeus."

name: Pinball FX3: Balls of Glory Pinball
summary: Your favorite hit TV shows - Family Guy, American Dad!, Bob's Burgers, and Archer - come together in the Balls of Glory pinball pack!

name: Pinball FX3: Marvel Pinball - Avengers Chronicles
summary: Marvel Pinball: Avengers Chronicles takes the critically acclaimed pinball series to uncharted territory. Each of the four tables in this brand new pack chronicles a blockbuster event in the Marvel Universe: Marvel's The Avengers (based on the 2012 film from Marvel Studios), Fear Itself, The Infinity Gauntlet and World War Hulk.

name: Pinball FX3: Marvel Pinball Vengeance and Virtue Pack
summary: Marvel Pinball returns with Vengeance and Virtue, a package of four brand new beautifully crafted pinball tables featuring Ghost Rider, Moon Knight, Thor and X-Men.

name: Pinball FX3: Williams Pinball - Volume 2
summary: This stunning collection of three authentic Bally tables includes BLACK ROSE, ATTACK FROM MARS, and THE PARTY ZONE. All are available in a classic and a remastered form with a host of new features.

name: Pinball FX3: The Walking Dead Pinball
summary: Zen Studios, Telltale Games, and Skybound Entertainment partner to create an all-new table based on The Walking Dead, the 'Game of the Year' winning series.

name: Pinball FX3: Bethesda Pinball
summary: Bethesda Pinball combines three stunning tables based on the iconic Fallout, DOOM, and The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim franchises.

name: Pinball FX3: Marvel Pinball Original Pack
summary: This four table pack features some of the most iconic Super Heroes in the Marvel Universe: Spider-Man, Wolverine, Blade and Iron Man. Use your pinball wizardry to save the universe from notorious Super Villains! Marvel Pinball is the ultimate Super Hero pinball experience!

name: Pinball FX3: Williams Pinball - Volume 5
summary: A stunning collection of three authentic Williams and Bally tables! TALES OF THE ARABIAN NIGHTS, CIRQUS VOLTAIRE, and NO GOOD GOFERS are all available both in classic form and remastered with a host of new features.

name: Pinball FX3: Core Collection
summary: Core Collection, a package of four beautifully crafted pinball tables featuring Secrets of the Deep, Biolab, Rome and Pasha.

name: Pinball FX3: Marvel's Women of Power
summary: Team up with the stellar female Super Heroes of the Marvel Universe in the Marvel's Women of Power two-pack, which combines two tables featuring Ms. Marvel, Spider-Gwen, Squirrel Girl, Black Widow, Captain Marvel and more as they combat villainy!

name: Pinball FX3: Williams Pinball - Volume 1
summary: Pinball FX3 - Williams Pinball: Volume 1 is a dazzling collection of three authentic Williams tables. The Getaway: High Speed II, Junk Yard and Medieval Madness are available in a classic and a re-mastered form with a host of new features.

name: Pinball FX3: Medieval Pack
summary: Knights are the order of the day in the original and exciting Medieval Pack from Zen Studios!

name: Pinball FX3: Marvel Pinball - Marvel Legends Pack
summary: Team up with iconic Super Heroes as they battle toe-to-toe with notorious villains in the Marvel Pinball: Marvel Legends Pack featuring "Captain America", "Doctor Strange" and "Fantastic Four".

name: Pinball FX3: Aliens vs Pinball
summary: Aliens vs. Pinball combines three thrilling pinball tables into one terrifying pack inspired by the ALIEN franchise!

name: Pinball FX3: Iron & Steel Pack
summary: Experience the thrilling blend of Medieval times and the Old West with CastleStorm and Wild West Rampage in Iron & Steel Pack!

name: Pinball FX3: Jurassic World Pinball
summary: With one pinball table based on Jurassic World and two more inspired by Jurassic Park, you know what that means - LIFE FOUND A WAY!

name: Pinball FX3: Williams Pinball - Volume 4
summary: This stunning collection of three authentic Williams tables includes WHITE WATER, RED AND TED'S ROAD SHOW, and HURRICANE. All are available in a classic and a remastered form with a host of new features.

name: Pinball FX3: Star Wars Pinball - The Force Awakens Pack
summary: Star Wars Pinball: The Force Awakens Pack features two exciting new tables based on the hotly anticipated film, Star Wars: The Force Awakens!

name: Pinball FX3: Williams Pinball - Volume 3
summary: This stunning collection of three authentic Bally tables includes THEATRE OF MAGIC, SAFE CRACKER, and THE CHAMPION PUB. All are available in a classic and a remastered form with a host of new features.

name: Pinball FX3: Williams Pinball - Volume 6
summary: Three classic tables! FUNHOUSE (starring Rudy, the iconic dummy antagonist), SPACE STATION, and DR. DUDE AND HIS EXCELLENT RAY.

name: Pinball FX3: Williams Pinball - Universal Monsters Pack
summary: Two scarily authentic tables based on the Universal Monsters—MONSTER BASH and CREATURE FROM THE BLACK LAGOON! Play in their perfectly simulated original form or as remastered tables with updated graphics, animated toys, and a host of new features.

name: Pinball FX3: Universal Classics Pinball
summary: Universal Classics Pinball combines three captivating tables based on the blockbuster films Jaws, the Back to the Future trilogy, and E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial.

name: Pinball FX3: Marvel Pinball - Heavy Hitters
summary: Do you have what it takes to handle your favorite Marvel Super Heroes? Prepare for exciting pinball action built around Marvel's most explosive personalities in the Marvel Pinball: Heavy Hitters Pack!

name: Pinball FX3: Portal Pinball
summary: Aperature Laboratories presents the Heuristic Portal Pinball Device proving that science is not merely beneficial but also quite fun.

name: Pinball FX3: Sci-Fi Pack
summary: Space travel, supernatural events and gigantic alien machines await in the original and imaginative Sci-Fi Pack, featuring "Mars", "Paranormal" and "Earth Defense."

name: Pinball FX3: Star Wars Pinball - The Last Jedi
summary: It's time to play Star Wars Pinball: The Last Jedi! Revisit Luke Skywalker and Rey on Ahch-To Island, and help the Resistance survive the First Order. Relive movie scenes as unique pinball action on these two beautifully crafted pinball tables!

name: Pinball FX2 VR: The Walking Dead
summary: Zen Studios, Telltale Games, and Skybound Entertainment partner to create all-new table based on The Walking Dead, the 'Game of the Year' winning series. The table has been recreated with the spectacular effects you can only experience in virtual reality!

name: Pinball FX2 VR: Universal Classics Pinball
summary: Universal Classics Pinball features 3 tables based on the Jaws, Back to the Future trilogy, and E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial films.

name: Pinball FX2 VR: Season 1 Pack
summary: The Pinball FX2 VR Season One Pack adds five stunning tables to Pinball FX2 VR: CastleStorm, Wild West Rampage, BioLab, Paranormal and Earth Defense. Each table has been recreated with the spectacular effects you can only experience in virtual reality!

name: Pictura
summary: Pictura is an atmospheric photography game where you explore new worlds, while working on your photo skills. Find the best shots and become a world famous photographer.

name: Pistol shooting: Realistic gun simulator
summary: The game is a simulator of shooting a pistols Beretta M9, Luger P08, Colt 1911, Makarov

name: Piggy Disco
summary: Pixel rhythm game.Fun mode:Enjoy the music and try to get a good score!Challenge mode:We won't take any mistake! Keep awake and try to stay alive till the last second!

name: Pillars of Protection
summary: Pillars of Protection is a team-based tower defense game. Towers can take on complex movement paths. You can play online multiplayer in PvP or PvE modes. Build a base to protect your core from the onslaught of incoming monsters. Play as a shooter, melee, mover, or healing hero.

name: Pizza Break Head to Head
summary: Pizza Break Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated pizzas tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Pizza Break
summary: Pizza Break is an arcade game that lets the user knock out Pizza themed items with a unique Pizza Box paddle and pizza slice ball. Unique Animated levels, Mini-Bosses and Powerups to collect as you progress through the levels. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Pixasso
summary: Pixasso is a relaxing game for lovers of the coloring of tiny pixel art. Color more than 50 pictures and have fun!

name: Pig Skater Simulator
summary: You are a pig, and not a meat! Jump on a skateboard and do the trick! Create some chaos and gather pearls, this game will let you immerse with no rest.

name: Pizza Shop Manager
summary: Pizza Shop Manager is a unique combination of strategy and simulation game with some economic elements. Do your best to fulfil pizza orders from customers while making enough money to keep your shop open in this fun cooking game. You take the role of Pizzeria Manager. Manage every aspect of your pizzeria and make it become the best eatery in town!!

name: Pippu: Bauble Quest
summary: Pippu is a heroic little creature from the world of the Beandrops. One day her planet is visited by hostile aliens called the Obkins, who travel from place to place stealing precious treasures to power their dangerous and wacky machinery. Run, climb and swim your way through 14 worlds to bash the baddies and save your planet. Features: Colorful, vibrant worlds with lots of nooks and crannies to explore. A kooky cast of weird and wonderful characters to meet. Collect all 56 Baubles to restore your world to its full glory. Fun for all the family, young and old, beginner or seasoned gamer.

name: Pixasso 2
summary: "PIXASSO 2" - is a new game of relaxing franchise for lovers of the coloring pixel art. More colors! More pictures! More fun!

name: Pirates of the Sea
summary: Lost on an island in the middle of the ocean, after a shipwreck you'll have to find a way to get off the island. It sounds easy but it's not... you'll have to survive!

name: Pinball Arcade: Season Four Pack
summary: The Season Four Table Pack includes all TEN of the tables in Season Four. Season Four includes The Addams Family, Starship troopers, Phantom of the Opera, Party Zone, Earthshaker, Cyclone, Jack*Bot, Xenon, Red and Ted's Roadshow, and Safe Cracker.

name: Pinball Arcade: Season Seven Table Pack
summary: A previously available bundle of Pinball Arcade tables, most of which have since been delisted.

name: Pinball Arcade: Season Five Pro Pack
summary: The Season Five Pro Pack includes all of tables and extra content released from Table Pack 41 through Table Pack 50 for a greatly discounted price! This includes the pinball tables: The Getaway: High Speed II, F-14 Tomcat, Mary Shelley's Frankenstein, No Fear: Dangerous Sports, Judge Dredd, Fireball, El Dorado, Hurricane, Rescue 911, Last Action Hero, TX-Sector.

name: Pinball Arcade: Season Four Pro Pack
summary: The Season Four Pro Pack includes all ten of the tables in Season Four as they are released plus the Pro version of each table.

name: Pinball Arcade: Season Seven Pro Pack
summary: Get all ten Season Seven Pro pinball tables.

name: Pinball Arcade: Season Six Pro Pack
summary:
Get all Twelve Season Six Pro pinball tables! The Pro Version of a tables gives you access to the table Operator’s Menu (allowing you to change many factory default settings), the ability to move the ball around the table at will, a mode that lets you move the camera around the table, and tips on playing the table from IFPA pinball pros.

Tables Included: Indianapolis 500, Big Hurt, Eight Ball Deluxe, Doctor Who, Doctor Who: Master of Time, Bone Busters, Jacks Open, Centigrade 37, Gladiators, Al's Garage Band Goes on a World Tour, Cactus Jacks, and Swords of Fury.

name: Pinball Arcade: Season Three Pro Pack
summary: The Season Three Pro Pack includes all ten of the tables in Season Three plus the Pro version of each table! Season Three includes six great Williams' tables; Fish Tales, Black Knight 2000, High Speed, Diner, Junk Yard, and Dracula.

name: Pinball Arcade: Season Two Pro Pack
summary:
The Season Two Pro Pack includes all of tables and extra content released from Table Pack 11 through Table Pack 20 for a greatly discounted price! This includes the pinball tables Dr. Dude And His Excellent Ray, Firepower, Cactus Canyon, Central Park, White Water, Space Shuttle, Centaur, Pin•Bot, The Champion Pub, Whirlwind, Goin' Nuts, Flight 2000, Terminator 2: Judgment Day, Tee’d Off, Haunted House, Victory, Class of 1812, El Dorado City of Gold, and Cue Ball Wizard along with access to the Pro Menu of
Dr. Dude And His Excellent Ray, Cactus Canyon, White Water, Pin•Bot, The Champion Pub, Whirlwind, Flight 2000, Goin Nuts, Terminator 2: Judgment Day, Teed Off, Class of 1812, and Cue Ball Wizard!

This pack also unlocks the Terminator 2 and Season Two custom balls.

name: Pixasso 3
summary: "PIXASSO 3" - is a final chapter of relaxing franchise for lovers of the coloring pixel art. New game mode! New colors! New pictures! Have fun!

name: Pixels: Digital Creatures
summary: Pixels combines thrilling turn-based creature battles with the replayability of a roguelike. Pick your starter and journey through the Virtual World. Defy the odds by building a team of powerful Pixels to fight through the arenas! Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate Pixel Coach?

name: Pizza Party
summary: Pizza Party - is a game with interesting pizza making mechanics. Have time to prepare pizza on time so that the client does not get angry. Don't make people wait, they don't like it. The quicker you make the pizza, the happier they will be, and you might get the teapots.

name: Pipe It Puzzle Challenge
summary:
Pipe It is a new puzzle game designed by Tetris author Alexey Pajitnov. It is a modern take on classic game mechanics.
Put all puzzle pieces from lower shelf onto the playing field. Build the branches by connecting all the pipes of the same color.

name: Pinku Kult: Hex Mortis
summary: Welcome to RAZORE CITY – a desolate, grim metropolis with one big problem: DEMONS. Control your own Razore City denizen as you investigate bizarre happenings around the city and track down the mastermind behind it all in this narrative-based RPG!

name: Pincushion
summary: In this little game you have to throw needles into the needle bed

name: Pixie Farm VR
summary: Pixie Farm VR is a pixie raising simulation VR game where you raise only pixies in a world that seems to have dragons and phoenixes!

name: Pirate Galaxy
summary: Pirate Galaxy is a 3D, sci-fi brower-based MMO from Splitscreen Studios and Gamigo with real-time action. The game's story concerns the invading alien Mantis and the fight to stop them.

name: Pizza Apocalypse
summary: Pizza Apocalypse is a pint-sized, turn-based tactics game where you attempt to deliver pizzas, meet quirky characters, and hopefully don’t get disembowelled by cosmic horrors along the way! With a heavy focus on unique abilities and customisation.

name: Pinball-e
summary:
Pinball-e is the e-Reader port of the NES game Pinball.

It was distributed as a set of five e-Cards which had to be scanned with the peripheral in order to play the game on the Game Boy Advance.

It is part of a series of ports of NES games for the e-Reader.

name: Piggy: Hunt
summary: Piggy: Hunt is a fast-paced survival horror multiplayer game. Survivors must work together to survive and escape from the Infected.

name: Pizza Nostra
summary: Chicago 1930, Joe Matone a petty thief, is caught by the police in a confusing episode. A desperate police officer with a serious problem offers him freedom if Matone fulfils the tough mission to infiltrate the dangerous Muzzarelli Family, in order to save his kidnapped daughter. Therefore, Joe will get involved in a great adventure, with many plot twists, difficult decisions, lies, betrayals and violence. Featuring: Over 100 rooms Tons of characters Minigames Music from the 30â€™s Steal! Kill! Blackmail! Earn your freedom!

name: Pizza Empire!
summary: Pizza Empire! is a time management cooking game. Help Giuseppi traveling around the world and beyond, preparing pizzas and delicious dishes. Upgrade your restaurants with new toppings and equipment. Meet interesting people, discover their story, and help them with the power of your food.

name: Pirate Island
summary: Pirat Island is a 3D side-scrolling shooter with platformer elements in which you have to start hunting the evil pirates and soulless skeletons that have come to life due to the magic of Voodoo!

name: Pipe Fitter
summary: Pipe fitter is the best brain-teaser for every pipeline puzzle lover. If you are a big fan of pipe connection puzzle, do not miss this great pipeline puzzle game! Everyone can enjoy the fun of plumbing and connecting the right pipes in the right orientation! An amusing, inspiring pipe puzzle experience . All pipe plumbing fans, get ready for your exciting pipe plumbing puzzle journey in over 250 levels! Features : - 250 Levels - Different difficulties - Hint function

name: Piratopia
summary: Set sail in the open seas! Plunder in PvE and PvP, trade goods for ship upgrades or equipments to hunt the Kraken, all in the same Server. Dominate by yourself or with maties.

name: Pipeline VR
summary: Pipeline VR is a hectic virtual reality puzzle game, that pits you against a rising tide of torrential water. With the residents of Pipesville in desperate need for plumbers, can YOU solve their plumbing emergencies?

name: Pieces of Beauty
summary: Deemed a Master of the Chinese Bird and Flower Painting Style, Ohara Koson produced hundreds of prints during his life. Discover 7 majestic pieces made by one of Japan's most celebrated artists in this traditional Jigsaw Puzzle Game.

name: Pirate Code: Rise of the Kraken
summary: Add the infamous kraken to your fleet and watch as your enemies are crushed! Discover the dark secret about the return of these monsters of the sea.

name: Piano Journey
summary:
Piano Journey is a music rhythm game
Although only two keys, it is enough to make your fingers busy
51 classic piano music
Take the wind of music, begin piano journey

name: Pixel Madness
summary: Pixel Madness is a fast-paced game where you dodge the falling pixels to the beat of the music!

name: Pictos
summary:
"PiCTOS" is a fun puzzle game, even for people who are not good at solving puzzles!
Be ready to get into the game for hours!

name: Pixel Force 2
summary: Action shooting game for Android, successor to original Pixel Force.

name: Pinball HD
summary: Pinball HD is a pinball simulator with stunning 3D graphics, with three tables: Wild West, The Deep, and Jungle Style.

name: Pizza the Pie
summary:
Welcome to Pizza The Pie, a fresh and innovative take on classic puzzle video games. Use the falling toppings to create pizza slices that match your customers' orders. Travel the world and make various regional pizzas curated by world-renowned chef J. Kenji López-Alt.

The concept seems simple but you'll need to act quickly if you want to become the most successful pizza maker in the world.
Pizza The Pie offers over 50 unique levels in story mode, as well as endless and time trial modes. This is a complete game, no in-app purchases are needed to fully enjoy the game.

name: PicPu
summary:
PicPu is a very attractive photo puzzle. Just like Jigsaw puzzle, it is the best kill time game.
PicPu is a block puzzle, you need assemble the block to correct position.
This game will step by step to increase difficulty. It is a challenge!
We are planning to release different series of PicPu. This game is Cat series.
And we hope you can enjoy it.

name: Piano Monsters
summary:
Piano Monsters is a fun game and excellent musical exercise for ear improving. This is an unusual game with unique mechanics where you use your voice pitch to control monsters. They hear you and respond to your singing, humming or whistling.
Monsters adore to eat candy-notes. Help these cute creatures catch the notes.

name: Piyo Blocks 2
summary: Match same coloured blocks to make them disappear, and capture the target number of blocks before the time runs out to level up. Make use of combos and power-ups to help match more and more glorious Piyo Blocks.

name: Piczle Lines Jr. Green
summary: Piczle Lines Jr. is a child-safe incarnation of the popular and classic Piczle Lines logic-puzzle game. 100 colourful logic-puzzles for everybody age 5 to 555!

name: Pictominoes
summary:
Relax and challenge yourself all at once with this picturesque puzzle game!
Pictominoes is a unique blend of the jigsaw and pentomino puzzle games, putting beautiful visuals onto geometric tiles that you need to place, rotate and flip to complete the image.

name: Pickomino
summary: An appetizingly addictive dice game for up to 4 gambling gobblers. Barbecued worms are in high demand, and only the coolest-headed chicken can win the tasty snack! But beware: Anyone who doesn't manage to grab a worm off the grill can help himself to those on his opponents' plates! In Reiner Knizia’s popular dice game, 16 barbecue worm portions with different values are waiting on the grill to be snatched up by the dice-throwing chickens. The rules are simple, but don’t push your luck too far: To get your claws into one of the delicious worms, you roll all 8 dice at the same time. You then pick a value from your throw and remove all the dice showing the same value, before throwing the remaining dice again. If your score corresponds to an available barbecue worm portion on the grill you can take this portion - or maybe even grab a portion from the plate of your fellow players! You’ll need both the luck of the dice and the right strategy: Stick with your score, or roll the dice just one more time to get a better portion. The player with the most worms in his claws at the end of the game wins!

name: Piczle Lines Jr. Red
summary: Piczle Lines Jr. is a child-safe incarnation of the popular and classic Piczle Lines logic-puzzle game. 100 colourful logic-puzzles for everybody age 5 to 555!

name: Pink Glow Fall Down
summary: Tap right to move right, Tap Left to move Left as you maneuver the pink glow ball down the platforms. Collect 50 diamonds and buy yourself some time, so that you don't smash into the spikes.

name: Pink Birdie
summary: Climb the pink bird back and forth up to the top, avoid the spikes and save the bluebird!

name: Pivotal
summary: A puzzle game about transformation through rotation.

name: Piradice
summary: Turn based strategy game about pixel pirates

name: Pirates Crew
summary: This is a great multiplayer pirate's game where team play is crucial. Every player can set his own crew, sail in coop!

name: PiratesBattle
summary: Pirate Ships Battle-royale game!

name: Pirate's Pension
summary: Where did I bury my treasure again?

name: Pirate Radio
summary: On the high seas, broadcast your illegal radio tunes to the masses, while avoiding the marine police. Juggle between choosing your radio playlist and steering your vessel in an effort to keep your listeners happy.

name: Pinky Promise Manifesto
summary: a little ode to the ~~pinky promise~~

name: Pikuniku Online
summary: Eat'em all, collect'em all, get eaten a lot and enjoy your picnic :)

name: Pillow of Stone
summary: An experiential music medley about a man who escapes prison to give his daughter a teddy bear.

name: Pinball Graffiti
summary: The first true 32 bit pinball tables. View your extreme skills from any angle and any perspective with 3D panning camera angles and sweeping crane shots, and even an inside the ball perspective. Sampled sound effects and video clips make these super fast tables the only ones worth playing.

name: Pirate Adventure
summary: A short resource manager game

name: Pirate Defender
summary: 3D LowPoly Game, Dont Let Those Pirates Get All Your Chests!!

name: Pixelpusher
summary: Delightfully simple online multiplayer action

name: Piggly
summary: Have you ever seen a pig climb up a tree? Juggle apples? Perform a somersault?

name: Pikwip
summary: Head to the summit. Local co-op or single player.

name: Pinballvania!
summary: Rotate the stage and collect all the green pickups to open up the exit. Features 20 stages and 4 bosses and includes a new game plus with reshuffled procedurally generated levels.

name: Pigsaw
summary: Escape the nightmarish human abattoir in this blood-soaked Horror FPS.

name: Pixel Islands
summary: Can you explore them all ? Let's find the best ones !

name: Pitch Black Serenade
summary: - A non conventional romance game. -

name: Pixel Artist Simulator
summary: Have you every wondered what's it like being a pixel artist?

name: Pico Driller
summary: Drill as deep as you can, but don't get crushed!

name: Pikmin Bloom
summary: Grow your Pikmin, make flowers bloom, and keep track of your precious memories, all through the simple act of walking. Whether you’re going for a short walk around the corner or commuting to work, today’s the very first day of the rest of your Pikmin adventures! Gather your squad and embark on a journey of rediscovery where every step counts.

name: Pipo's on the Run
summary: Pipo's on the Run is about a cat endlessly running through roofs. Jump on chimneys and avoid weather vanes in this cute pixel art game!

name: Pilgrimage
summary: Discover and explore the deeper meanings of La Dispute's 2019 "Panorama" album by exploring abstract landscapes and finding accompanying lyrics.

name: Picolarium
summary: Flip tiles with a single stroke. Polarium for PICO-8

name: PicoPlex
summary: Quarantine night fever.

name: Pit of Babel
summary: Spiral to Me, Spiral Together

name: Pixel Heroes: Mega Byte & Magic
summary:
Enter the world of PIXEL HEROES and prepare yourself for a thrilling RPG/Roguelike experience like you have never seen before!

In the new Arena mode, exclusive to Switch, players can freely choose a party from the entire hero pool and take them into a series of infinite battles that get harder as you progress. Special bonus effects can be selected to modify the next battle, making it easier, or more rewarding.

name: Pioneer Space Sim
summary: A game of lonely space adventure. http://pioneerspacesim.net/

name: Pixel Mage Quest
summary:
Pixel Mage Quest is a retro RPG game mixed with modern sandbox gameplay experience.

You can play this game as your own! Fighting monsters, questing, gathering resources, crafting items and much more!

name: Ping Bomb
summary: Multiplayer Ping Pong with a Bomb

name: Pirated Code
summary: Tsundere Amnesiac AI x Pathetic Space Pirate

name: Pico Checkmate
summary: A simple, cute retro version of classic Chess made in Pico-8. Full implementation of the Chess rules with a juicy interface and some basic AI to play against.

name: Pigeon Ascent
summary: Take care of your own pigeon as they fight increasingly stronger foes

name: Pichon: The Bouncy Bird
summary: Puzzle platformer where you play as a chubby bird that's constantly bouncing. Fast reflexes and good timing will allow you to sort obstacles, activate secret passages and collect the necessary gems to be able to reach the end of each level.

name: Pixel Card Crawl
summary: Dungeon Pixel Card Crawler. Enter the card dungeon and climb down to find epic treasure and fight evil monsters! Choose between two heroes and level up your character!

name: Pirates
summary: 2D Pirates Game

name: Pillz
summary: Aid PowerBob in a quest to beat his headache

name: Pigeon Game
summary: Fulfil your lifelong dream of holding pigeons

name: Pico Tennis
summary: A simple tennis game for PICO-8. Play against AI or with up to 4 players in local multiplayer.

name: Ping Pong Palz
summary: Life isn't always easy, but they meet every day to train for nationals anyway.

name: Pitch Shift
summary: Beginning again and again can be a whole new journey with just the right shift.

name: Pizza Pony
summary: Deliver pizzas, like only a horse can.

name: Pixel Pets
summary: Raise your pet, maybe you can be the best there ever was

name: Picamor
summary: A Date Hell type game

name: Pico Sonic
summary: 1-stage demake of Sonic 3 made with PICO-8

name: Pieces of Cake
summary: Make combos, bake cakes!

name: Picomin
summary: Totally original RTS about bossing around plant people

name: Pioneers
summary: A turn-based exploration RPG where you lead a party of travellers as they go beyond the horizon.

name: Pico Room4Joy
summary: Provide the service of decorating and cleaning spaces so they spark joy!

name: Pillar of Rust
summary: Enter the Pillar of Rust, a third-person “walking simulator” pain, sorrow, anger, and peace manifested in concrete, rust, and bittersweet memories.

name: Pico Monsters
summary: In this game there are markers called 'picostops' scattered throughout the map which drop random items whenever you have defeated a few wild monsters. 'Picostops' also replenish and revive all the monsters in your party. Catch new monsters with picoballs.

name: Pirates & Pearls: Match, build & design
summary: Set sail as a puzzle-solving pirate for loot and plunder! Match 3 gems and use boosters to solve puzzles, build your ships & crew and construct mines to gain more gold!

name: Pixurvival
summary: A pixelized mega sandbox. Play or create cooperative survival, team battle, and more !

name: Pirates of Gravitae
summary:
Pirates of Gravitae is an action roguelike game with fast-paced aerial dogfights, set in a fictional version of the Golden Age of Piracy.

The player commands a rocket propelled pirate ship that they can equip with various weapons and abilities, as they fight against a variety of enemies. They can choose from a selection of different bonuses at the end of every battle, to customize their ship as they go. These bonuses expire at the end of a run. They can also unlock new abilities or upgrade crew members, for perks that persist between runs.

name: Pirates Ahoy!
summary: Pirates Ahoy! was a social facebook game that let you build your island, recruit your friends as crew members and sail for adventures.

name: Pixel Storm
summary: A casual arcade game with different modes and classes (classes still in development).

name: Pink Marmalade 2
summary: Candy gore twin stick shooter.

name: Piratiska Riba VR
summary: Explore the beautiful Islands and solve various fun puzzles in a great VR pirate expirience.

name: Pico Pico MicroMix
summary: A rhythm-based game in the style of Dance Dance Revolution for PICO-8.

name: Piece by Piece
summary: "Piece by piece, we'll find it again..."

name: Pixel Dash
summary: A pixel platformer with many elements and levels.

name: Pity Party
summary: A short weird, creepy, game.

name: PixelTown
summary: a creepy-cute aesthetic experience

name: Pixel Forklift Simulator
summary: Who can refuse the temptation of driving a forklift?

name: Pix Hop
summary: Hop, Bounce, Fall and Hop again !

name: Pit Rush
summary: action couch co-op game

name: PicoQuest: Darkness Rising
summary: Fight against evil forces with sword and magic!

name: Pixel Town
summary: City builder meets tower defence - originally built for Ludum Dare 38 (Small World)

name: Pikelets
summary: an entry for the one room #bitsyjam

name: Pico Pirates
summary: Massive open world pirate adventures!

name: Pixels at Solstice
summary: a short, playable christmas card for the longest nights of the year

name: Pictures of a reasonably documented year
summary: You found a computer. What happened to the owner?

name: PixelOrb
summary: A free and open source puzzle game made with godot engine

name: Pink Marmalade
summary: Twin stick high score chaser. With little neon horses.

name: Picowars
summary: A retro fan-game and unofficial prequel to Nintendo's Advance Wars series made in the PICO-8 fantasy console.

name: Piteur's Odyssey
summary: Dual twin stick shooter pixel art ... :)

name: Pinball Gardener
summary: A pinball farming simulator!

name: Pig Escape
summary: Collect fruits to feed your pig

name: Pipe Skull
summary: lead the skull through the pipelines!

name: Pink Rose
summary: A bittersweet story about first love.

name: Pineapple Pipeline: Infinite Skater Dreams
summary: Skateboard to infinity and beyond

name: PinkMan Adventure
summary: Arcade Platform. Run, jump, dodge!

name: Pirates Overboard
summary: Sacrifice parts of your ship to escape from the shark !

name: Pixel Driver
summary: Pixel Driver is a casual infinite driving game where you race in heavy traffic at high speeds. Crashing into cars is AWESOME since they actually break up into parts which let's you cause proper havoc!

name: Picross S7
summary: The seventh entry in the Picross S series adds more puzzles in the same familiar model, with the addition of touchscreen controls.

name: Pinball FX
summary: Discover brand new exclusive tables created for Pinball FX, or find your favorites among more than 40 unique and visually enhanced favorites from Zen's extensive digital pinball library. Relive the most iconic moments from entertainment powerhouses like Indiana Jones, Star Wars, Marvel, Universal Studios, and many more. Enjoy accurate re-creations of the most famous pinball machines of all time with Williams Pinball, or have fun with Zen’s original creations.

name: Pixel Wheels
summary: Top-down retro racing game. Race for the first place on various tracks. Pick up bonuses to boost your position or slow down competitors!

name: Pixels Out of Space
summary: You are part of a scientific group that is in charge of studying a farm where strange events have happened since months ago. Day by day, the atmosphere becomes more and more strange, and you start losing the sense of time. Suddenly, you woke up in an empty room... But you feel that something that is not from this world is watching you.

name: Pink Elephant
summary: Pink Elephant is a 2D shooter with a top view whose task is to clear all the rooms from enemies and move to a new room, which in turn will bring you closer to the final of the game.

name: Pixel Robot Return
summary: Pixel robot is coming back. Destroy enormous robot boss and collect treasures

name: Pilapa Boom
summary: Pilapa Boom is an extremely lightweight mini game. Players can shoot bullets to detonate the bombs and trigger a chain of explosions to open the path to the end. There is almost no learning cost, and you can play it right away.

name: Pila
summary: Are you hungry for a challenge? Well I've spent quite a bit of time cooking one up for you. My game Pila is a minimalistic puzzler that incorporates physics and timing to put your logic to the test. Your only objective is to guide the ball to the portal, using the various items in each level. As you progress through the 50 levels, there will be new items to learn how to use. There are no instructions meaning it is up to you to learn how to play the game, but don't worry, you'll figure it out. I made most of the sounds ambient in efforts to reduce your frustration on the harder levels. I hope you enjoy and good luck!

name: Picture Puzzle
summary: Picture Puzzle is a puzzle game for the MSX released in 1983. The goal is to reconstruct an image that is cut into 16 different pieces one of which is not present. You can reconstruct 5 different images of which are a crocodile, cat, pig, horse, and elephant.

name: PinballAdventure
summary: This is a leisure and happy adventure game. You need to control the pinball through your own micro operation to complete the adventure of the level in the fastest and most perfect time. When you fail or succeed, we will have a description prompt. Please don't mind. That's our encouragement to you!

name: Pinni and the Lost Voice
summary: Pinni and the Lost Voice is a classic adventure platformer with a cute hand-drawn art style. Play as Pinni, a brave little doggy in a mysterious dreamland where the sun and the moon have stopped moving!

name: Pinball Jam
summary: Enjoy 12 games in one with the perfect reproduction of real pinball machines, with all kinds of graphic details and sounds. Discover all the secrets, in these thrilling games, a great challenge awaits you. Complete all the missions and become number 1 in the world or the best among your Friends, posting your high score on the online leaderboard.

name: Pirate Treasure: Island of Mazes
summary: The game has motion control, so you have to use your console's gyroscope in order to try and solve the puzzles. There are a plethora of puzzles to choose from, so you will end up having a whole bunch of fun all the time. Since there are dozens of levels to choose from, you always get to enjoy a unique and immersive game experience. Plus, you can test your puzzle solving skills and improve them as you go along. Check it out for yourself today! Features: - Motion controlled puzzles - Dozens of levels to play through - Beautiful pirate theme - Engaging, fun gameplay - Lots of replay value

name: Pirates on Target
summary: Move the blocks strategically, your objective is to change the trajectory of the cannonballs until they reach the pirate ship. Simple yet challenging.

name: Pillars of Sorrow
summary: Pillars of Sorrow is a top down twinstick shooter, where you fight your inner demons while trying to regain your former self. After something vile happened you will be fighting tormenting thoughts, emptyness and Apathy as a lost soul. Will you be able to free your mind again?

name: Pirates of the Maverta
summary: Maverta Island - minimalist, relaxing, motion logic, mind game. The player's goal is to survive the labyrinth and find treasure.

name: Pipe
summary: Pipe is a physics based BMX experience built for the BMX community designed to simulate realistic BMX motion. Perform over 50 aerial stunts, grind any corner, send big airs in the Pipe! Pipe also includes some fun Easter Eggs for those willing to explore and think outside the box.

name: Pixoban
summary: The game features 256 levels of enchanting pixel art and mind bending puzzles, as well as an easy going sound-track and fun sounds. Oh, and do well and the aliens will reward Pixo with a new hat from their collections! Complete all 256 levels and they'll give you the famed "Pixoban Crown"...

name: Pirate's Gold
summary: Play Pirate's Gold today and get ready for one of the greatest pirate puzzle adventures of all time. Experience an exciting journey through the Caribbean and plunder 100 treasure caves. Each cave is a puzzle that demands everything from your logical thinking skills. Move the precious items around to make pairs. Find the right strategy to avoid obstacles or use one of the many magic items. Use the bomb to blow up unpleasant objects or use the sword to remove obstacles that get in your way. Analyze the tricky arrow mazes to find all the pieces of the cursed amulet and become the most feared pirate of the Caribbean. Are you clever enough to find all the treasures?

name: Pierhead Arcade 2
summary:
Pierhead Arcade 2 is the sequel to the popular indie Virtual Reality arcade simulator.
Relive your childhood spent at the arcade on the pier but this time with unlimited tokens!
Pierhead Arcade is back with all new VR physics based arcade games to play!

name: Pirate Raid: Caribbean Battle
summary: Ahoy me hearties! Ready to hoist the mainsail, batten down the hatches and blaze your way across the Caribbean in search of plunder, glory, and hours of pirate fun? Down your grog and grab your cutlass, it’s all hands on deck in this fast-paced pirate simulator that will really float your boat. Race full-sail across the high seas to do battle with simple merchantmen, naval battleships, and fearsome sea monsters, all while filling your coffers with booty to spend on expanding your tropical island hideaway and upgrading your mighty pirateship in preparation for ever fiercer battles and more dastardly buccaneering further into the game!

name: Ping Pong Pufferfish
summary: Aim precisely to get into the glass jar. Ping Pong Puffership is a challenging puzzle game in which you toss a ball until it hits the jar. The fewer balls you use, the more points you get!

name: Pizza Man
summary: Race against time to deliver your pizzas.

name: Pity Please!
summary: Pity Please! is a homeless mastery game about survival, strategy, exploration, and capitalizing on societal systems while adapting to the vagrant lifestyle! A grid-based, casual survival strategy game with a cartoony 2.5D isometric aesthetic.

name: Pico Islands
summary: Lead your settlers to build cities in a medieval island world.

name: Piano Rocker
summary: Piano Rocker is a rhythm game designed with MIDI Controllers and e-pianos in mind. Jam along your favourite songs or test your keyboard skills in a variety of mini-games built around keyboard fundamentals.

name: Pieces of Beauty 2
summary: Deemed a Master of the Chinese Bird and Flower Painting Style, Ohara Koson produced hundreds of prints during his life. Discover 16 majestic pieces made by one of Japan's most celebrated artists while you sharpen your brain and relieve stress playing this Jigsaw Puzzle Game.

name: Pixel Skater
summary: Pixel Skater is a fast-paced arcade skateboarding game with precise controls, a deep combo system, and an extraordinarily detailed level editor. Play, build, and compete online with your friends. Not a social butterfly? Enjoy an immersive story mode, challenges, and even puzzles!

name: Pin Them
summary: Use your bow to pin enemies to wooden surfaces. Hit them with long range shots. Use skills and traps to fortify your defenses. Prevent the otherworldly creatures from reaching the blue portal and climb the leaderboards!

name: Pinecone Game
summary: Welcome to Pinecone Game, where you can plunge into the wonderful world of throwing pinecones into a well!

name: Pilie Pals
summary: Lead a group of adorable creatures known as Pilies and help them climb and stack their way to the goal in this unique and family-friendly puzzle game!

name: Pintman: Escape the Lockdown
summary: 2D platformer set in Ireland

name: Pie O'Clock!
summary: Welcome to Pie O'clock! In our cafe, you will find the best coffee, the tastiest pies and... The sweetest girls! A non-linear visual novel. Warning, content may be disturbing

name: Pivot of Hearts
summary: Game developer Wén Xiàn has a second chance at love, but it’s not what he expects. Will he be able to stray off the beaten path and find true happiness? Play your cards right and find out in Pivot of Hearts, a non-monogamous visual novel!

name: Pink or Blue
summary: Choose the image in the center if its pink or blue

name: Pitit Bac
summary:
The good old Categories word game in a simple, fast, clean and real-time version. You can either play with the classic categories or write your own to open up a whole new game where players have to come up with ideas in crazy categories! Suggestions are available if you run out of ideas.

Players are given a letter and have to come up with something (a word or phrase) that fits each category within the (configurable) time limit. The first player to find something for all categories ends the round. Then all players vote on the other players' answers to determine if they agree with the propositions.

Valid answers are worth 10 points, unless someone else has also answered the same thing (in which case it is half of that). Invalid answers score nothing. These scores can be configured.

Available in English and French. No account needed, jut click the link and play.

name: Pigs on Head
summary:
Pigs on Head is a game made by Videlectrix.

In both modes of the game, the object is to catch the pigs on Pageboy's head and give them to either Hank or Frank. If Pageboy fails to catch a pig, it's destroyed and Pageboy loses a life. Lose all three, and the game is over. Pageboy can only carry 10 pigs on his head at one time.

In Mode A, you control all three characters at once.

In Mode B, Hank and Frank move up and down the ladders in a predetermined pattern (when Hank goes up, Frank goes down and vice-versa).

The number of points you earn for dropping off pigs is directly related to the number of rungs up Hank/Frank are on the ladder. Therefore, the bottom rung (or one pig on head) is worth 1 point, while the top rung is worth 10.

After an era of destruction, unable to take it anymore, something that could perhaps be called “the good essence” of the creature to separate itself from this entity and escaped inside, creating its own world, where its other part would find it. This planet was totally different from the others, there was life, and life cooperated with the development of this planet. Then the creator creature split into several parts, giving way to an intelligent civilization that would further prosper this place. The monster spent years hunting this part and the planet, as it was weakened without its other part.

name: Pitfall: The Lost Expedition
summary:
Twenty-two years after making his groundbreaking debut on the Atari 2600, Activision's Pitfall Harry returns for more jungle-exploring action. The intrepid adventurer is brought to life for more than 50 perilous levels set in such exotic South American locales as rainforests, glaciers, mines, and ancient ruins. As in the original, players must utilize Harry's athletic prowess to swing from vines, run from rolling logs, hop over treacherous pits, avoid snapping crocodiles, and more, while trying to survive the hostile environment.

His objectives? To retrieve lost artifacts before they fall into the hands of his rival and to save those in danger. Pitfall Harry will eventually encounter situations that even he can't conquer with a well-timed jump or two, so players can pull items stored in his knapsack to assist him. Like the character's single foray on the original PlayStation, this game is designed to make players smile while exploring the mysterious lands before them. Although Pitfall 3D made use of Bruce Campbell's voice for its comic effect, Pitfall Harry attempts to use its visuals to elicit grins, with the protagonist drawn as a caricature, with a large head balanced atop a slender body.

As the story begins, Harry is a member of a treasure-hunting expedition whose plane goes down in the forest. The other survivors are scattered throughout the game; an older, wiser adventurer who was on the plane -- and who becomes incapacitated during the accident -- urges Harry to embark on a quest to save them while battling a rival, eco-unfriendly group of treasure hunters for the relics of the jungle so they can be returned to their rightful owners. He hands Harry the "Hero's Handbook" and Harry's off to adventure. The "Hero's Handbook's" pages are scattered throughout the levels just like the crash survivors are. Find new pages, and Harry will learn new moves.

name: Pitch Black: A Dusklight Story
summary: This is the first installment of a six episode saga, and featuring around one hour of gameplay with features for replay-ability.

name: Pip 2
summary: PIP 2 — cute puzzle game with pipes. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes

name: Pinball Girls
summary:
"Pinball Girls" is a game combined with pretty girl, pinball and galgame. The story begins with the agreement that “me” signs an alliance with Cyrili to collect the "destiny energy ball" needed together. Along the way, you will transform yourself as variety of gentlemen and appear beside all kinds of 9 girls to help them achieve their wishes.
From now on, "destiny" will be in hand, everything will be changed by you!

name: PixelJunk: Scrappers Deluxe
summary: Clean up the streets of Junktown as a team of robot garbage collectors. Trash your opponents with up to 4 players or go it alone in this beat ‘em up that’s also a clean ‘em up!

name: Picot Ether
summary: 『ピコエーテル』は新型ウイルスが蔓延した都市を救う薬剤調合シミュレーションゲームです。 プレイヤーは『Ｒ－ＢＯＷウイルス』が蔓延した都市の診療所医師となり、抗ウイルス薬の開発に勤しみます。

name: Pixxxel
summary: Pixxxel is a game where you can immerse yourself in the colorful world of platform games, but far from simple ones.

name: Pipes Puzzles
summary: Pipes Puzzles is a casual puzzle game.

name: Pinball: Our Church and Halloween RPG - Machine #2
Pinball: Our Church and Halloween RPG - Machine #3
Pixel Pro Tennis
summary:
Pixel Pro Tennis is a unique and addicting arcade tennis game, that combines realistic gesture controls with authentic physics and beautiful pixel-art.
Use the unique and simple touch controls to hit everything from a lob, to a slice, to a gloriously satisfying top-spin winner.

name: Pipes Puzzle Casual Arcade
summary: The Evil Hacker launched a dangerous virus into your network! Now harmful monsters-viruses are trying to destroy the network. Solving the fascinating puzzles and do not let them go down to the bottom edge!

name: Pixel Petkeeper
summary: A pet-collecting autobattle game. Enter dungeons to battle, tame pets, collect treasure, and unlock new areas in this pixel art indie game

name: Pillar Builder Puzzle
summary: Build the highest tower in the world and try to hold it!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Clam Knight
summary: "Clam Knight" is an easy-to-operate puzzle action game in which you control Marvin, bivalves shellfish, to wipe away all puddles of water while watching out for enemies who get in the way.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Ninja Sneaking R
summary: "Kunoichi" invades the enemy's castle. Let's capture all 100 stages quickly without being found by the enemy.

name: Pikmin Multiplayer
summary: The GameCube USA version of Pikmin now with 2-4 player split screen multiplayer!

name: Pip 3
summary: Pip 3 is a cute puzzle game with pipes. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes.

name: Pixel drawing block
summary: Pixel drawing block is a leisure and nourishing game. In the game, you need to fill in the block according to the prompts of the number to complete the hidden graphic. You need to push the density according to the value, and the results graphic will be obtained after completing the topic.

name: Pinball Science
summary: Pinball Science is a video game published in 1998 on Windows by Dorling Kindersley. It's an educational and puzzle game, set in a pinball theme.

name: Pipyakas
summary: J2ME mobile game, similar to Bomberman. Supports Bluetooth multiplayer (up to 8 people).

name: Pit Fighter Tycoon
summary: Slavery. Violence. PROFIT. You're an alien slaver - abduct humans to build the most powerful gladiator team in the universe! Surgically enhance your slaves, or grind them down for profit. Become the worst kind of corporate overlord in this strategic auto-battler & management game.

name: Pixel Heroes
summary: Pixel Heroes is a new and coming Free-To-Play MMORPG. Explore the unexplored, grow your stats and build allies so you together can defeat the great terrors of Uzoria.

name: Pixacrea
summary: Pixacrea is a creature collecting & battling adventure game where you can get 185 creatures called Pixacrea, or Pixa's for short. In this roguelite game when you lose a battle outside of any major city, or a battle by the group anarchy you're met with a game over page.

name: Pit Stoppers
summary: Fix racing cars with your crewmates in this local co-op game for up to 4 players. Work as quickly as possible, but make sure to do it right. Don't forget - every mishap can turn a race into chaos! Each location offers its own quirks and funny moments that are a great fun for all kinds of players.

name: Pirate Dragons
summary: Play a dragon in this third-person, action RPG! During the time of sailing ships and piracy, you are a dragon. Grow your hoard by joining a faction, trading goods, or becoming a pirate!

name: Pixiescape
summary: Each match, players will play as fairy & robot. Fairies must survive as long as possible. Robots capture fairies as quickly as possible. Both teams will have unique abilities at their disposal. Once all fairies are captured, the players will switch roles. The team with the best survival time wins.

name: Pizza Kidd
summary: Kidd Games presents: an all new, stylish, combat driven 2-D beat-em-up set in a dark sci-fantasy world - featuring uniquely drawn 16-bit pixel art with an aesthetic heavily inspired by 90's anime, graphic novels, and quarter munching arcade brawlers.

name: Picayune Dreams
summary: Adrift across the void, you must fend off thousands of nightmarish and otherworldly creatures. You're never at rest, as you weave between horde survival and bullet hell gameplay. Test new builds, and improve through roguelite meta progression. And don't forget. You mu [Transmission Interrupted...]

name: Pile
summary: Pile is a fast-paced puzzle game that you won’t be able to put down! Easy to learn but full of subtleties, PILE will require you to think fast and elaborate strategies to survive as long as possible while scoring a maximum of points!

name: Pizza Fun
summary: Pizza Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Pico World Race
summary: Pico World Race is a fast-paced racing game for PICO-8. Get in your supercar and take a trip around the world, testing your driving skills on challenging circuits against a host of opponents.

name: Piratepoly Gold: Caribbean Treasure
summary: Ahoy Pirates! The time has come for an incredible journey. Together with the entire crew, we must conquer the whole Caribbean Sea, which is filled with valuable gold. Be vigilant because hostile units and various dangers await us on every corner.

name: Picross S8
summary: The eighth entry in the Picross S series. Back with more puzzles between the usual Picross, Mega, Clip, Color, and Extra modes. Now includes up to 4 player local multiplayer.

name: Pickle Fun
summary: Pickle Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Pinball Star
summary:
Enjoy the best classic pinball game on Windows!

Remember the good old days of pinball on your computer? Now you can re-live the experience on your new Windows devices. Engage your hyperdrive, and blast into this classic game.

name: Pixel Boy: The Legend of Tain
summary: Play as Tain, as he embarks on a quest, to rescue his dear friend who has been kidnapped by an evil wizard.

name: Pixel Shrine: Jinja
summary:
Pixel Shrine Jinja is a sandbox simulation game about an ancient Japanese shrine.
You can create beautiful shrines in a world of pixel art.

name: Piano Star
summary: Tap the black tiles! You can easily perform a piano music by yourself. With fun and ease, melody and rhythm of piano songs will flow freely by your fingers.

name: Pile Up!
summary: "Pile Up!" is a strategic building game which you need to build houses, fulfill your people’s requests and manage your risky buildings in different ways on a small land. But don’t let your guard down in this chill environment, we only get you relaxed so you destroy everything you did.

name: Pip 4
summary: PIP 4 — cute puzzle game with pipes. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes.

name: Pixel Chan
summary: Pixel version of cute girls in relaxing puzzle game.

name: Pixelmancer
summary: Pixelmancer is a casual roguelite game developed by a single developer. You play as a necromancer with pets that will aid on your journey, you can upgrade almost anything for your hero and your pets. You will die constantly but become stronger and better with every death. How far can you go?

name: Pixel Starships 2
summary: Pixel Starships 2; the sequel to the popular Pixel Starships game is currently in development. Please add to your wishlist to receive the latest updates.

name: Pizza Simulator
summary: "Anyone who says that money cannot buy happiness has clearly never spent their money on pizza". Pizza Simulator gives you an opportunity to open and manage a pizza restaurant of your dreams. It's all in your hands. Toss it, flip it, make it. Create your pizza empire!

name: Pikmin Puzzle Card e+
summary:
A pack with three different cards were released with Pikmin 2 in Japan, included with the game. These were used to give a demonstration of how the three games in the Pikmin Puzzle Card e+ line works.

Hikkonuki Pikmin: In this game, you are tasked with getting all of the Pikmin stuck in the ground out by plucking them.
Tekuteku Pikmin: You'll take control of the Pikmin and get them to the end of the course.
Tsunagete Pikmin: You'll alter the positions of platforms to give the Pikmin access to the otherside of the arena.

name: Pixel Artist
summary: Unleash your inner artist and create beautiful works of art. Choose a blank canvas from one of the 8 categories and paint by number. Fill your art gallery with over 100 paintings of different shapes and sizes.

name: Piggy Gambit
summary: Piggy Gambit is a game that harmoniously combines the elements of chess, box puzzles, and flow control into a coherent puzzle game about a piggy searching for the meaning to his life.

name: Pimp My Water Gun
summary: "Pimp My Water Gun" is a tile-based 2D squirt gun builder. The player selects stock-parts from a library and arranges them in "builds" on a canvas. Your aim is to score a high "Coolness" rating. Parts and their logics have a meaning within your build. Reasonable designs with a high degree of customization beat uninspired builds. It's a "kitbashing" simulator and a creative challenge.

name: Pip 5
summary: Pip 5 - cute puzzle game with pipes. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes.

name: Pierre's Adventures in French
summary: Want to improve your French? Need a break from flash cards and listening exercises? Ready to put what you've already learned into practice? Félicitations! This is the game for you.

name: Pirates, Vikings and Knights
summary: PVK is a modification to Valve Software's Half-Life, featuring three-way action between very unique teams, each from wide-ranging historical time periods, and composed of very unique classes. Here in the PVK universe, fun is emphasized over realism: there's plenty of fun to spread around! Both team cooperation and individual merit may play large roles at different times. Similarly, calculated genocide and reckless kamikaze attacks will coexist! You'll find all the sadistic, maniacal gore or absurdist existential humor anyone could want! So no matter who you are, you will be able to find your "bag" here, baby.

name: Pika Pika Nurse Monogatari 2
summary: Pika Pika Nurse Monogatari 2 is a 3DS game where you play as a nurse.

name: Picta Mori
summary: When first seemingly harmless achievement in technology turns into something sinister is not an unknown scenario to us. Picta Mori plays with the idea of what if AI image generator would start predicting people's deaths.

name: Pigments
summary:
Fruity dodge'em up and paint'em all.

This expanded version comes with new levels, new fruits, new mechanics, a new interface and a new battle mode.

name: Piofiore: Episodio 1926 Limited Edition
summary: Experience the continuation of each character’s story from Piofiore: Fated Memories in five all-new episodes, a thrilling tale of mystery and murder, and an alternative what-if scenario that sheds new light on a familiar face.

name: Pip 6
summary: Pip 6 - cute puzzle game with pipes. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes.

name: Piranha
summary: Trotting through deserts, snow and forests to enter a portal by killing the Piranhas using abilities, combat and pickups

name: Pixel Paint
summary: Pixel Paint is anything but a classic coloring book. The point of the game is for you to put your mind at ease, follow the numbers and fill every last pixel with a corresponding color. Sink into the gameplay loop of Pixel Paint.

name: PixelSlime
summary:
PixelSlime is a simple action role-playing game! structured like 8-bit dots.
Lots of items, magics, but super easy play!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Angel's Blood
summary:
The girl with the strength to defeat large androids with a single blow, Minase Akari.
The rebel with the hacking skills to survive in an AI-controlled society, Sakura Kurono.
A connection borne in battle and strengthened through the desire to destroy the Command Angel AI.
Enjoy seeing their attempts to understand each other as their journey continues to an exciting climax!

name: Pipeline Panic
summary: Good old fashioned 2D arcade fun with tons of upgrades and fast paced action where taking risks is rewarded with a higher score. Defend humanity's last source of energy wrench in one hand, laser gun in the other

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Angel's Blood
Pippi
summary: An atmospheric game about catching a runaway dog.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Verzeus
summary: The latest in a long line of old school type horizontal shooters!

name: Pizza City
summary: Uncle Tony's got a new delivery boy-you. In Pizza City you're the pie jockey, shuttling pizzas from Tony's all over an expansive cityscape filled with colorful characters. Do well and you can upgrade your car and get the pies out faster.

name: Pixel Cat's End
summary: Pixel Cat's End is a virtual pet site where you collect and manage a village of cat-like creatures. You can dress them up, give them jobs, build and decorate their homes, and take them on tabletop-rpg-style adventures.

name: Pid
summary: Set out on a gravity defying journey, alongside Kurt, a boy lost in space. Find a way to lead him home using only your wits.

name: Pinball FX3: Marvel Pinball Season 2 Bundle
summary:
Pinball FX3 and the Marvel Universe collide in Marvel Pinball Season 2 Bundle, bringing together a host of tables and packs inspired by Marvel’s exciting cadre of Heroes & Villains in this bundle!
Marvel Pinball Season 2 features the following tables and packs:
• Civil War
• Deadpool
• Venom
• Marvel’s Guardians of the Galaxy
• Marvel’s Ant-Man
• Marvel’s Avengers: Age of Ultron
• Marvel Pinball: Avengers Chronicles
• Marvel's Women of Power

name: Ping Pong Peg
summary: Ping Pong Peg is an intense arcade style game full of RPG elements and strategy. As the player, you control the top and bottom paddles trying to hit all of the pegs in each level by keeping the ball in play with the bumpers. Clearing the levels allows you to upgrade the bumpers, balls, and abilities to improve your odds of beating the levels and defeating the bosses. Do you have what it takes to master the pegs?

name: Pichi Girl
summary: Pichi Girl is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Pinball FX3: Marvel Pinball - Cinematic Pack
summary: Tables inspired by blockbuster films in the Marvel Cinematic Universe come together in this thrilling pack featuring "Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy", "Marvel's Avengers: Age of Ultron" and "Marvel's Ant-Man."
