You can redecorate their house with different furniture and the souvenirs they bring back!

name: Pixel Washer
summary: Pixel Washer is a cozy, zen-like game where you play as a cute piggy power washing beautiful pixelated worlds. Wash sprites, upgrade your power washer, and find hidden secrets.

name: Pixel Puzzles World War II Jigsaws
summary: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Pixel Puzzles Illustrations & Anime: Jigsaw Pack - Variety Pack XS
summary: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Kriegsmarine
summary: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: French Tanks
summary: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Italian Tanks
summary: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Pirates of the Seven Seas
summary: If you are fascinated by the world of pirates and have always dreamed of crossing swords and emptying your pistol into a horde of bloodthirsty, wild enemies, Pirates of the Seven Seas is the must-have game for your mobile phone. Once downloaded, a fabulous adventure awaits you on your phone, where you'll get to play a reckless pirate braving the greatest dangers on the hunt for a lost treasure. In the jungle, on a boat, in the pirate town, or on an antique surfboard, you'll also get the chance to free the sexiest prisoners along the way!

name: Pirate Booty and the Bukkake Buccaneer
summary: Spread your seed across the seven seas! Your first-mate staged a mutiny, taking off with your precious ship. You'll have to build up a loyal crew, one slut at a time, to take back your ship and get revenge on the wench who took it from you in the first place!

name: Pillow Talk at the End of All Things.
summary:
A calm and quiet night in Rio de Janeiro.

That is until you hear a shot. And another. And yet another one. The timing gets faster, with more shots, shots with different sounds. You wake up and realize something is happening in the favela nearby. Either gang violence or state violence, you never really know.

That's the same situation where Lenon finds herself for the first time, and now it's up for her "friend" Graves to help her not to panic. It's just another night in Rio, and you know things will move on as always after that.

Pillow Talk at the end of all things is a small yuri visual novel about trying to get calm during a time when violence is commonplace, and expected. Follow Lenon and Graves during what is just another night in the Cidade Maravilhosa.

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Pack - German Railway Guns
summary: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Pixel Descent
summary: Pixel Descent is an action rogue-lite in which you navigate a series of complex dungeons packed to the brim with monsters that want you dead. Sign the contract and descend into the deepest depths of the abyss knowing full well that you will definitely die there, it's just a matter of when.

name: Pikmin Finder
summary: Pikmin Finder is a mobile browser AR game created to promote Pikmin 4.The gameplay involves looking around to find sprouts, plucking them, and sending those Pikmin to find treasures. The game has 20 treasures to find in total. Once all 20 have been found, a prompt appears to reset all game progress and collect the Pikmin and treasures again.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series Ninja Sneaking vs: Battle on the Couch
summary:
Asymmetrical Action for 2~4 Players!
Attack & Defense: Become the Greatest Ninja!

name: Pirate's Boom Boom
summary: This visually striking & super-fun "Arcade" Shooter will challenge newcomers and pros alike! Join our heroes, Pirate and Crow on their tiny wooden boat to battle Ghost Ships, Kamikazes, Armadas and the most dangerous Fleets of the high seas!

name: Pipe Dream
summary: SAM Coupé port of Pipe Dream.

name: Pinocchio: Interactive Book
summary: Pinocchio. Interactive classic stories for all ages.

name: Pixel Puzzles World War II Jigsaws Pack: Invasion of Poland
summary: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Pinball FX3: Star Wars Pinball Season 1 Bundle
Pixels
summary: Pixels is the new way of pixel battles. Share your art to the world on a huge canvas.

name: Pigs Can Fly
summary: Crank your Playdate to fly as a pig, but avoid the birds or it's game over. A simple arcade game made in one day.

name: Pixel Dash
summary: Pixel dash is a fast-paced platformer focused on allowing every player to feel what it is like to be a speedrunner.

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Pack - The Blitz
summary: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Pibby: Apocalypse
summary: Pibby: Apocalypse is a mod for Friday Night Funkin' that is centered around Learning With Pibby: Apocalypse,

name: Picross S+
summary:
A port/remake of the 3DS's Picross e series using the engine of the Nintendo Switch's Picross S series.

Notable changes include the translation of the puzzles from Picross e's Micross mode to the Picross S series' Clip Picross mode, as well as additional Picross and Color Picross puzzles unique to this release.

The base game includes all 150 puzzles from the first Picross e release in both Picross and Mega Picross forms, while puzzles from the remaining Picross e games are available as individual DLC packs.

name: Pixel Puzzles World War II Jigsaws: Pack - Battle of Peleliu
summary: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Pinball Champ '95
summary: Pinball gambling game.

name: Pixel Puzzles World War II Jigsaws: Battle of Hürtgen Forest
summary: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Pirates!
summary: Swap and match gems on your journey with pirates through unknown lands and seas in this addictive and exciting match-3 game. Dig treasures, open chests, fight enemies or fulfil other tasks you are given in each level. Combine gems to create mighty ones and then combine these new gems to create even more powerful ones!

name: Piggy Wiggy
summary:
Help cute little piggies to get acorns by solving brain-busting puzzles!
Piggy Wiggy is a new cool physics-based puzzle game presented by Qaibo Games. Create links between various objects on the screen to help guide the pigs to the acorns in each level. Don't let the pigs touch the spikes!
What is interesting in the puzzle game?

name: Pinata Hunter
summary: Pinata Hunter 1 is very addicting and an enjoyable game and very user friendly. The game gives you the ability to hita pinata with something different than what ispossiblein reality. At the beginning you are given a small stick and a paper bag. The objective is simple beat the pinata to make it drop candy from the colorful elephant figurine. The paper bag is used for collecting those candy that drops from the pinata.The game is not as easy as it sounds, Pinata Hunter 1 is quite challenging and requires a great deal of strategy to receive better score.

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws: Pack - Variety Pack 11
summary: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Ping
summary: The classic game of video ping-pong now on Playdate!

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Pack - Soviet Invasion of Poland
summary: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Pinhole Universe
summary: A game of exploration, curiosity, and fascination. Single-player, low-pressure and endless variety.

name: Pixi Poxi Autorunner Lab
summary: Pixi Poxi is a challenging autorunner rage puzzle platform game that will test the limits of your gaming skills. You will accompany a test subject on their quest to escape to freedom fighting through several levels with a variety of difficulties, traps and barriers!

name: Pixel Paint 2: Special Edition
summary:
Pixel Paint 2 is a sequel to an extremely popular game by the same name. The rules are quite simple. Put your mind at ease, follow the numbers, and fill out every last pixel with the right color.

It's your first step in becoming an amazing pixel artist. Choose a theme you like and sink into the wonderful world of pixels.

Choose from a wide range of drawings, and expand your pixel art gallery with the Health DLC!

name: Pipe Line Puzzle
summary:
Connect the complex pipes by rotating them!
This simple yet deep puzzle game lets you twist the panels and create a flowing water path by connecting the pipes.

The controls are easy - just touch the panel you want to rotate.
Find the start and end points of the pipes and keep connecting them by rotating.

Earn 1 to 3 stars based on your completion time and aim for 3 stars on all stages!

name: Pizza Panda
summary:
Pizza Panda is a fast-paced pizza-delivery platformer for the PICO-8 fantasy console. Players take on the role of a panda who drives a cartoonishly agile car, jumping around small vertically oriented cityscape-style levels in order to collect pizza and deliver it directly into the mouths of various animals who are sticking their heads out of the windows of buildings.

Each level presents the photographs of one or more animals to which the player must deliver the pizza, some of them wearing hats which the player must correctly place upon the animals' heads in order to make a valid delivery. There are also baby rats crawling on the roofs of some buildings which must be collected and delivered to their papa without letting them be eaten by cats. In order to accomplish these things, the player stacks pizzas, hats, and baby rats on the roof of the car and traverses the level, either touching or avoiding certain NPCs. Finding an efficient route through each level is encouraged through the use of a target time; if the player completes all the objectives of a level within the target time, a star is awarded for that level.

name: Pickles
summary: Pickles is an unreleased 3D adventure-platformer for the Nintendo GameCube featuring a monkey riding a unicycle.

name: Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Variety Pack 2
summary: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Piozila 2 : Animal Adventures
summary:
Help cute animals collect all the stars.

Guide animals through unique and colorful levels and chapters to collect stars.
Unlock additional animals using collected stars.
Control the animal by touching your screen or rotating your device.

name: Pixel Petals
summary: Pixel Petals: Relax with 2D pixel flowers. Crossbreed to unlock vibrant colors, complete quests, and create your tranquil pixel garden.

name: Pixel Princess Arena
summary: Pixel Princess Arena is a Single Player Auto Battler. Strategically place your heroes, empower them with unique items and blessings, build your team, and save the princess!

name: Picture Puzzle
summary: Picture Puzzle is a puzzle game from Daniel Linton Jr, published by Software Creations. The game supports mouse capability and has options on the size of the puzzle before the game begins. Save and loading features are available, too.

name: Pina Colada
summary:
Pina Colada is a set of 23 maps by a small team of mappers from the Pineapple Under the Sea discord server. These maps were created with the following requirements:
1) No more than 75 monsters per map.
2) Maps should be short, dense, and interconnected.
3) Maps should contain a death exit on Ultra-Violence difficulty

name: Pillage the Village
summary:
Pillage the Village features ragdoll physics, gesture recognition, and visceral, satisfying gameplay differentiating it from anything else out there.

The story in Pillage The Village picks up before the events of the classic Defend Your Castle, and offers some explanation as to why the attacking horde attempts to destroy you with such vehemence and zealotry.

Your actions have consequences. Take a moral stand and fight for the pacifist way or indulge in your deep desires and walk the path of the antagonist. Either path includes a plethora of useful spells, upgrades and abilities.

name: Pixel Piracy Online
summary: Pirate MMO RPG that has it all. You will play alone or with friends any way you want: build the world, gather resources, farm, socialize, pillage, level up, min-max, loot, craft, survive, etc. One big dynamic, persistent world.

name: Pirates Odyssey
summary: Ahoy, mateys! We are marooned on a series of islands and need to find a way home. Help us explore the environment, build camps and find glorious booty. Join us on an island hopping adventure full of parrot wisdom, pirate mayhem and puzzle glory! Arrr!

name: Pickleball Smash
summary: Unleash Your Pickleball Fever! Get ready to serve, dink, and smash your way to victory in the thrilling world of Pickleball Smash. Compete across multiple venues, jump into challenging minigames, and play in competitive tournaments to become the best of the best.

name: Pier Solar and the Great Architects
summary: Sega Genesis/Mega Drive version of Pier Solar and the Great Architects.

name: Pixel of Memory
summary: Pixel of Memory is a wholesome minimalist puzzle game about an amnesiac painter piecing himself back together through his childhood mementos.

name: Pilsner Urquell: Undress Me!!!
summary: Catch beer bottles in a beer crate to undress the selection of 3 girls on-screen.

name: Pikmin 2: Caveless Edition
summary: Pikmin 2: Caveless Edition is a brand-new mod of Pikmin 2, which redesigns the story mode of Pikmin 2 to remove all of the caves and keep the design and style similar to Pikmin 1 and 3. There are numerous changes to the gameplay and level design to suit this new playstyle, including White Pikmin having their own onions (credit to PikHacker for the Purple and White Onions mod), different enemies and bosses on the overworld and a completely redesigned progression. It’s up to you and your squad of Pikmin to collect all 51 treasures scattered across the four overworlds.

name: Pixel Art Academy: Learn Mode
summary: Pixel Art Academy is an educational game for learning how to draw. Learn Mode is a standalone version that focuses on the interactive tutorials, drawing challenges, and projects where you make your own art for video games.

name: Pinball FX: South Park Pinball
summary: It’s South Park, pinball style! Join Cartman, Stan, Kyle, Kenny and Butters in these totally sweet pinball adventures!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Ninja Runner
summary: A ninja never stops training.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Volume 7
summary: Dive into breathtaking adventures on three of the greatest Williams classics!

name: Pikmin 2: The Adventures of Gilbert and Hank
Piso Zero
summary:
Rather simplistic game that came out when the 8 bits were already surpassed by computers and 16-bit consoles.

Similar to "Die Hard" we will have to go through the 15 floors of a building rescuing the different hostages while we finish with the different enemies that come our way. There are 7 different types of enemies.

name: Pickleball One
summary: Dive into America's fastest-growing sport while making new friends! Master Pickleball anytime, anywhere, whether as a single player or with up to 4 participants. Beyond just singles and doubles, this app includes in-depth fitness and training modules, that will elevate both your physical and virtual gameplay. Experience a mixed-reality setting for immersive wall drills, practice sessions, and workouts.

name: Pigsaw: Human Abattoir
summary: Escape the nightmarish human abattoir in this blood soaked first person shooter.

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Battle of Leyte
summary: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Pico Zombie Garden
summary: A demake of the first world of the original Plants vs. Zombies. 10 levels, 8 different plants, 5 different zombies, 3 complete songs!

name: Pico Topia
summary: A tiny citybuilder where you combine islands to gather resources, complete missions, unlock new buildings and increase your build area.

name: Pigeon in Hurry
summary: Pigeon In Hurry is a fun 3D runner about a infinitely hungry bird. Feel the free flight at low altitude. Fly around various obstacles, collect as many tacos as possible, feed the pigeon.

name: Pizza Spy
summary: The secret agent "Ace" represents the latest generation of spies: armed with improbable Pizza Gadgets, he will have to travel the world to thwart a global gastronomic threat. Test your skills in this action-comedy adventure game by the makers of “Detective Gallo”!

name: Pixel Kane
summary: Immerse yourself in a unique adventure with Kane! Run, jump and solve situations taking into account the physical laws of the new world.

name: Pixel Hunter Idle
summary:
Theme: A mobile game revolving around exploration, battles, and collecting valuable items in a vast world filled with dungeons and powerful enemies.

Genre: It is an action-adventure game with pixel graphics. It offers addictive gameplay with a focus on battles and character progression.

name: Pitch Patter
summary: Welcome to Pitch Patter, the game show where pitches meet punchlines! Use your devices as controllers and compete with 3-8 players in crafting the most outlandish adverts. Featuring two gameplay modes - Pitch Patter and the Pitch Pit. Get ready for a marketing showdown!

name: Pieklo
summary: A small wad consists of 2 maps. The maps originally have been constructed in limit- removing format, but there is Boom's action of sky transfer on map 02. You start in a small hotel. An aliens from Pekel world invades in our reallity, so, get ready your weapon and show them kuzma's mother!

name: Pi2
summary: A little map in techno-style with some elements of Kobal-style.

name: Pimp My Ride Street Racing
summary: Pimp my Ride: Street Racing was the second game related to the automotive show.

name: Pinnacle of Darkness
summary: Large hell/gothic themed map for GZDoom.

name: Pixel Gun Master
summary: Pixel Gunmaster is a roguelike shooter action game about a protagonist who is turned into a demon and goes on a journey to undo his wish. Will you be able to defeat powerful bosses and return to human form?

name: Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Halloween
summary: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: PixArk: Every Little Thing You Do is Magic
summary: Every single spell cast is the work of magic. Whether it is manipulating the elements or casting the spells, time stands still as the beauty unfolding before us. Let's build a magical castle, revel in this enchanted moment, and experience every little sparks of wonder together!

name: Pixel Puzzles World War II Jigsaws: Pack - Battle Off Samar
summary: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Piron Virus
summary: In the apocalypse caused by the Prion virus, you need to manipulate your four companions to survive in your shelter. When facing survivors like you, killing or assisting is up to you to decide. You can choose to live a miserable life, or you can choose to find a way to save everyone.

name: Pillow Champ
summary: Challenge the world one pillow at a time in this irreverent 2.5D fighting game. Featuring a range of singleplayer options, local multiplayer, and online multiplayer with rollback netcode!

name: Picopolis
summary:
Picopolis is a SimCity demake / idle game in which you place roads, residental/industrial/commercial zoning, schools, police departments, hospitals, and various other things.

The city will grow depending on housing, jobs, pollution, and crime ratings, and the bigger it gets the more money you make.

name: Pight
summary: Pight is a minimalist puzzle game inspired by the Minecraft redstone system, in which we try to turn on the light block by using piston blocks and different block types.

name: Pico Fox
summary: Fly your Arwing to victory in this PICO-8 demake of Star Fox. Features 3 levels: Cornerea, Venom and Fortuna.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series Project Nosferatu
summary: A fast-paced Action RPG with a fully customizable arsenal combo battle system.

name: Pizza Delivery: Zebaxx
summary: You are a young Spanish woman who has just moved to the outskirts of Venice, and has just found a job in a newly opened pizzeria...

name: Pico Sim Date 2
summary: Pico Sim Date 2 is a point-and-click Flash game co-created by Moosh and Acromatik for Pico Day, and released on May 1, 2007. It is the second entry in the Pico Sim Date series and acts as the direct sequel to Pico Sim Date. This time, Pico has to save the kidnapped Nene from the psychotic Cyclops, through dating four girls who have information on his whereabouts.

name: Pirates of Donkey Island
summary: A terrible curse ruined your royal wedding, placing your soul into your pirate grandfather's body. Now you must lead a crazy crew that consists of a gorilla gentleman, an undead rock star, a fast-aging Voodoo crone, and a ridiculous spokesman. The challenges in this adventure are inspired by Monkey Island and Pirates of the Caribbean.

name: Pinball M: Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball
summary:
Hail to the King baby!

We couldn’t be more excited to reveal the next pinball table coming to Pinball M, the game that will haunt pinball players in their worst nightmares!

name: PilgrimAge
summary: PilgrimAge is a solo-developed souls-like game, set in a medieval world inspired by PS1 aesthetics and the souls universe.

name: Pixel Room: Escape Game
summary:
You are trapped in "somewhere". Solve all the mysteries and escape from here.

This game is different from ordinary escape games in that you are trying to escape by solving the rules of the room.

At first, you may not understand what is going on, but if you do certain things, the whole picture of the room will be revealed little by little.

Aim to escape while understanding the rules of the room little by little.

name: Pilgrim's Peril
summary: A rogue-like dungeon crawler for the Game Boy Color. Roll dice to move across randomised sets of regions, employing whatever random selection of treasures, abilities and paths you come across to strategically push through to respite. Learn tactics, earn trophies, and push to improve your high score as you uncover what little information you can about the curse that looms over the land.

name: Pizzdile
summary: The Jungle is a dangerous and beautiful place. Can you survive alongside hordes of crocodiles, fighting for survival and the chance to eat delicious pizza? The meme about crocodiles and pizza is being taken to the next level.

name: Pixiel: Dreadwager
summary: Pixiel Dreadwager is a rogue-lite shooter set in the Pixygon universe, where you'll explore the Dark Forest alongside a lone robot named Pixiel from Amebrak! Your task is to annihilate hordes of enemies using collected skills and later confront legendary creatures residing in the forest!

name: Pic-Fix
summary: Good at bringing order to chaos? Jump in and unravel the real picture from the scramble of pieces.

name: Pineapple 2000
summary: Pineapple 2000 is a remixed and revamped version of Space Invaders that pits a gingerbread man warrior against an army of invading Fruitoids.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Storm Swordsman
summary:
Stealth & swordsmanship & ninjutsu
An action adventure with an epic storyline.

name: Pill Box
summary:
It's war, and you are a gunner in a fortified gun emplacement, or pillbox. Your position at the top of the screen is slowly being over-run by soldiers, who are creeping up on you from the bottom of the screen, and taking cover behind rows of sand-bags. Once the enemy gets past the final row, they will destroy your base with a grenade, so you will need to shoot them before that happens. You control the cross-hairs of a gun, and must take aim and fire at the soldiers when they are crawling between the sandbags, which is the only time they are exposed. Occasionally, the leader of the troops briefly appears at the bottom of the screen to encourage their troops. Shooting the leader will cause all of the remaining troops to surrender, and the next wave to begin.

The difficulty increases for the later waves, when the troops start crawling faster, and vehicles will sometimes appear which deliver soldiers closer to your pillbox.

name: Pixelment TD
summary: Pixelment TD is an Element based Tower Defense game, You are facing a new tower defense game with unique graphic experience.

name: Piece Link
summary: Connect the shapes to fit them together!

name: Pitch Black
summary: Escape Mary-Anne, a doll developed by The MonolIth Corporation, where lessons are learned through play. Stay out of the light, and flip switches to stay in the dark.

name: Pinball M: The Thing Pinball
summary: Immerse yourself in the thrilling and suspenseful world of Universal Pictures' classic film - The Thing. Use your pinball skills and battle against the shape-shifting alien through the arctic chill of U.S. Outpost #31. Can you trust anyone, even yourself?

name: Pinball M: Dead by Daylight Pinball
summary: Step into the realm of horror with Dead by Daylight Pinball. Become the hunter or even the hunted in a thrilling fusion of classic pinball and the excitement of one of the most popular horror games ever created.

name: Pinball M: Chucky's Killer Pinball
summary: After you play, you'll wish Chucky's Killer Pinball was only make-believe! Step into a twisted realm where the innocent becomes sinister, and the playful turns menacing. Navigate through an eerie playfield where Chucky lurks in the shadows, ready to pounce.

name: Pinball M: Death Save Bundle
summary: Get ready to tilt into terror with one convenient bundle! Get all launch tables for Pinball M with a discount and draw first blood on the leaderboards.

name: Pinball Spire
summary: Action adventure meets pinball in this one-of-a-kind pinballvania adventure. When a mysterious spire appears from thin air, it's up to an intrepid pinball to bump, spin, shoot, and flip its way to the top and solve the tower’s mysteries!

name: Pigbook
summary: A short metroidvania platformer game about a small island of pigs drawn in an worldly events of a new world ruled by a Corporation of a Dragon.

name: Pixsaw
summary: Arrange pieces to their letters and discover a beautiful hidden image. Pixsaw combines classic jigsaw and color-by-number genres to create a whole new type of puzzle that will give you a joyful surprise every time you create a masterpiece pixel artwork!

name: Pic-Man
summary: A Pac-Man clone for PICO-8. You control Pic and your goal is to eat all pills to win the maze.

name: Picoware
summary: Do you love WarioWare? And do you love PICO-8? What we if we combine them into one game that you can play in your browser, right now? Includes 68 microgames made by 50+ developers.

name: Pico de Pon
summary: The classic 16-bit-era action puzzle game returns again - enhanced and remastered. Pico de Pon brings favorite characters from across the PICO-8 library together for intense block-swapping battle.

name: Pinball FX: A Charlie Brown Christmas Pinball
summary: Find the real meaning of Christmas in A Charlie Brown Christmas Pinball! Join the Peanuts crew in putting on a play and decorating the most perfect tree there is.

name: Pinball FX: Game Night Pinball Volume 1
summary: "Get ready for a game-changing experience as Zen Studios partners up with Asmodee to bring you three tables based on the best tabletop games. Step into a new realm of pinball, and remember, just like with the dice, a single flip can change everything. "

name: Pinball FX: Star Trek Pinball
summary: Boldly go, where no one has gone before in Star Trek Pinball! Explore 3 tables based on the fan favorite movies and TV series of the franchise ranging from classics to the present day, and live long and prosper on the leaderboards!

name: Piyokoro
summary:
A new sensation!?
Hit it and let it roll! A rolling puzzle game!
Roll the cute chicks around and aim for the goal!

name: Pirate Jam: Space DLC
summary: Embark on a cosmic puzzle adventure in Pirate Jam's Space DLC! Navigate treacherous black holes and dodge interstellar threats in 10 challenging new levels. Experience advanced space strategy and outwit the universe in this unique, celestial journey.

name: Pirates vs. Ninjas
summary: Pirates vs Ninjas - Ninjas are attacking Pirate Island. You and Your crew must take out ALL of them to Save Your Booty.

name: Pigeon
summary: A multiplayer FPS game with cool pigeons

name: Pixel Monk
summary: An atmospheric game about prayer and ducks.

name: Piczle Cross: Story of Seasons
summary: Enjoy the bucolic charm of Story of Seasons while relaxing and exercising your brain with classic Piczle Cross nonogram logic-puzzles.

name: Pillory
summary: A surrealist indie RPG with a unique, mood-based combat system. The angels of Promontory have forgotten about this place. And you are lost at the bottom of it.

name: Pixelborn
summary: Fanmade digital version of Lorcana

name: Pikmin 2 Infernal Edition
summary: A kaizo romhack for Pikmin 2 that limits your maximum Pikmin to 60, makes enemies and hazards stronger and more deadly, the Pikmin and captains much weaker, and more. Made by Antopikmin

name: Pikmin Lost Hope
summary: This mod / ROM hack for Pikmin 2 includes 11 chapter levels, with (almost) no caves, remixed areas and treasures.

name: Pipe Dream
summary: Pipe Dream, a 5 map miniWAD for GZDoom inspired by the likes of KDiZD, Phobos: Anomaly Reborn and many others.

name: Pilot Attack
summary: Horizontally scrolling shooter for Sinclair ZX Spectrum 48k home computer

name: Picky
summary: Picky is the name of the project which would later be released as Pikmin. Development migrated to the GameCube because it would be able to have more characters on the screen at once. Aside from concept artwork, there are no pictures of the game in this development stage.

name: Pitfall II: The Lost Caverns
summary: This is a port of the Atari 2600 platformer by David Crane to the Atari 8-bit computers and the 5200. It's also known for containing a second quest, exclusive to this version. The game is single player and it involves Pitfall Harry going on a series of fetch quests.

name: Pippi
summary:
Pippi Longstocking is a well-known fictional character in northern Europa. She is a little girl that never grows up and lives with no adults in Villa Villekulla, an abandoned house, with a horse (with no name) and a monkey, Mr. Nilsson. She says her mother is in heaven and her father is king of a pacific island. But who really knows ? The original stories, written by Astrid Lindgren since 1945, were adapted into films and television series. Here, is a computerized version where children will discover her little world. First, they'll have to enter Villa Villekulla, by the door, of course.

Players will explore the rooms in the Villa (hall, kitchen, bureau, bedroom, and attic) and solve different types of puzzles (i.e. jigsaw, memory). There's also a book activity where children can choose among three books and start these stories with screen texts that can be turned on or off. Texts are available in twelve (say, eleven because of British/American english) different languages.

name: Pixel Z Hunter 3D
summary: Zombie virus is destroyed world. Very few people survived. A number of them were hunting zombies in order to survive. They are called Z(Zombie) Hunter....

name: Piecing It Together
summary:
Piecing It Together brings jigsaw puzzles to a whole new dimension!
Reassemble beautiful handcrafted dioramas in 3D!
Enjoy a quick puzzling session with just a handful of pieces, or challenge yourself with many!

name: Pikupals: Picross + Aliens
summary: A short gameboy-themed nonogram game with helpful alien creatures.

name: Pixel Coloring Paint
summary: Get ready to paint, play, and learn in a world designed exclusively for little artists with Pixel Coloring Paint!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: LunLun Superherobabys DX
summary:
From toddler to adults, anyone can enjoy this breezy action game!
Help Super Baby Lunlun escape after having been eaten by the giant & evil Boss Poo!

name: Picolumia
summary: A demake of Mixolumia for the PICO-8. The goal is to reach level 15 by clearing 450 blocks. If the board fills up you lose.

name: Pico Valley
summary: Pico Valley is a Stardew Valley demake for PICO-8.

name: Pico Life
summary: Pico Life is a demake of Half-Life in PICO-8.

name: Pipework
summary: Researchers discovered an enigmatic fluid resembling water in an unexplored and unfamiliar region. Successfully obtaining a substantial sample, they now aim to transport it beyond the immediate unusual locale. Your task is to navigate its journey to various laboratories worldwide, ensuring its safety by protecting it from any potential adverse reactions.

name: Pico Zelda
summary: A Pico-8 Sized Adventure. Join Link as he fights through 3 dangerous dungeons, solves dastardly puzzles and fights deadly bosses all packed into a bite sized PNG. Bring peace to the world!

name: Pippa Funnell: Ranch Rescue
summary: Budding equestrians play as Estelle, who belongs to the Pippa Funnell horse riding team. Estelle has to find out how to make her team successful, through exploring her environment and talking to her team mates. By competing in cross country events and show jumping trials, she wins new horses and better equipment which in turn help to win more competitions! Pippa Funnell: The Stud Farm Inheritance is a must-have game for anyone who has ever dreamed of becoming a world class horse rider!

name: Picovania
summary: A demake of Castlevania in PICO-8

name: Pico Tower
summary: A Pizza Tower Demake for PICO-8.

name: Picoman Go
summary: A PICO-8 demake of Hitman Go for the demake jam including levels from the original.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Hunter of Devil
summary:
A lone Hunter stands against
the Demons who destroyed the world!

name: PipeMaster
summary: Connect the pipes using new items from stock (limited), or resue items on the field if available. Beware, you also have time limit!

name: Pirates: Caribbean Chronicles
summary: Embark on a pirate's adventure where your choices steer the fate of the Caribbean's most feared crew.

name: Pixeline: Magi I Pixieland
summary: The magic in Pixieland has mysteriously disappeared after a trading cart from a distant forest arrives. Pixeline has decided to help.

name: Pixeline Skolehjælp: Dansk – Pixeline får det sidste ord
Pixeline Skolehjælp: Matematik – Pixeline regner den ud
Pixeline Skolehjælp: Naturfag – Pixeline Gennem Ild Og Vand
Pixeline Skolehjælp: Engelsk – My name is Pixeline
Pixeline Skolehjælp: Dansk 2 – Pixeline i Bogstavjunglen
Pixeline Skolehjælp: Engelsk 2 – Pixeline Goes to London
Pixeline Skolehjælp: Lær at Læse – Det Magiske Bibliotek
Pixelines Lillebror: Buler I Bolledejen
summary: It's Pixeline's birthday and her little brother wants to bake birthday buns for her, but they're missing all the ingredients. He must now go out to collect the ingredients to bake the perfect birthday buns.

name: Pixeline Skolehjælp: Lær om Dyr – Dyrequizzen
Pixeline Skolehjælp: Lær om Geografi – Danmark på Spil
Pixeline Skolehjælp: Lær om Kroppen – Rejsen til Kroppens Indre
Pixeline Skolehjælp: Lær om Førstehjælp – Det Lille Bjørnehospital
Pixeline Skolehjælp: Lær om Klima & Vejr – Vejr og Vind med Samme Sind
Pixeline Skolehjælp: Lær om Regning – Talmesterens labyrint
Pixeline Skolehjælp: Lær om Vikingerne – Kongekampen
Pixeline Skolehjælp: Sikker på Cykel – Byens Bedste Bud
Pixeline Skolehjælp: Lær at Stave – Stavning eller kaos
Pixeline Skolehjælp: Dinosaurer – De Frygtelige Øgler
Pixeline Skolehjælp: Learning English – Money or Nothing
Pixeline Skolehjælp: Dansk – Kaos i Kommakøbing
Pixeline Skolehjælp: Matematik – Tåger over Talstrup
Pixel Panic
summary: Play as Celex Wallacin, and run, climb and celling fling your way through this awesome precision platformer you get to play in early development :D

name: Pinky's Paradigm
summary: Grab, drop, and throw nearly every piece of the puzzle in Pinky's Paradigm, a pure but charming puzzle platformer that repurposes common tropes into interesting mechanics. Solve puzzles composed of individual pieces that you can move at will, defusing "bombs", hurdling chasms. and much more.

name: Pie-Man
summary: You have to bake cakes under time pressure.

name: Pigmenta
summary: Pigmenta is an ambient logic puzzle game where you mix colors

name: Pinball FX: System Shock Pinball
summary:
Guide the Hacker through Citadel Station infested with cyborgs, mutants, and reprogrammed robots to defeat SHODAN.

Table Features:
- Jack into the Cyberspace Terminal mini-playfield for great rewards
- Watch out for the Cyborg Attack! If you take too long to shoot, your ball will be shot and jettisoned off your flipper
- Shoot with precision to 'Get a Head'. Reveal a second ball by hitting the correct one out of three severed heads
- It's a Mutant Menace! Hit all the enemies and escape by the elevator
- Brave all perils of the table to initiate self-destruct and defeat SHODAN for good

name: Pinball M: System Shock Pinball
summary: Flip to the death in the depths of space. Guide the Hacker and defeat SHODAN.

name: Picker Bot 42
summary: Explore, discover items, find Wassie lore, upgrade PB42 to gloriously defeat mutant plants and fly back home

name: Picoracer-2048
summary: A retro futuristic anti-gravity racing game!

name: Pinball Racer
summary: A micro game about chasing high scores while being knocked around by pop bumpers.

name: Pikmin 216
summary: A challenging mod for Pikmin 2 by Teddiursayoshi.

name: Pink Pong
summary: Pink Pong is a classic arcade-style game where two players compete in a fast-paced and skillful showdown. Take control of your paddle and go head-to-head with your opponent in a thrilling battle of reflexes and precision. Use your paddle to bounce the ball past your adversary and score points, but be on guard - they're aiming to do the same! The first player to reach the target score wins. Enjoy the timeless simplicity and competitive fun of this classic arcade game brought to the digital age. Pink Pong is perfect for quick matches and high-energy gaming sessions.

name: Pigeon's Mission
summary: Enjoy a whimsical pixel-art adventure crafted from a 6-year-old's art & vision. Navigate Pepper Pines as Archie, a pigeon with clever attacks & CRAZY power-ups, on a dangerous quest to save his parents. Experience a blend of nostalgia & fresh, fun gameplay in a world ruled by imagination & wonder.

name: Pico Park: Classic Edition
summary: The rule is quite simple: "Get all the keys and get to the goal and clear", but all 48 levels have special gimmicks designed specifically for multiplayer. At most levels, different gimmicks will appear as you move forward, and you will need to consult with your peers and think about new ways to cooperate.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Cat and Castle
summary:
2D action game for cat lovers!
The main character is the cat Moi.

name: Pico Dino
summary: Pico Dino is a reimagination of Google Chrome's offline dinosaur game made in PICO-8.

name: Pixel Puzzles Trivia
summary: Pixel Puzzles Trivia is an informative question questing puzzle game.

name: Picture Builder
summary:
Picture Builder is a delight for enthusiasts of pixel art, color by number, puzzles, object finding, hidden objects, and other logical games and brain teasers. Within Picture Builder, you'll discover various cityscapes initially devoid of life. It's up to you to assemble all the elements of the picture, with each object or character representing a distinct puzzle piece. Since all puzzles are entirely unique, playing Picture Builder is always a joyful and intriguing game experience.

Each location unfolds before you in parts, requiring you to collect all objects to fill the city with interesting situations and characters. Your task is to find the correct fragments for each picture, enlarge objects, and utilize hints. In Picture Builder, you independently craft the city and its inhabitants, piece by piece. Puzzle-solving has never been this enjoyable. Install the puzzle game now and receive countless urban locations with an endless array of pixel puzzles.

name: Pincrediball
summary: The Automata Pinball Wizard game! YOU design the machine and the Automata Pinball Wizard plays it to get a High Score. Earn medals to advance levels and build ever more extensive machines!

name: Pixel Fixel
summary: Pixel Fixel is a soothing game where players match tiles of various colors to form satisfying gradients. Arrange chaos into beautiful mosaics of colors!

name: Pinball Blitz
summary: Pinball Blitz combines arcade pinball with a fast-paced action roguelike. Shape each run with selectable themes, flipper setups, and table upgrades to defeat bosses and achieve high-scores.

name: Pingdom
summary: Pingdom is a Tower Defence game with endless replayability with the random terrain generation and wave system.

name: Pinballtoon
summary: Pinballtoon is a Pinball game.

name: Pirates! Showdown: Enhanced Edition
summary: A fast-paced game combining real-time strategy and defense tactics. Face off against the fearsome Red Hand privateers in thrilling head-to-head pirate battles on the high sea! Capture towns, guard towers, and much more to strengthen your defense, buff up your ships, and increase your gold supply!

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Battle of the Bulge
Pipe Escape
summary: A 2D puzzle game with a spin! Make your way through obstacle courses of pipes, water streams and bats as fast as you can whilst spinning out of control.

name: PixelCaves
summary: A Game where you need to run as fast as you can.

name: Pixel Pete
summary: Pixel Pete is an action-packed platformer game where you play as the intrepid Pixel Pete. Armed with a trusty FISH GUN, additional weaponry, and a talking cardboard cutout that only he can see and hear, as he embarks on a mission to collapse the multiverse and find his way back home.

name: Picowings
summary:
Take off and explore the mountains and lakes of Picotopia! A flight simulator made for PICO-8.

Flight model should be "somewhat realistic" in that it models thrust, lift, drag and weight--Of course all the numbers are made up, and things are grossly simplified.

name: Pick the Star
summary: "PICK THE STAR (10 liner)" is a multitasking arcade game for one player. The player must pick mostly the stars that descend from the top of the screen using the joystick.

name: Pipe Connect
summary: Pipe Connect immerses you in the exciting world of plumbing puzzles and eye-opening challenges to develop your problem-solving abilities.

name: Piece Quest
summary: Piece Quest is an idle RPG game. Gather resources, upgrade buildings, level-up your heroes and assemble your party to create the synergy needed to defeat the strongest bosses. With offline progress included.

name: Pirates. Naval battle
summary: This is a hardcore game, and it's not the easiest control. But if you can acquire combat skills, then exciting battles with pirate ships are waiting for you.

name: Pineapple: A Bittersweet Revenge
summary: Pineapple is a puzzle and story-revenge-driven game where you become the hero of the school by pulling pranks on the top bully. Time to give that witch a taste of their own medicine. With a pineapple.

name: PixArk: Jade Elegance - A Theatrical Odyssey in the East
summary: Every performance is a canvas where performers, adorned in elaborate costumes, embody the essence of their characters and deliver an aesthetic show. Build your unique stage with your friends, watch it come true, and let it take over you!

name: Pikmin 2 Hallows Haunt
summary: A Halloween-themed mod for Pikmin 2 with new areas, caves, reskinned treasures and music. Project lead by Nintendocluber

name: Pixel Car Racing: Blocky Crash
summary: Incredibly addictive, dynamic blocky cars that give you a lot of positive emotions! In Pixel Car Racer you have to take part in a breathtaking racer car game where you have to rush along a track full of secrets, obstacles, bonuses, jumps and finish first.

name: Pinnacle Point
summary: You must uncover the truth that lured your brother into a corporation’s twisted promise of eternal life. On an island steeped in shadows and secrets, you’ll fight to survive, solve haunting mysteries, and confront a past better left forgotten. A dark, 1990s-inspired modern survival horror awaits.

name: Pizza Tower: The Noise Update
summary: The long-awaited Noise Update is finally here! Bringing you The Noise in all his glory in the form of a pseudo New Game+, revisiting the events of Pizza Tower through the eyes of the yellow gremlin, with perhaps a few twists along the way.

name: Piko Interactive Collection 4
summary:
Piko Interactive Collection 4 contains 10 great games from the history of retro gaming, including Evercade's first game from a 64-bit platform with the 64-bit version of cult classic Glover!

The games included are Glover, Risky Woods, Street Racer, Zero Tolerance Underground, Target: Renegade, Sküljagger: Revolt of the Westicans, Bad Street Brawler, Mermaids of Atlantis: The Riddle of the Magic Bubble, Star X and The Fidgetts.

name: Pikmin 2 Power-Cut
summary: A Pikmin 2 mod where you get to recover the energy owed by the president's wife.

name: Piki 2
summary: A Pikmin 2 romhack with new areas and caves, and remixed treasures and enemies. Made by Antopikmin

name: Pikmin 2 Kaizo Edition
summary: A kaizo hack for Pikmin 2 with harder enemies, cave layouts and Pikmin requirements. Made by EBTKS Paddy.

name: Pim World
summary: In the game you will lead your settlement. You will have to build various buildings starting with a castle and ending with an institute. Every decision you make should be balanced, because the economy of your settlement is growing, and the lack of resources can catch up instantly!

name: Piranha Feeding
summary: Piranha Feeding is a thrilling action game with rogue-lite elements, where you control a voracious school of piranhas on a quest for the ultimate feeding frenzy. Conquer a succession of prey, ranging from smaller aquatic creatures to formidable adversaries, unlocking new abilities along the way.

name: Picnic Peril
summary: Picnic Peril is a strategy game where your goal is to lure and stall ants to stop them from ruining your picnic. Combine the unique abilities of various foods to strategize and engage in a battle of wits with the ants! Go all out in this caloric colosseum!

name: Pikmin 2 Lands of Torture
summary: A kaizo hack for Pikmin 2 with brutally challenging area and cave remixes with way too many enemies, made by QuoteBalrog. Good luck.

name: Pikmin 2 Power Cut Blackout
summary: A followup/remix to Pikmin 2 Power Cut, with remixed areas, enemies, caves and treasures, new captain models, and plenty more difficulty. Made by Nintendocluber

name: Pipistrello and the Cursed Yoyo
summary: Are you ready for the first Yoyovania?! In this 2D top-down adventure you'll explore a sprawling urban landscape, reinterpreting your surroundings through your mastery of yoyo tricks. Combine moves for traversal, fight the city's rival crime lords, and regain the influence of the Pipistrello family!

name: Pixel Quest: Survivor
summary: In this action roguelite with unique and themed characters, create your build and face hordes of enemies with up to 4 friends online, kill monsters, collect their souls, face bosses and survive!

name: Pixelgroove
summary: Embark on "Pixelgroove," a one-of-a-kind shmup adventure where your chosen music video's visuals and beats transform into exhilarating gameplay. Each video's distinct imagery directly influences the game's dynamics, crafting an experience unique to every song.

name: Pinch 50 Renpatsu!!
summary: “50 Pinch Barrage” is a highly casual side scrolling action game! With simple controls, the player must use their wits to squeeze by pinch after pinch and escape the mysterious island!*The Free Edition is an original stage in which you can train your action gameplay skills.

name: Piggy's Great Adventure
summary: Let's have a great adventure with Piggy the Little Dragon! Gather a group of unique friends and fight against dark demons! Fantasy SRPG is here!

name: Pieces of the Past
summary: 'Pieces of the Past'— a cute, sentimental adventure where you fix and restore family keepsakes, uncovering touching stories. Blend puzzle-solving with the joy of preserving memories in this delightful journey!

name: Pirate Pop Quest
summary: "Pirate Pop Quest" sets sail on a thrilling arcade adventure that tests you with reflexes! Burst bubbles of vibrant colors as you navigate through challenging levels. Strategically match pairs to unleash cascading combos and unlock treasures hidden beneath the waves!

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate Jigsaw: Variety Pack 23
summary: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate Jigsaw: Civil Unrest
summary: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Piano: Learn and Play
summary:
Become a modern Mozart with Piano: Learn and Play, the best piano learning app for Nintendo Switch.
Well-known and beloved melodies
Nursery rhymes or other popular songs make time more enjoyable for children around the world. Sing and play with family, friends or at school.
A marvel of modernity
A small, handy musical instrument that you can take anywhere you want. Relax and immerse yourself in the sounds.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Custom Cars
summary: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Pirates & Pirater
summary: Pirates & Pirater is an Action-Adventure where pirates have replaced their metal arsenal with fruit, meat & vegetables! Cook up your armory, eat your fill of tasty weaponry & fight in the culinary war!

name: Pizzakai
summary: Play as a deceased man by the name of Peppy who has been recently reincarnated as a freshly baked Pizza mobster. Offered a deal by a "Pizza God," Peppy must enter the crime den of the House of Unified Triple-Cheeses and engage in combat if he wants any chance of returning to his own world.

name: Picket Puzzle
summary:
The picket line swells as factory after factory walk out on strike. For the exploited and the oppressed of the world, this is the moment -- but time is short. The arms of the state are mobilizing to halt your advance. Can you lead the workers to victory?

A unique snake and sokoban puzzler with lots of clever mechanics in the mix.

name: Pinhead Adventures
summary: The First Game from Neversold Studios, Pinhead Adventures is a planet hopping, gun toting, sword swinging, grappling adventure! Zortan has killed every last living soul except for the Pinhead and Orbo. Join Pinhead and Orbo to fight Zortan in this 3D Action Platformer!

name: Pixel of War
summary: You are "Crados" and you will murder the Pixel of War. The Epic (and short) adventure of Conquest, Destiny and Revenge.

name: Pirates Of The Caribbean: Islands Of Fortune
summary: The game includes fifteen islands, each with three different mini-games. The player gets to control a cannon, search for treasure, and engage in sword fights. Beating one of these mini-games awards you gold. If you complete all three mini-games on the island, you conquer it. When you're not on an island, you can sail freely and sink enemy ships to earn even more gold.

name: Pixel Heroes: Tales of Emond
summary:
Entering the realm in an instant, you find yourself in a pixelated world of swords and magic.

As an idle game, "Pixel Heroes: Tales of Emond" emphasizes "easy gameplay + super high welfare + differentiated content." Draw to obtain characters, gain resource benefits through idle play, and obtain equipment and more resources through dungeons. Then, upgrade, advance, and enhance characters for enjoyable development, easily boosting your combat power. Sing your way through, knocking down layers of levels—the main gameplay content of the game.

The game's battles use a semi-turn-based and semi-real-time action bar mechanism, with the combat process fully entrusted to the system for automatic control. No need to study skill casting, reducing the threshold for beginners, while maintaining strategic depth. Various interesting gameplay elements also keep veteran players passionate about the game.

name: Pixel Gun 3D: RGB Hero Set
summary: RGB Hero Set

name: Pixel Gun 3D: Frost Dive Set
summary: Frost Dive Set

name: Pixel Gun 3D: Critical Strike Set
summary: Critical Strike Set

name: Pixel Gun 3D: Dark Fire Set
summary: Dark Fire Set

name: Pixel Gun 3D: Poison Retro Set
summary: Poison Retro Set

name: Pipeline RTX: 2
summary: PIPELINE RTX: 2 is a puzzle game. The goal of the game is incredibly simple: you need to turn various parts of the pipe into certain positions so that in the end the water can, albeit with a large number of convolutions, pass through the water supply.

name: Pieced Together
summary: Pieced Together is a cozy scrapbooking game that takes you on a heartfelt journey about friendship and getting older. Sort items, solve gentle puzzles, and decorate the scrapbook as you uncover the story piece by piece.

name: Pixel Puzzles Aardman Jigsaws
summary:
Immerse yourself in a whimsical world of creativity with our latest digital jigsaw puzzle game, featuring the beloved characters from Aardman! Pixel Puzzles Aardman brings you iconic scenes from the lovable Wallace & Gromit to the hilarious Shaun the Sheep and much more. The game features 26 free puzzles with piece counts ranging from 96 to 425.

Dive into the enchanting world of Aardman, where every piece tells a story, and every puzzle piece placed brings you closer to the magic!

name: Pixel Puzzles Aardman Jigsaws: Shaun The Sheep
summary: Pixel Puzzles Aardman, the definitive jigsaw puzzler for the PC platform.

name: Pixel Puzzles Aardman Jigsaws: The Farmers Llamas
summary: Pixel Puzzles Aardman, the definitive jigsaw puzzler for the PC platform.

name: Pixel Puzzles Aardman Jigsaws: Variety Pack 1
summary: Pixel Puzzles Aardman, the definitive jigsaw puzzler for the PC platform.

name: Pixel Puzzles Aardman Jigsaws: Wallace & Gromit - A Matter Of Loaf And Death
summary: Pixel Puzzles Aardman, the definitive jigsaw puzzler for the PC platform.

name: Pixel Puzzles Aardman Jigsaws: Wallace & Gromit - Vacation
summary: Pixel Puzzles Aardman, the definitive jigsaw puzzler for the PC platform.

name: Piece It!
summary: A casual jigsaw puzzle experience! Listen to awesome background music and enjoy the relaxing view and sounds of nature at the end of each puzzle!

name: Pinball Storm: Lokanta
summary: Pinball Storm:Lokanta is a RPG game combing Roguelike and pinball gameplay. You will be part of the resistance against plutocracy. Use your marble pinball to eliminate waves of enemies, and collect resources to further enhance your pinball. Save the world from hell!

name: Pinball Masters
summary: This is a version of Pinball FX exclusively for Netflix subscribers. It contains several tables that were originally released as DLC.

name: Pinbot
summary: Pinbot reimagines the timeless breakout game in an immersive 3D setting. Traditional brick formations now morph into incubators nurturing alien robots, demanding swift destruction! In this robotic realm, every element is mechanized.

name: Pilapila
summary: An indie puzzle game about rearranging blocks to reach your goal.

name: Pipes
summary: You have to find the shortest way to connect several buildings to the water system.

name: Pinball League: Hardhat Zone
summary: Pinball League: HardHat Zone is a 3D pinball game that allows players to experience this classic game in a whole new way. although the construction theme is not as glamorous as it could be and the sound effects tend to lag behind a little, the graphics are highly polished and really help to draw players into the game. the two player mode also helps to ramp up the fun factor by allowing friends to go head to head to see who has the best skills.

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws: Chihuahuas
summary: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: PicoTrains
summary: A retro-styled railway management strategy game!

name: PizzaPanic
summary: People are starving for Pizza! Become our new delivery operator. Race through the city with Nip, your trusty courier bot, and bring joy to your customers. Customize your robot and experiment with dozens of unique skills and upgrades. Bring your friends and enjoy chaos in 4 players local-multiplayer.

name: Pigeon Simulator Survival
summary: Step into the feathery shoes of a daring pigeon in the heart of a bustling park with Pigeon Simulator Survival! This one-of-a-kind game promises a whimsical and utterly entertaining adventure that's bound to tickle your funny bone and keep you coming back for more.

name: Pieces I: A Maskros Nebula Game
summary: Pieces I is a jigsaw puzzle game set in the mysterious Maskros Nebula universe. It features 3 comic-style puzzles and a calming ambient soundtrack. Get a glimpse of the cyber city of CobeeDot, visit the overgrown Nou-Raex and float through the dystopian Eskolea!

name: PixelZen
summary: PixelZen is a charming 2D pixel art game designed to provide a relaxing experience and promote players' mental well-being. In a vibrant pixel world full of soothing colors, players will explore peaceful environments and interact with captivating characters. The serene soundtrack and soothing sound effects help to create a calm and inviting atmosphere.

name: Pixel Chix
summary: Pixel Chix was a handheld life simulation game released in 2005 by Mattel that was aimed at young children. The game was set in a plastic dollhouse and was similar to Tamagotchi in that they have a LCD screen and control buttons, although they are larger. The game is centered around interacting with a digital girl and doing activities with her, which includes feeding her, playing games, dressing her up, going out, sending her to bed and more. As you played, you would unlock new items and activities.

name: Pink Noise
summary: "Pink Noise" is a visual novel in the genre of psychological horror in the retro atmosphere of the 90s. Following the tradition of "summer horror", it will tell you a unique story about several teenagers who by chance encounter unknown forces.

name: Pitta
summary: This story may change because of under development. Story is that thief robot try to steal many things. It is a chase game. You can escape from enemy with various Power up item.

name: Piroot
summary: Journey to the center of the planet in Piroot, an open world adventure! Explore and survive as a shipwreck's lonely survivor. What secrets lie at the planet's core, and can you trust the voice leading you there?

name: Pirates: Rogue's Fortune
summary: A rogue-lite action and adventure game set in the Caribbean! Explore the ocean depths in search of treasures, survive intense naval battles, and upgrade your ship to reclaim your place as the greatest pirate in a world to discover with every attempt.

name: Pixel Defender
summary: Pixel Defender is a 2D tower defense game with retro pixel aesthetics and direct character control.

name: Pinball FX: Universal Pinball - TV Classics
summary: Classic television shows from the small screen to the tips of your flipper fingers. Play three tables inspired by iconic TV shows in the Universal Pinball: TV Classics bundle pack.

name: Pineapple Defense
summary: "Pineapple Defense" is an exciting tower defense game where you defend a pineapple farm from attacks by flies and meme characters. Plant pineapples, build cannons, and battle bosses to save the harvest and become a hero of the farming world!

name: Pixel Town: Akanemachi Sideshow
summary: While on vacation on a scenic island, Fuu and her brother find themselves trapped when a magical barrier forms around the island. Now Fuu must unravel the secrets of the island to secure their escape.

name: Pirate Doom II
summary: Pirate Doom II is a 32-level partial conversion for Doom II designed for MBF-compatible source ports, created by Darch.

name: Pie in the Sky
summary: Pluck them. Pluck them all. You are an Australian Magpie on a mission. That mission: Spread havoc, cause mayhem, and grab the occasional unattended piece of food. Menace, rob, and terrify humans, enjoying old-school action arcade gameplay rendered in glorious retro PS2 graphics.

name: Pirates
summary: An arcade cabal-shooter centered around 16th century adventurers searching for lost treasure. Scour the islands of La Isabea, Papeete, and Shetland while battling against enemy pirates, tanks made of bricks, and Aztec natives.

name: Pirates and Aztecs
summary: A pirate named Lorencillo searching for the greatest treasure of all time, the lost treasure of Moctezuma. He fights the fearsome Aztecs to obtain a map and a key, but not before resisting the attacks of great Aztec warriors.

name: Pirate Lords of Love
summary: Your life in a seaside town has been peaceful but dull—until an infamous, wealthy samurai suitor approaches you one day and asks for your hand in marriage. As a wedding gift, he gives you a magnificent black pearl necklace. After your father dies of a sudden illness, distant relatives eagerly arrange the union, despite your misgivings.

name: Pimpy Da Pimp
summary: Pimpy Da Pimp just wants to pimp walk but annoying pedestrians block the sidewalk. Help him get these pedestrians out of his way in the brand new game, "Get the Fuck Out of My Way," starring Pimpy Da Pimp.

name: Pierced by Love
summary:
Your dreams are coming true! You’ve finally been accepted into the Imagawa College kyudo team alongside your childhood idol!

But behind the curtain of prestige lie dark secrets that threaten to tear the club, and your budding relationship, apart.

name: Pikmin 2 Regrown
summary: A mod for Pikmin 2 with streamlined mechanics, remixed overworlds+caves and a new boss enemy. Project lead by Rakton

name: Pine: A Story of Loss
summary: Alone in the forest glade he shared with his wife, a woodworker struggles to accept her passing. Help him hold on to cherished memories of their life together as he struggles to care for himself and his now empty home. Pine is a single-serving game focused on telling a beautiful, emotional tale.

name: Pirates Golden Quest
summary: Are you ready to become the ultimate pirate legend?

name: Pinball FX: Super League Football
summary: Guide your football team in their quest to become Super League Champions.

name: Pinball FX: Pacific Rim Pinball
summary: Go big or go extinct. Prime your senses for a neural handshake and step into the cockpit of a Jaeger. It is on you to cancel the apocalypse!

name: Pixel Paint Together
summary: A relaxing color by numbers game! Color with your friends! Lots to paint! No hidden fees!

name: Pirarucu's Money Rush
summary: From the asymmetrical party action game 'Goonya Monster' designed by Terada Tera , a spin-off work has emerged! "Pirarucu's Money Rush" is a side-scrolling shopping rampage game! At each stage checkpoint, which changes with every play, you can purchase items to gain an advantage in the game.

name: Pixel Tennis
summary: Pixel Tennis is a captivating online multiplayer tennis game crafted with love by a single indie developer. Dive into the world of fast-paced arcade style tennis, where every match is a thrilling rally. Create and customize your own character and team up with a friend or play solo against the world.

name: Pilgrim
summary:
Pilgrim is a medieval-based, co-op horror, adventure. Can you and your friends make it to the end of The Road?

Immerse yourself in the dark otherworldly horror of the medieval. A long and dangerous road awaits the chosen Pilgrims. You will journey to find out what lies at the end of the road.

Thrust from the safety of your Village, given little supplies and a powered wagon. Take yourself and your companions through a dark world to find what awaits you along this winding path.

To survive you’ll have to delve deep into crypts, unlock dimly lit dungeons, explore the derelict towns and try not to lose yourself in the twisting woodlands.

name: Picross S Namco Legendary Edition
summary: A collaboration between Picross S and the Namco LEGENDARY Series! A second character editor has been added to the Nintendo Switch version of Picross S! Namco LEGENDARY Series characters are now available as Picross puzzles.

name: Pineford: Part I
summary: Investigate the murder of Evie Roots. Save the town from disaster. Learn the history of the Great Houses. Immerse yourself in the centuries-old history of Pineford.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Moon Viewing Jump Rabbit
summary: Find the best view to enjoy your snack!

name: PixAnt Farm (Idle)
summary: This idle game allows you to simulate and grow a colony of pix-ants. You can watch as they autonomously explore the screen, eating pellets, and earning you new ant colorations and automatic feeder upgrades. You can also give the ants names, and interact with them in various ways.

name: Pin To Win
summary: "Pin To Win" is a pins-building light Rogue game that uses balls to trigger pins to produce different effects and build different powerful combinations. Please configure your pins and set off to fight!

name: Pikubo
summary: Dive into the delightful world of Pikubo, a captivating puzzle game that brings the excitement of cubic nonograms to your mobile device. With a unique twist on a beloved classic, Pikubo challenges you to carve out shapes from a larger cube by removing unnecessary blocks.

name: Pimic of Sorrow
summary: "The Magic Mirror will destroy the world... Someone has told the Ice Queen the whereabouts of the Magic Mirror." Embark on a mysterious journey to save the Magic Mirror from the Ice Queen. An RPG woven with poetic storytelling and fairy tale-style pixel art graphics.

name: Piggy One Super Spark
summary: PIGGY ONE SUPER SPARK is a single-player action game starring Xiamy, Yuez, and a lost newborn baby they happen to find. Follow the trio in their chaotic but heart-warming adventure!

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate Jigsaw: Mini Beasts
summary: Pixel Puzzles, The Number #1 place for Jigsaws!

name: Pixel Puzzles The Musical: Chaosbay - Jigsaw Pack
summary: Pixel Puzzles Musical, listen to your favorite bands as you puzzle.

name: Pixel Puzzles The Musical: HCK9 - Jigsaw Pack
summary: Pixel Puzzles Musical, listen to your favorite bands as you puzzle.

name: Pixel Puzzles The Musical: The Nearly Deads - Jigsaw Pack
summary: Pixel Puzzles Musical, listen to your favorite bands as you puzzle.

name: Pixel Puzzles The Musical
summary: Pixel Puzzles Musical, listen to your favorite bands as you puzzle.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Jigsaw - Variety Pack 4XS
summary: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Jigsaw - Variety Pack 21
summary: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Variety Pack 8
summary: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Egypt
summary: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Occult
Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Deadswitch 3
summary: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Pizza Boy
summary:
A thief has stolen the pizza present! Oh no! You are forced to chase it through levels filled with threats and dangers but to your advantage you can throw bottles of soda. Watch out for evil birds and furious dogs while you collect pizza slices and strawberries in a yummy mix. And don’t forget to keep an eye out for lost kittens on your way ahead. In miraculous surroundings Pizza Boy is a true retro game sensation.
Hurry and get it back before it runs cold!

name: Pixelitos: Spritle Royale
summary: A creature-collecting teambuilding autobattler with over 130 unique elemental creatures to collect and battle with! Assemble a team of Pixelitos to face opponents in 6v6 auto battles. Face off in online asynchronous multiplayer, online versus with friends, or in the single-player campaign.

name: Pizz'Amore
summary: You play as either Mario or Maria, the owner and lone chef of the famous New York Pizzeria “Pizz’Amore” who is suddenly and cruelly dumped! Unable to cope with the heartbreak, you decide that you will make the perfect pizza to heal your wounded heart!

name: Pipsqueak!
summary:
Explore a strange and hostile world in this search-action platformer starring a tiny mouse named Tofu.

Pipsqueak! is a search-action platformer starring Tofu, a small mouse exploring a strange and hostile world. Uncover the truth of this expansive world and your place within it through exploration, discovery, combat, and platforming challenges. Bring hope to this dying world and its tiny inhabitants in this grand adventure of mouse-sized proportions!

name: Pinball M: Texas Chainsaw Massacre Pinball
summary: Put on the mask and rev the chainsaw - Leatherface returns to slaughter in pinball form! Aim your shots and use all your skills to take out your victims in one of the most brutal pinball tables ever created.

name: Pirate's Money
summary: Welcome to Pirate's Money, the ultimate adventure on the seven seas, where strategy, courage and cunning determine who will reign over the treacherous waters of Pirate's Island! Your legend begins now. Raise the sails, load the cannons and win BIG in Pirate's Money.

name: Pixel Playground
summary: A little box of pixels I made specially for you :)

name: Pixel Quest: Lost Relics
summary: Join Eva and Pobextil in their journey in this pixel platformer adventure!

name: Pickup Point Simulator
summary: Become an entrepreneur and develop your retail outlet. Order goods and place them in the warehouse, give orders to customers by scanning QR-code, design and expand your premises, hire employees and learn new skills!

name: Pixel Hunt
summary: Use unique cursors to find and fix simulated defective pixels on your desktop in this relaxing hidden object game. Enjoy multiple singleplayer modes and online multiplayer with friends, exploring others' desktops or inviting them to yours. Become a pixel hunter!

name: Pitfall Protocol
summary: Navigate an underground warehouse, approve special items, and eliminate anomalies over a tense 7-day contract or face termination.

name: Piano: Learn and Play - Ultra Special
Piano: Learn and Play - Ultra Premium
Pixel Golf Club
summary: Pixel Golf Club is an arcade pixel golf game that lets you unwind in a delightful world of grand golfing greens. Unleash your potential, aiming for precision and speed across endless lush landscapes.

name: Pin Zhi
summary: Meet Pin Zhi, Bhutan's journey towards the game industry. Pin Zhi tells the story about 7 individuals who wants to show the world the beauty of Bhutan. Join Pema, a young, brave and compassionate individual in a journey to recover the lost magical harmonious friends.

name: Pizza Ready!
summary:
Introducing Pizza Ready, the ultimate pizza restaurant simulation game!
Are you ready to become the master of your own pizza empire? This pizzeria game will immerse you in the world of a pizza shop and teach you everything about running a pizza business, from cooking and serving to cleaning and even managing staff!

Run your own Pizza Restaurant!
As the boss of a pizza restaurant, you'll be responsible for everything from making and serving pizzas to managing store and hiring

name: Pizza Delivery: A Short Thriller
summary: A horror/thriller about what may happen when delivering a pizza late at night.

name: Pizza Quest
summary: Join the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles in their quest to defeat evil and eat pizza. In Nickelodeon's free and fun online action game, you can play as Michelangelo, Raphael, Donatello and Leonardo and take down baddies in the mean streets of New York City. It's up to you to use the Turtles' special abilities to save the world from enemies like the Kraang, the Foot Clan and more. Take on multiple bosses at once to beat the game! Play Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Pizza Quest and other free online quizzes and games now at Nick.com.

name: Pixel World: Unity-Chan!
summary: This is an action game to reclaim the lost colors of creatures.

name: Picterra
summary: Explore a colourful world full of interesting flora and fauna to document with your camera and notebook

name: Pillow Fight
summary: A short, free deckbuilding game where you count sheep in order to defeat different "enemies" of sleep and learn some real sleep tips along the way!

name: Pikes.io
summary:
Ride your horse and get your spear ready. It's time to join a jousting tournament! Challenge other brave knights in this classic and win the ladies' favors.
Join thousands of players in Pikes.io! Collect rainbow dots while trying to defeat your enemies. Control a knight with a pike or a spear and attack your enemies -- you can defeat them with a single blow, so move as fast as possible! The more dots you collect, the faster you become, and the bigger your pike... Can you take over this arena?

name: Pigebomb
summary: Imagine a world similar to ours, where various animals are the dominant beings. It is in this place that we follow the story of Peck, the top operative of P.O.W.E.R., a worldwide agency that is fighting the nefarious plans of P.E.S.T. This independent terrorist group plans to bring chaos to society. The two groups are vying to take over a superweapon, the eggbomb. Peck's mission is to prevent the PEST agents from obtaining this new weapon, in a story full of references to classic spy films.

name: Pizzapocalypse
summary: Pizzapocalypse is a cartoony 3D platformer where pizza is key to your movement. Dash, Bounce and Stomp your way to your loyal customers!

name: Pikmin: Olimar's Descent
summary: Olimar has crashed his ship on an unknown planet during a space voyage! Will he be able to recover his ship parts and escape back into space?

name: Pixel Gun World
summary: Pixel Gun World is a free multiplayer shooter. Play with your friends, classmates, fellow students and colleagues! Fight against other players in PvP mode and try to survive in the Arena mode! Buy and improve your armor and weapons! Become one of the best pro players of Pixel Gun World!

name: Pixel With Your Friends
summary: Pixel With Your Friends is a color-by-numbers game where you have to restore artworks pixel by pixel for a museum. You can color the artworks alone or together with a friend online.

name: Pixelite
summary: Pixelite is a 2d MMORPG free to play game.

name: Pinball FX: Charity Pack
summary: Your purchase of Epic Quest and Excalibur brings joy to those in need & helps preserve pinball culture. Join Max the knight in championing charity!

name: Pirate Year Thousand: The Kraken Piece
summary: Join Carter in an epic pirate visual novel where he will meet brave friends and together they will embark on an exciting search for treasure and adventure like no other.

name: Pigeon Sim: Bird Simulator - Lady Pigeon DLC
Pixel Race Maker
summary: Create your own unique levels or simply play one of our user crreated levels to earn badges and achievements.

name: Picassio
summary: A non-violent stealth / thief game which was in development by Promethean Designs, and would’ve been about an art thief. The game was scrapped due to the developers entering bankruptcy and being unable to find a publisher.

name: Pirate Hunter: Somali Trap
summary: In the middle of the South Pacific: modern pirates are making the waterways that are so important for international trade unsafe. In order to deal with this ever-growing threat, a mercenary group called The Pilgrims appears on the scene, earning their money with protection missions...

name: Pintaris
summary: Pintaris is a multiplayer competitive puzzle game that you can draw different blocks with various paint tool to clear lines and get scores.

name: Pirate Combat Trainer
summary: You command a small sailing vessel. Take on endless waves of enemy pirate ships as you battle to keep your ship alive. Maintain a tactical advantage as you attempt to survive on the high seas. Destroy as many ships as you can to achieve a highscore to prove your naval aptitude.

name: PinDrop
summary: In Pin Drop, players explore a dark world to find the true door. The journey is full of tension as they move through creepy settings while avoiding danger. Random objects can spawn and create noises, which can wake up zombies.

name: Pigeon Simulator: Bird Simulator - Premium Edition
Pinko Linko's School
summary:
Pinko Linko's School is a game I dug up not too long ago when I was visiting my grandparents. I found it while searching for some old tennis equipment in there storage. The box indicated that it was made in 1998, and yes, you can truly see that it is from that era. The first Doom game also came out in 1998, so this must have been some kind of kids-learning-toy-doom-clone. Anyway, I got it running and managed to rip the files, so here they are!

Side note: I rebinded all the keys from being the arrow keys to wasd, also there were some things in the game that were kind of [REDACTED], but that might have just been me. When you are done with the game you can take a look in the YouWon folder, I left [REDACTED] in there,

name: Pirates of the Caribbean: New Horizons
Pixel Fish
summary: An eater with action roguelite elements. Swim around a hostile sea while you avoid dangers and eat fish to gain experience and grow. Play as one of twelve unlockable characters, each with different traits. Earn evolution points to upgrade your stats, allowing you to eat ever-larger fish.

name: Pillow Pinky
summary: Pillow Pinky is a 2D collectathon inspired by classic N64 collectathons like DK64 and Banjo

name: Pinball Hero
summary: In this game the pinball IS the hero! Ascend from the Goblin Caves, to the Perilous Plains and defeat the evil wizard in the Hallowed Castle to reclaim your adventurer spirit! Battle slimes, skeletons, goblins, ghouls, and other fantasy creatures in the retro-inspired reimagining of Pinball.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series NyanxTech
summary: Simple character control + stage gimmicks to be unlocked at the same time. This is a finger-tip confusing action puzzle. Challenge yourself with numerous difficult puzzles!

name: Pig Rush
summary: "Pig Rush" is a maze adventure game set in a deep forest. In this game, you guide a brave little wild boar named Argan. Argan will evade traps, defeat enemies, and keep moving forward to find the answers needed to save his tribe.

name: Pineapple
summary: Click the Pineapple and collect them all!

name: Pizza Hub
summary: Pizza Hub  is a fun clicker game where you create unique pizzas and meet friends in a lively multiplayer adventure!  Earn money by being in the hub and buy special pizzas from our chefs.  Join us on Discord to create pizzas, enjoy the pizza disco, and build a pizza paradise!

name: Pigeon
summary: Pigeon is an action adventure in the original universe. Immerse yourself in a deep and interesting story. Playing as Richard, set out to save the village from the hordes of creatures that have been trapped for centuries in the bowels of the earth.

name: Pixel Restorer
summary: A retro pixel-style casual game where your task is to restore all the missing pixel images in the machine.

name: Pixel Retro Drift: Arcade Car Racing
