summary: Rediscover the golden era of arcade games, feel the adrenaline and joy of high-speed 80s racing!

name: PirateWar
summary: piratewar is an fps/tps game. Kill your enemies and win.

name: Pixel Collector
summary: Collect Pixelart items! Get 1-4 tickets every 2 hours to spin the lucky wheel. Win pixelart items or higher rarity tickets! All items appear in your Steam inventory and are tradable/marketable, making it easier to complete your collections.

name: Pikmin 2: New Year
summary: Pikmin 2: New Year is a Pikmin 2 ROM hack that was created by AmigaOwl, with the help of a development team, and was released on July 25th, 2021 to commemorate the twenty-year anniversary of Pikmin 1's release. The game has much of the same content as Pikmin 2, but features new music, areas, caves, cave themes, Challenge Mode stages, new or reskinned enemies, and one reskinned plant. Additionally, every treasure from Pikmin 2 appears in Pikmin 2: New Year.

name: Pickup Trash Simulator Remastered
summary: Pickup Trash Simulator Remastered Is A Game About Picking Up Trash In A Park Because You Love The Environment. Picking Up Trash Is Fun For All Ages Kids And Adults Alike So Pickup Some Trash And Have Fun.

name: Pixel Puzzles 3: Ukiyo-e Jigsaws
summary: Pixel Puzzles, the very best in the world of digital jigsaws.

name: Pixel Pixie
summary: A Vorpal Knight with twisted ambitions has kidnapped the last Pixies to drain their power! Replace your weak starting party with stronger heroes, find useful items and game-changing relics, and assemble a formidable rescue team in this roguelike auto-battler, a love letter to the 8-bit RPGs of yore.

name: Piece Shogi
summary: A turn-based strategy game with unique rules added to Shogi. New and various strategies are created by the special effect pieces.

name: Pinball Power
summary:
Medieval pinball action with lots of tables and lots of power-ups.

Work your way through the dark ages, win battles and complete quests using just your pinball skills. Collect new power-ups and weapons as you go

Features:

First person perspective.
2D graphics
Cartoon graphics
Medieval Fantasy theme.

name: Pikmin 2 WorldWide
summary: Pikmin 2 Worldwide is a Pikmin 2 ROM hack made by NintendoClubber, also known as KingCluber, together with a dedicated development team. It will be playable on computers and Nintendo GameCube. The hack was first revealed in a teaser trailer on August 9th, 2023. It provides a full-game experience with custom areas, caves, treasures, and more.

name: Pikmin²
summary: Play through a full recreation of the original Pikmin game in the engine of it's sequel, along with a whole randomizer, a whole second story featuring Louie, and much more! Fully playable alone or with a friend!

name: Pikmin 1x3
summary: Pikmin 1x3: A demo of my latest hack for Pikmin 3 Deluxe that contains 2 levels in Mission Mode, Collect Treasures : Impact Site, Forest of Hope, Forest Navel and Distant Spring, with fully HD assets and (somewhat) faithful level layouts of Pikmin 1.

name: Pixeplorer
summary: Explore an infinite amount of pixelated worlds in this adventure sandbox game, and find villages, enemy camps, and quests along your journey!

name: Pizza Clicker
summary: PIZZA CLICKER. You get dropped a pizza every 2 hours 5 times per day. Your chance to try every kind of pizza in the world and share it with friends!

name: Pickle
summary: Its a Pickle clicker game... Simple as that

name: Pickle
summary: Pickle is a clicker game, click to win new styles of pickles! Let's start clicking!

name: Pip My Dice
summary: Pip My Dice is a Yahtzee Roguelike experience. Score enough to make it to the next round, customize your dice to score more and collect relics to create game-breaking combos. Climb the leaderboards and enjoy a different run every time!

name: Pipelurker
summary:
Inspired by Abe's odyssey, Prince of persia and other classic of the genre, Pipelurker is a stealth platforming game where a prolonged contact with light will kill your character. Thread carefully, avoid direct confrontation and reclaim your treasure.

Made in 5 days for the first 1 Bit Jam.

name: Pizzeria
summary: Click to eat delicious pizzas, buy powerful upgrades, and become the ultimate pizza master. Seek out exclusive drops to make your collection unique. Can you get them all? Start clicking now and rise to pizza greatness!

name: Piglet's Big Game
summary: Point-and-click adventure game loosely based off the 2003 film Piglet's Big Movie, where the main objective is for Piglet to collect all the ingredients for a soup in the Hundred-Acre Wood's annual Very Large Soup Party.

name: Picture Perfect
summary: Find the perfect shot in this cozy puzzle game about forced perspective.

name: Pinochestein 3D
summary: First-Person Shooter based off a standalone version of the Zandronum engine.

name: Pinball Mania Plus
summary:
A remake of Pinball Mania which updates the 2D original tables into 3D.

The tables are:
- Daredevil
- Kick-off
- Jackpot
- Jailbreak
- Tarantula
- The Visitors

name: Pico Park 2
summary: PICO PARK is back with all new levels! Play with 2-8 players locally or online in this co-op action-puzzle game!

name: Pixel Boy 2: The Castle Revenge
summary:
Pixel Boy 2 is a continuation of the logic game, where you will find 96 completely new and difficult levels. The goal of the game is still the same. Move the red box to the goal field. This time it won't be so easy.

Creative thinking and problem solving is more than necessary to solve all levels. But do not worry! If you get stuck, you can always use the golden crown to skip a level.

Enjoy the new levels with new graphics and try to finish them all successfully without losing your crowns.

name: Pillaged Village: Humbled by Savages
summary: Uh-oh, those marauding barbarians are back, banging on the village gates! It’s high time you bore arms and showed those savages who’s boss... After all, not one but TWO childhood sweethearts are counting on you to save the day—godspeed, soldier!

name: Piper
summary: A Western take on the story of the Pied Piper of Hamelin, starring Jason David Frank (of Power Rangers fame) as the titular Piper in the town of Midas Valley.

name: Pileup
summary: In PILEUP you play as a green square that is trying to rise up by substituting gray squares underneath it. Since reaching the top of the green square will end the game, you must prevent it from rising. Pink rectangles will fall from above and destroy all the blocks in their path, including you. Dodge them to live as long as possible and earn more points.

name: Pipkin
summary: Explore a magical and spooky world, capture wild Pipkin, and fight alongside them, as you uncover a series of mysterious events happening around New Haven...

name: Pin Strike
summary: Bowling can be played not only in the hall and only on a straight track. And who says you can't use bombs or springs in the game?

name: Pixicharm: Fit Frog's Feast
summary: Help a lively frog collect tasty fruits while avoiding hazards. Use simple left and right controls to gather nutritious treats and enjoy a fun, stress-free experience with no lives to lose or defeats to worry about!

name: Pixel Pop
summary: Chop melons, smash the military and make animal noises to the beat!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: The Willow Man
summary: Beware The Willow Man as he lurks throughout the halls, in your dreams, and into your soul. Can you survive the night in this horror adventure.

name: Pinball FX: Goat Simulator Pinball
summary: Get ready to experience the wildest pin-baaa-ll game, inspired by the absurdity of Goat Simulator 3! From headbutting bumpers to launching yourself through loops, every move you make will leave a trail of chaos behind.

name: Pinball FX: The Princess Bride Pinball
summary: The Princess Bride Pinball - Not just your basic, average, every day, ordinary, run-of-the-mill, ho-hum pinball table. Jump into a world of treachery, peril, revenge... and a bit of kissing.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean Multiplayer
summary:
Pirates of the Caribbean Multiplayer is a massively multiplayer mobile game based on the series of films and the Disney theme park attraction of the same name.

The game starts you off as an inexperienced captain of a pirate ship with no reputation, no gold and minimal knowledge of the seas around you. But don't despair, Mate! Build up your infamy score by creating alliances with other players, fighting fierce battles and embarking on all manner of adventure and exploration. You'll soon be one of the most feared pirates of the Caribbean!

name: Ping Pong Clásico en 2DD
summary: Welcome to Classic 2D Ping Pong! This simple and addictive game will let you relive the nostalgia of arcade games with a simplified version of the classic Pong. Whether you want to compete against a friend or hone your skills, this game is perfect for a good time.

name: Pingcheng Chronicles
summary: Pingcheng Chronicles: Pioneering the ARPG Genre with Chinese-Style Battle Royale and Entwined Partnerships[

name: Pillow Legends and The Last Nugget
summary: A platformer in which you can spend time alone or with friends.

name: Picture Perfect Golf
summary: The Windows port of Picture Perfect Golf features re-done main menu, incorporating standard windows layout, and also updating the in-game UI.

name: Pirofauna
summary: Burn, little Flame, burn... Light up the misty forest, dispel the darkness... Let tiny bugs emerge from the nooks and crannies, gazing at your spark.

name: Pia
summary: "You have stepped on a landmine. How will you handle it?" This game challenges you to disarm a landmine using a multi-key input system, simulating the tough situation. By aligning the character's situation with the player's actions, it offers a unique experience. Using a pedal controller enhances the realism. Can you successfully disarm the landmine and survive?

name: Pickle Pop
summary: Pop the bubbles before they hit the ground. Complete five rounds to win!

name: Pig Pile
summary: Eliminate the objects in the pile to safely land the pig on the platform.

name: Pixadom
summary: Pixadom is a cozy 2D top-down social MMORPG with a charming pixel art style, playable directly in your browser on any modern device. Set in a vibrant world designed for social interaction, Pixadom blends the nostalgia of classic games with a fresh, community-driven experience. Players can enjoy a variety of activities, explore a richly detailed world, and participate in regular events. With a focus on community and creativity, Pixadom offers a unique, engaging multiplayer adventure that evolves through weekly updates and player-driven content.

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number
summary: Relax and create beautiful pixel art with color-by-number and cross-stitch fun!

name: Picross Records of The Shield Hero
summary:
Picross is a beloved picture crossword puzzle game where players follow hint numbers to complete a picture. Fans of The Rising of the Shield Hero and Picross enthusiasts alike will find plenty to enjoy in this collaborative offering.

The Rising of the Shield Hero anime series is now available as a puzzle game! Picross and The Rising of the Shield Hero anime series are collaborating to bring fans an exciting new experience. The game features an Episode mode that allows you to relive the adventures of Naofumi, Raphtalia, Filo, and their friends while solving puzzles. In addition to the classic Picross, Mega Picross, and Color Picross from the Picross S series, the game also introduces Clip Picross and Extra modes that recreate famous scenes from the anime using large puzzles. The total number of puzzles is impressive, with 166 each for Picross and Mega Picross, four for Clip Picross, and more than 40 piece puzzles each for a total of 175 puzzles, 47 puzzles for Color Picross, and eight for Extra.

name: Pizza Western
summary: The Death King wandered the Wild West until he found a lone bar in the desert. After ordering a pizza, a stranger entered and dared to steal it. Without hesitation, the Death King pursued, ready to destroy anything in his way—bandits, zombies, or worse.

name: Piworld
summary: First pixel 2D game, which include MMO and PVP system for anyone, who wants to try something new.

name: PixelQuest: Herb's Adventure
summary: A classic, story-driven JRPG with a modern dice-building combat system.

name: Pingolf
summary: Each year the best golfers in the galaxy show up to compete at the ufo invitational.

name: Pilot Quest
summary:
The Campanella has crashed! Fix it by harvesting resources and exploring the Wild Zone.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Pieces of Me
summary: Pieces of me is a psychological thriller drama in the genre of "walking simulator", which is a spin-off to the game "September 7th"

name: Pinevale Settlements
summary: Build and manage your own thriving colony in this engaging simulator. Balance resource management, strategic planning, and crafting to grow your settlement from the ground up. Perfect your strategy and watch your colony flourish!

name: Pizza Delivery in a Storm
summary: A motorbike action game where you deliver pizzas in a storm

name: Pilot Light
summary: Navigate through pitch-dark caverns with only the light of the rocket engine as you journey to the center of the universe.

name: Pixel Arcade
summary: Portal into neon cyberspace in Pixel Arcade. Defy gravity, optimize your strategy, and vault through adrenaline-packed levels. Achieve global dominance in the leaderboard to become a VR champion in the ultimate test of precision and agility.

name: Pixelmancy
summary: Pixelmancy is a bullet heaven action-roguelite where you play as a wizard battling demon hordes. Unlock legendary staves and tomes, upgrade your spell and character strength, and survive waves of enemies. Face minibosses, complete events, and grow stronger with every battle!

name: Pinball
summary: Pinball recreates a pinball table where the aim is to keep hitting a ball to score as many points as you can with two flippers. The table is equipped with bumpers and letters spelling TIMEX, as well as two lanes that when entered give bonus points. There are also two outside lanes that when entered lose the ball and if the ball also passes the flippers then you lose one of five lives.

name: Pixels for Christmas
summary: It's almost Christmas, so get all the golden pixels using the cursor keys!

name: Pit of Gerstan
summary: Pit of Gerstan is a roguelite dungeon-massacring action game. Hack, slash, throw and blast your way through hordes of enemies and bosses, as you collect various items, upgrades and weapons to create the ultimate dungeon-clearing hero.

name: PizzaBoy
summary:
Take control of PizzaBoy, a nimble pizza delivery guy equipped with an air dash that allows him to bounce off walls. This can be used to reach greater heights and distances than the standard run and jump. PizzaBoy must navigate dangerous environments to deliver pizzas to hungry monsters.

Pizzaboy must make it to the end of the level to deliver the pizza but don't expect it to be too simple, as each area is full of pizza-hungry monsters. Don't get too close or they might just steal a slice! The customer won't be happy with a half-eaten pizza.

The path to the customer won't always be straightforward either. Every level is a Metroidvania-style map, with many secrets, collectibles, and areas to explore. Alongside delivering pizzas, PizzaBoy may find opportunities to recover his lost memories and discover the dark secrets of the company he works for. The player's choice in how they tackle the level will determine the ending of each chapter, and ultimately the end of the game.

If the customer is satisfied with your performance, you might just get a 5-star review.

name: Pizza Boy Z
summary: Pizza Boy Z is 3D runner game, where you play for ordinary pizza delivery person who has become an unusual hero.

name: Piggly Pagly Boom
summary: Can you master this red-hot fireball platform shooting game? Save the world or get turned into roasted ham!

name: Pizza Delivery Survivors
summary: Experience the thrill of pizza delivery in a zombie apocalypse! "Pizza Delivery Survivors" combines survival, strategy, and fast-paced action. Deliver pizzas, outsmart the undead, and turn everyday items into weapons to fight for survival.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Chrotopia
summary:
A world where only black and white exist.
“Chro”searches for his sister in various places.

name: Pix'Hard
summary: "Fight off endless hordes of enemies with your ship! Upgrade it to defeat increasingly powerful opponents! Choose your upgrades carefully, manage your priorities, and find your enemies' weak points!"

name: Pirates Outlaws 2: Heritage
summary: Pirates Outlaws 2 is a swashbuckling roguelike deckbuilder. Collect & fuse cards, gather powerful relics and adapt your strategy during each run. Become a reputed pirate, loot the Sea Masters, challenge giant creatures and triumph in the great Arena!

name: Pizza Rush Race: Fighting Boss
summary:
Pizza boss - Peppino is very angry, rushing to fight with Tomato but encountering a maze of trouble, are you smart enough to solve this situation?

In the Pizza Town Race, you need to help Pepperman, Peppino... find Tomata of the same color in the shortest time, before the Pizza boss's anger erupts. Challenges, obstacles, obstacles will constantly appear to challenge your imagination and puzzle ability.

name: Pizza Tower: Idle Tycoon
summary:
Pizza Tower is an exciting simulation game! In Pizza Tower, you can make pizzas, sell them, and earn money to build the pizza tower with new floors. You can also attract customers by offering other foods such as cola, nuggets, and french fries.

Have fun with Pizza Tower and work to build the tallest tower!

name: Pippa Funnell 4: Secrets of the Ranch
Pinpoint
summary:
Guess the category.

There are 5 clues hidden on the board. All 5 clues belong to a common category. Your objective is to guess the category in as few clue reveals as possible. Each incorrect guess you make will reveal the next clue.

name: Pick Me Pick Me
summary: "Pick Me Pick Me" is an innovative 2-player online game that brings the chaos and hilarity of dating to the virtual world. Step into the Battlefield of Love, where you'll compete to use your creative ideas to have an engaging conversation with different characters powered by AI, showing your stylish outfits and taste, and placing strategic skill cards to win over your virtual partner and outshine your opponent.

name: Pit of Goblin
summary: In this online horror co-op, you play as a scrappy goblin, scavenging dungeons, dodging traps, and fleeing monsters to feed the Goblin King. Team up with goblin pals, or go rogue, as you dive deep and cause chaos! Fail to feed him, and you might be the next meal!

name: Pinball M: Camp Bloodbrook
summary: Welcome to Camp Bloodbrook where campfire stories become a reality. Use every ounce of your pinball skills to escape the grip of Jacob Wells, The ‘Wellbound'. A slasher classic swooping you back to the 80s.

name: Pina Colada 2
summary: Pina Colada 2 is a set of 27 MBF21 maps for Doom 2. These maps use the same gimmicks from the first set: a 75 monster limit in maps that are short, dense, and interconnected.

name: PiMon
summary: PiMon are virtual pets that live right on your PC! Take care of your PiMon while you do your daily tasks. Train them, update them into new forms, raise PiMon together or battle with your friends. Or do none of that and raise your PiMon your way! Welcome Admin, what kind of PiMon will you raise?

name: Pinchimono: The Videogame
summary: Follow Pinchimono's story, where you will have to help him get his precious pizza.

name: Pic-Me!
summary: Test how well you know your fellow players and how creative you can be! In this turn-based card game, the goal is to find the perfect word to describe one of the images on your cards—not too easy, but not too difficult either. If your description isn't good enough, your opponents will have a chance to steal points with a better-fitting card. But if your description is too obvious, everyone scores points—except you! Only those who strike the perfect balance have a chance to win!

name: Pippa and Your Phantasmal Problem
summary:
Ms Ester's beautiful and neat house has been mysteriously wrecked in the past few weeks and nobody knows why. Patches of dirt on the carpet, things gone missing, and all sorts of mess keeps happening around the house. The police was called to investigate, a priest was invited to bless the house, and a group of ghostbusters was hired (they were so expensive!) and none of them found anything. How useless!

If this problem isn't solved by the time Ms Ester returns from her short trip, she'll kick you out. You have to find someone who can help: anyone will do, even this unreliable looking, self-proclaimed witch you just randomly met.

name: Pixel Gun 3D: Deadly Toys Set
summary: The Deadly Toys Set DLC brings you a trio of playful yet potent plastic-themed weapons. Features: Plastic Overseer, Plastic Instigator, Plastic Storm.

name: Pixel Gun 3D: Wastelands Set
summary: Prepare for the ultimate survival experience with the Wastelands Set DLC! In this set, you'll find: Wastelands Dual Anger, Wastelands Brutal Thinner, Wastelands Fatal Melter.

name: Pirates Kingdom
summary: Arr, matey! Here be pirates! Prepare to set sail across the vast and ocean, searching for lost treasure and secret islands. Build new civilizations in uncharted territories and play exciting hidden object games to find treasure chests full of gold, gems and precious loot. All this and more in Pirates Kingdom!

name: Pickup 'N' Packup!
summary: Pickup 'N' Packup! is a virtual reality puzzle game about putting objects around your house in their proper places. You don't have all day to clean up the place, so do your best to form the most efficient and quickest way to pick up everything and pack it up!

name: Pipo Dream Friend
summary: Problems with dreaming? Get Pipo Dream Friend!! Now you can enter your dreams and play with them! Pipo has the ability to make you lucid in the dream world. Released as a ROM for the Game Boy.

name: Pirate Escape
summary: Pirate Escape is a top-down arena shooter roguelite where you are the captain of you own pirate ship as you raid merchant ships and fight against the navy. Choose from a variety of crew members and items to create unique builds and survive until you reach Tortuga.

name: Pick My Heart Chapter 2
summary: Discover the continuation of Sota's unusual love story in a world where mythology encounters reality.

name: Pick My Heart Chapter 1
summary: Fall in love… with a goddess? Uncover their secrets and follow your heart!

name: Pirates of Gensokyo
summary: Marisa rounds up a most unlikely crew, in search of adventure, and of course, treasure! Interpersonal conflict ensues among the crew, but in the end, their stark differences bring clarity to their personal lives. The real treasure is the one you find within yourself!

name: Piece by Piece
summary: It's time to open shop! Inherit your family's repair shop, and roll up your sleeves. Fix up the prized possessions of the forest folk, paint yourself a masterpiece to sell and make your family shop all your own with decorations, furniture and cookies!

name: Pinbleton Park
summary: Pinbleton Park is a small open world cosy adventure game where the whole world can transform into a giant pinball table. Help the villagers, rescue lost spirits, craft new pinball elements, and take down the corporation bent on destroying the forest!

name: Pika Game 64
summary: An interactive dreamy diary built using the Celeste 64 engine!

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Volume 8
summary: This dlc contains 3 classic tables: Banzai Run, Black Knight 2000, and Earthshaker.

name: Pinball FX3: Carnivals and Legends Demo
Pizza Maker
summary: Become a pizzeria owner

name: Pink Takes Shape
summary: Pink Takes Shape is a queer metroidvania about exploration and changing shape. Start as a pink blob that can only move and jump. Learn to morph and gain abilities to explore the strange, dark world. Savor the textless environmental storytelling. Decipher what it means to be there, to be you.

name: Pixel Frenzy
summary: Pixel Frenzy is a fast-paced first-person shooter game where you create your own combat style in fully destructible environments. Defeat the pixel monsters invading the real world. Grab your weapon and save the world by destroying everything in your path!

name: Pissed Off: Peeing Simulator
summary: Another job simulator at the top of Steam, seriously? Piss on work and a bunch of dumbass simulators in this game!

name: Pirate Cove Simulator
summary: Pirate Cove Simulator will have you run a shop and tavern on the Island of the Damned, to get rich and buy your way out of the pirate afterlife. Trade with restless undead pirates, run your own distillery and turn local plants into potent drinks, search for hidden treasures, or just go fishing.

name: Pizza Simulator Together
summary: Pizza Simulator is a cooperative simulator where you manage a pizzeria, set up the kitchen, hire staff, prepare and deliver orders, and maintain the reputation and cleanliness of your establishment. Create your dream pizzeria!

name: Pixel Dungeon RPG
summary: Dive into procedurally generated dungeons filled with hidden treasures, cunning traps, and fierce monsters. Customize your hero with a vast array of weapons, armor, and magical items. Engage in strategic turn-based combat, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover the rich lore of the dungeon. Face formidable bosses and adopt loyal pets to aid you in battle.

name: Pinball
summary: Pinball is a digital pinball game for the PSP that takes unique advantage of the handheld unit's 16:9 screen. Players are required to rotate the system such that the 16:9 screen becomes a vertical playing field, just like a real pinball machine's dimensions! Developer Hudson Soft has worked to recreate the feel of playing real pinball, right down to sounds recorded from a real pinball game - but they also make sure to add digital effects that only a gaming machine can handle. bit sounds that were recorded from a real pinball game, but adds digital effects that only a videogame system can achieve. There's also single-cart multiplayer, meaning you can play Pinball with your friends, but you only need one UMD to share the game between your PSPs!

name: Pigillionaire
summary: Play as a cute piggybank and travel around the world while getting rich in Pigllionaire. Avoid obstacles such as the Electric Shock or the Net Trap and increase your profit by catching power ups like the Spring Break. Take six different routes and unlock secrets in the adventure mode playing more than 50 levels. Or you can test your wits in 28 puzzle levels. Pigllionaire is sure fun!

name: Pio
summary: Prove your strength in the world of stars and become the brightest one of all! PIO faces trials to show his light and challenges himself to become the most radiant star.

name: PianoVision
summary: Become a PianoVisionary with the world's premiere VR Music Teacher. PianoVision accelerates your piano learning using Mixed Reality and hand tracking. Connect a MIDI keyboard or play on a flat surface with the Virtual Piano!

name: Pixel Duel
summary: Unlicensed mobile RPG gacha game, about collecting anime characters and assembling a team of 5 fighters to take on a multitude of game modes.

name: Pickleball
summary: Experience cutting dinks, outrageous rallies and pickup games with AI Bots and friends. State-of-the-art configurable custom physics, makes VR Pickleball feel like the real thing. Use your real-life forehand, backhand, volleys and dinks - analyze shots in Instant Replay.

name: PicoMix By NuSan
summary:
PicoMix by NuSan features games made by creator NuSan over a 8 years period of time. It’s a compilation of works in multiple genres, like platform, puzzle, crafting, or base building for a total of about 20 fun games and experiments, some will provide hours of interesting challenges while others can be completed in a few minutes.

All of the games were made using “fantasy console” Pico 8 with its recognizable 16-color palette, crunchy sweet 128x128 resolution pixel art and 4-channel chiptune

Thanks to the use of Zepto 8 emulator, an optional wide mode is included in some of the games to go beyond Pico 8’s usual square screen, as well as visual filters to tweak your experience (scanlines, CRT, toon, minit...)

name: Pizza Tower: Chef's Kiss
summary: Pizza Tower: Chef's Kiss is a modification to Pizza Tower aiming to bring several additions to the game, including new characters and levels. The goal is to bring an authentic DLC feeling to the mod.

name: Piyo Puzz: Piyokoro x Puzzle
summary:
Piyokoro returns as a Puzzle Game!
Connect pieces by Color and Shape!
Play solo or with up to four players!

name: Pixel House: Color by Number
summary: The dream home starts here: paint, listen, relax.

name: Piano: Learn and Play - Ultra GOTY Edition
Piano: Learn and Play - Ultra Happy Edition
Piano: Learn and Play - Ultra Director's Cut
Pico Pico Dungeon!
summary: A turn-based roguelike RPG that's easy to pick up and play! Casual yet challenging! Strategic depth is preserved! In addition to roguelike stages, there are over 20 diverse stages, including puzzles and tower defense!

name: Pirates Never Die
summary: Pirates Never Die is a third-person horror zombie game set in a chilling, atmospheric world where players must uncover the mysteries of a cursed island. Play as Deacon, a young pirate in search for his brother after rumors of his disappearance. Faced with a new reality the fight for survival begins.

name: Piczle Cross: Rune Factory
summary: Experience the character, monsters and world of the Rune Factory series through nonogram logic-puzzles.

name: Pico Drift
summary: Explore the city as your ultimate drifting arena. Dodge traffic, outsmart the cops, and challenge your friends. Experience official campaign tracks and game modes, or create your own playgrounds. This is your world - drive it your way

name: Piñata Puppy World
summary: Piñata Puppy World is a 2000’s nostalgia driven explorative campaign game with a dramatic and surreal storyline disguised within the genre of “Mascot Horror”.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Lunlun Super Hero Babies Plus NewGames
summary:
Three games in one! Volume up!
A compilation of Super Baby LUNLUN's action
! A super bargain edition!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Timothy and the Tower of Mu
summary: An ultra-difficult action game with beautiful pixel art is waiting for you to take on the challenge!

name: Pickle Theory
summary: The proverb of the pickle - If you put a fresh cucumber in a jar of pickles, it will soon become salty too.

name: Piss Off
summary: Control creatures with gross abilities and compete in absurd frantic battles in this action platformer game. Piss, spit, shit and make your friends taste every fluid you can get on them before they do the same to you. Try not to lose your hair and skin to the corrosive fluids of the other creatures and watch out for the aliens!

name: P.I.
summary: "P.I." is a psychological horror science fiction themed around live streaming. While being cautious about revealing her identity, the streamer continues her live broadcast from home, gradually uncovering the truth behind the strange events that begin to unfold in her everyday life.

name: Pico vs. Bear
summary: The big bear has gone mad with distemper. Pico is called in to bring him down!

name: Pit: The Bite-Sized Shooter
summary: A little personal love letter to the FPSs of the early-mid 90s, featuring a variety of enemies and weapons to shoot them with. Levels can be completed in any order, and a robust list of cheats gives the player a lot of room to experiment and play around.

name: Piece by Piece
summary: Piece by Piece is a LITERAL puzzle platformer where each level is fragmented into puzzle piece-shaped fragments. Assemble and unassemble the pieces to guide your character to the doorway and reach the next level!

name: Pinball FX VR
summary:
Bring pinball to life with the ultimate ‘80s arcade atmosphere - now fully immersive in virtual reality. Dive into a fully customizable and interactive setting with the integrated Mixed Reality mode and transform your living room into a personal arcade paradise with cabinets and unlockable decorations.

This includes the same tables as Pinball FX's "Secrets and Shadows" bundle: Curse of the Mummy, Pinball Noir, and Sky Pirates. Many more are available as DLC.

name: Piece by Piece
summary:
Piece by piece is a pretty simple game for kids and adults to help you kill time.

The aim of the game is quite simple - earn as many points as possible in a certain time by putting the pieces together.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: RTA Quest
summary: An RPG drawn in nostalgic pixel art has appeared!Three girls set out on a journey to catch up with their hero.Get your equipment in town and prepare for powerful enemies.Dreams and adventures await you!Only Japanese is supported.Other languages are not included.

name: Pixelwoods: Coloring Book & Decor
summary:
Pixelwoods is a coloring game from Beresnev. It features hundreds of signature Color By Number pictures, an old mansion in need of makeover and new design, cute pixel art, and a story!

Ellie's parents disappeared when she was very young. Now the aspiring artist returns home to solve the mystery of their disappearance, restore the old house, and learn about the special magic of Pixelwoods...

Talking animals, smart plants, a machine for interdimensional travels coexist here with home design talks, a love triangle and, of course, coloring by numbers!

name: Pirate Trails
summary: Arrr, hoist the sails and chart the course, for the gold won't bury itself!

name: Pixel Miner
summary:
"The revolution" they called it.

"Everything will be better" they said.
...
Now we don't even have our own pixels anymore

name: Pine Point: Insomniac
summary:
Fishing at Lost Lake, trashing the popular kids' cars, and playing in your shitty garage band are all things you'd rather be doing than working a dead-end job that will probably keep you trapped in Pine Point for the rest of your life.

Fortunately, you get to work alongside your best friend, Dimitri. Unfortunately, Dimitri is leaving town at the end of the summer... and you're not.

name: Pizza Rogue: P.P.M.P.D.E.S.
summary: Complete the Driving Course: All new employees must pass our challenging delivery test to earn their official Pizza Pups Multidimensional Pizzeria Drivers License. License Required: Be sure to present a valid multiversal driver's license at the start. Don't have one? That's fine The MDSC can cover you.

name: Pixel Art
summary: Get hours of relaxation and fun! Discover more than 40,000 artworks or create your own pixel art. Color. Relax. Enjoy!

summary: 10 free images to color by number or cross stitch

summary: A set of 20 images to color by number or cross stitch

summary: Celebrate the winter with 10 free images to color!

summary: What a coloring madness! Introducing 20 new tribal patterns.

summary: Welcome 20 underwater-theme images to color or cross stitch.

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Under The Sea Pack 3
summary: Explore the sea depths with these 20 new designs.

name: Pixel54
summary: Pixel54 is a 2D platformer game that will take the player into a pixelated world full of adventures and challenges made of jumps and fights to overcome every enemy and obstacle. The game is based on 30 sequential levels (10 "worlds" of 3 levels each) and two different possible endings. In the game you have to collect all the ten colors (starting with a simple white you should reach red, green, blu, etc...) avoiding enemies, overtaking enigmas and fighting bosses. Collecting colors is mandatory to reach the next levels and to use some active elements inside the worlds (the player can switch between the colours so that the character will be able to use the element of that same color). The player is required to avoid traps and to be able to move around a world where everything may do harm or result in a game over. There's a shop system where you can buy powerups after having collect enough in-game coins. There are 5 levels of difficulty (from very easy to impossible), two languages (italian and english), an extra item you can buy in the shop after completing the game, original musics (made by the developer) and 3D prerendered sprites. A cheats system is provided. You can purchase the official guide (but it's italian only) to master the game and to learn the codes for the cheat system. A Windows computer is required in order to play but someone managed to run it on Linux. RTX20xx with at least 3 GB VRAM is reccomanded. You can download the game for free: it has been released on itch.io and no payment is required (you can donate though naming your own price).

name: Pix Arts Masters Tennis
summary: Realistic, true physics, local multiplayer, Tennis Game

name: Picross S Doraemon & F Characters Edition
summary:
The Picross S series for Nintendo Switch welcomes characters from the world of Fujiko·F·Fujio!

From universally adored classics like Doraemon and Kiteretsu Encyclopedia to the more mature SF Short Stories, this collaboration features an incredible lineup of 28 works in total.

Solve Picross puzzles to bring iconic characters and memorable scenes to life as charming pixel art.

Enjoy solving puzzles solo or with friends and family, and immerse yourself in the nostalgia and fresh discoveries of Fujiko·F·Fujio’s timeless creations!

The game features four Picross modes familiar from the Picross S series: Picross, Mega Picross, Color Picross, and Clip Picross, as well as the Extra bonus content.

The number of puzzles is 150 each for Picross and Mega Picross and 5 for Clip Picross for a total of 200 piece puzzles of 40 each, 30 for Color Picross and 5 for Extra.

Picross is a picture crossword puzzle game where you follow hint number to complete a picture. With simple, easy-to-follow rules, it’s a game anyone can play!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Rocket Frog
summary:
Charge... keep charging... and then jump!
Make inertia your friend and fly!
But not actually, as you might go too far and fall!

name: Picture the Difference!
summary:
Spot the Difference with Cute Illustrations!
A Brain-Training IQ Game to Sharpen Your Reflexes

name: Pixel P.I.
summary:
Pixel P.I. is a detective game that allows you to ask questions by typing in order to unlock answers from witnesses or suspects.

It follows Pixel, a hacker detective who lost her recent memories and is going over past police cases trying to find any clue about her missing past.

name: Pixelvader
summary: Control a little ship in this space shooter style game. Start as a weak and harmless ship and power it up to beat all the death spitting war machines. The first level is easy, but you will need good reflex to beat the last level. Anyone who has had a seizure, loss of awareness, or other symptom linked to an epileptic condition should not play this game.

name: Pierrot’s Pilgrimage
summary: Hello! Do you want to play something easy but different? This game is like a walk in a strange park. But also you can speak with people in this park. Don't worry, they are behind the screen, they are not real! They can't hurt you. They cannot fall in love with you. Very nice and chill experience.

name: Pigeon Hater
summary: our friends decided to play a prank on you for your birthday by giving you a whole box of dildos. Should you just throw this "gift" in the trash or seek revenge on those annoying pigeons? The decision is all yours!

name: Pig Escape
summary: You are a pig on the run, and someone is hunting you down! Dash, sneak, and use the environment to your advantage to avoid capture. Navigate through forests, fields, and villages, find hiding spots, and overcome obstacles with clever tactics. Every choice matters—will you escape to freedom or end up in your pursuer’s grasp?

name: Pipe Inspector: Plumbocalypse
summary: Meet Stanislaw, a local plumber eager to provide his services to those in serious plumbing needs, in this DVD-Video game about love, passion and plungers. He's ready to inspect your pipes.

name: Piko Fox!
summary: A game where you must get all your presents back! The creature stole them and to get them back you'll need to platform your way through various worlds and stop various foes!

name: Pirates Slayer
summary: Pirates Slayer is an exciting 3D action-roguelike game where each level represents a new adventure! You will have to battle sinister skeletons, collect gold coins, and use them to unlock unique characters and powerful weapons.

name: Pixel Flip
summary: Embark on endless stages of card matching fun. Dive into a vibrant world, collect all the "Pixels", strategize your moves and level up your character. Can you become the ultimate Pixel Collector?

name: Pioneers of New World
summary: A brand new turn-based strategy game, inspired by Settlers of Catan with thrilling competitions and extesive customization options.

name: Pixel Fixel: Remixel Edition
summary: Support Pixel Fixel and its developer by purchasing this DLC! Unlock 40 new levels with unique shapes, a colorway creation tool, decorative flair for your multiplayer username, new soundscapes, new themes, and new cheat codes. Thank you for your support!

name: Pizza Busters: The Final Task
summary: A short game about thwarting a pizza delivery.

name: Pillar of Gods
summary: A real-time strategy simulation set in a medieval fantasy world where you can summon warriors and heroes to fight. 2D side-scrolling pixel game

name: Pillars Of Fog
summary: Dive into a dark thrilling environment and fight for your survival while exploring brutalist environments as a young Fogdweller. Escape, kill, and die while the environment and terrifying enemies work to spill your blood. Will you fall victim to the trials or will you prove yourself to your tribe?

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Alien Worlds Pack 3
summary: 20 new alien-themed images to color by number or cross-stitch.

name: Pioneer
summary: Pioneer is a survival game where you have to gather resources on an alien planet to survive, escape and find out the truth behind your sudden promotion.

name: Pine
summary: A psychological adventure thriller by the award-winning developer of Quest For The X.

name: Pigeon West: Johnny the Pigeon
summary:
Get ready to immerse yourself in the cruel and ruthless world of the Wild West, where no one can afford to click their beak. The brave hero of our story is Johnny the Pigeon.

The little nest where Johnny lived was once famous for its steadfast justice and laws. But someone appeared who decided to question the peaceful life of our young hero Johnny the Pigeon.

Can Johnny the Pigeon fight back? Will he have to leave his hometown forever?

name: Pioneer Racing
summary: Choose your car, customize it, and get ready for the race! In this game, you race against AIs with realistic cars and physics, to unlock better cars and beat your lap time! Drive, win and set the best chronos of all times with your favorite car! New functionnalities coming soon...

name: Pixel Quest: Realm Eater
summary: Build hero squads, forge ancient relics & save pixel realms in this strategic idle RPG.

name: Pinfeather
summary:
Ten years ago, Rhiannon discovered that February was a monster. It was the worst night of both their lives.

Today, Rhiannon is a beautician who sees February in secret. They work to disguise Feb’s abnormal features, but their meetings also let Rhiannon keep an eye on her – make sure Feb isn’t able to repeat past mistakes.

Under her watch, Feb will never get the chance to fuck things up for either of them ever again.

A horror game intended for an audience 18 and up. It contains content that may be upsetting to the reader.

name: PIzza Wizard+
summary:
Remake of 2013 pizza wizard, published by Adult swin

You are the wizard of the pizza and use "Mass" power to defend your tower.

name: PianoGlow
summary:
Multiplayer piano visualizer (QWERTY & Midi inputs supported). Customizable themes. Render video & audio from within the app!

The virtual piano can be played either with your computer keyboard or a real piano. With multiplayer mode, you can play duets or as part of a band, or take turns!

name: Pixel Heroes Adventure
summary:
unique pixel art MMORPG that offers endless quests, battles, joy of collecting.

Experience the best collectible MMORPG game!
Join us in "Pixel Heroes Adventure" where you can enjoy endless growth and adventure in a game filled with vibrant pixel graphics and diverse item collections!

name: Pinball FX VR: Indiana Jones - The Pinball Adventure
summary: Relive iconic scenes from the movies in Indiana Jones: The Pinball Adventure, the 1993 Williams classic, now available in VR.

name: Pinball FX VR: Universal Pinball - TV Classics
summary: Three pinball tables inspired by iconic TV shows in virtual reality. Guide the remnants of humanity, chase crime on the roads, and wield your chakram to conquer the leaderboards.

name: Pinball FX VR: Williams Pinball - World Cup Soccer
Pinball FX VR: Williams Pinball - Twilight Zone
Pinball FX VR: Williams Pinball - The Addams Family
Pinball FX VR: Williams Pinball - Star Trek: The Next Generation
Pimbolas
summary: Play frantic foosball matches with your friends in this group physics game. Use crazy and fun power-ups to defeat your opponents and become the Pimbolas champion!

name: Pixel Transit
summary: Pixel Transit is a game where you construct a transit system in an infinitely vast, tile-based world. Your goal is to design efficient transportation networks that enable people to reach their destinations as quickly as possible.

name: Picscape
summary: simple puzzle arcade game. It may be a bit difficult. may be mario like?

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Mythical Monsters Pack

summary: 20 mythic-themed images to color by number or cross-stitch.

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Spring Pack 3
summary: 20 new images to color by number or cross stitch.

name: Pigeon Blood
summary: Hidden in a forest lies an extravagant residence. It is owned by our protagonist, known only as Chris. Chris is the latest in a family line of sex-slave trainers. His latest acquisition, a girl named Rita, is to be completely trained within six months. Our hero is also a bit of an enigma, for he has actually lost most of his memories. However, as the training of Rita continues, he begins to slowly piece together the fragmented events of his life. Chris will occasionally get help from his two assistants; conveniently each of them embodying either sadism or masochism.

name: Pigeon West: El Diablo
summary:
Have you heard of El Diablo? The outlaw who terrorized the entire Wild West...

Everyone who saw him at least once was left without a single feather. He's the terror that spreads on the wings of the night, He is El Diablo.

Now, let me spin you the tale of his last robbery...

name: Pigeon West: Call of Gun. Isekai
summary:
What if the most dangerous criminal in the entire Wild West ended up in the most typical isekai—and not even as the main character?

When the entire Wild West turned against El Diablo, he had no choice but to retreat. As a result of his perfectly calculated actions, El Diablo ends up in another world. But all he cares about is drinking the finest whiskey. However, as always, there will be those who try to come between a man and his true love (whiskey). But not this time, cowboy.

name: Pier Game
summary: A short anecdote of early autumn musings.

name: Pierrot à la Mode
summary: A retro-styled narrative about a a new employee at a clown-themed ice-cream parlor.

name: Piano Tiles 2+
summary: Tap the tiles in sync with the melody and make sure not to miss any tiles. This is an apple arcade only version of the popular free to play game that removes all ads and microtransactions. It requires a subscription to play.

name: Pixel Horizons
summary: Stranded on a beautiful island, craft tools, battle beasts, and uncover mythical weapons. Fight to survive, conquer ancient ruins, and master the wild in a high-stakes adventure. Will you prevail? - Created by a UC Santa Cruz Student

name: Pirate Survivors
summary: Pirate Survivors is a fast-paced Roguelite where you battle endless waves of sea monsters, unlock powerful upgrades, and take on deadly Sea Legends. Choose your ship, conquer countless enemies, and face escalating challenges in this high-stakes Bullet Heaven adventure!

name: Pirates Adventure Solitaire
summary: Search for legendary treasure! Solitaire in a Pirate setting!

name: Pioneers of the Coast
summary: In this top-down, turn-based resource strategy game, you and fellow pioneers set out to start your own towns in a newly discovered region. Be the first to dominate the land and lay claim to the entire area.

name: Pig & Chikin
summary: This is the tale of Pig & Chikin. In a world where pigs have wings, Pig loses her wings in an accident. Her dear friend, Chikin, takes her on a journey to learn to fly again. On the way, they meet magical places and creatures who offer insights into companionship, community, and acceptance.

name: Picnic Syndrome
summary: Nutopia is now booting... Picnic syndrome is a Meta puzzle game with light horror elements featuring file manipulation. Exploring "Nutopia" with Teddy the bear and hanging out with Vincent the wolf pup!

name: PirateFi
summary: This game was removed by Valve on February 10th 2025 for containing malware. Users who ran the game in the time the malware was live received an email warning them accordingly.

name: Pipeline Crawl
summary: Trapped inside a narrow pipeline, your only choices are to move forward or backward. Deadly obstacles stand in your way, and a single mistake means starting over. Can you escape?

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Arcanion Magi Side Story
summary: The great adventure of the little Magi begins!

name: Pikmin 100
summary:
Pikmin Garden is the official Pikmin section of Nintendo’s Japanese website. It contains various articles with information on the Pikmin series. The "Lets Try It" page provides various activities to do based around Pikmin. These activities include a piano roll video of the song sung by the Pikmin in Pikmin 4, printable coloring pages of Pikmin 3 and Pikmin 4 artwork, and both printable and video instructions to fold origami Red Pikmin, Yellow Pikmin, and Blue Pikmin.

On July 19th, 2024, the section was updated with the addition of Pikmin 100, a game playable directly on the website when viewed on smartphones. The game has only one input: a button on-screen with a whistle icon. Every time the button is tapped, a Pikmin appears on-screen, the number at the top of the screen increments by 1, and a group of children call out that number. The ultimate goal of the game, as its title suggests, is to summon a total of 100 Pikmin so they can all carry a Crimson Banquet.

name: Pixel Rift Adventure
summary:
Pixel Rift Adventure is a fast‑paced Pico-8 roguelike dungeon crawler that blends the room‑by‑room exploration of classic Zelda titles with the procedural unpredictability and challenge of Binding of Isaac. Each floor is a freshly generated grid of interconnected rooms, packed with randomized enemies, destructible obstacles, and hidden treasures. Your hero starts modestly equipped—three hearts, basic sword reach, and no special powers—but every playthrough offers new opportunities to power up via treasure chests, vending machines, and a unique letter‑collecting mechanic.

The heart of the game lies in its letter system. Scattered throughout the dungeon are consumable letters that spell out SUBPIXEL and MATTA. Completing the former permanently extends your sword’s reach; completing the latter grants a limited‑use ranged projectile attack. Vending machines sprinkled on each level sell letters for coins you’ve hoarded, adding a strategic layer: do you spend now for a chance at a powerful upgrade, or save for health and keys?

Boss rooms punctuate your descent, each featuring a thematic “family” of bosses—wiggling slime overlords, spectral ghost generals, and subterranean plant tyrants—that grow tougher as you advance. Defeating a boss opens a portal to the next floor, and reaching level 10 without succumbing to traps or overwhelming odds crowns you the ultimate Pixel Rift champion. Tight controls, i‑frames after damage, and a reactive HUD keep you always in the action—dive in, adapt on the fly, and see how far you can go!

name: Pixel Pirate
summary: Protect Your Treasure!

name: Pip Puzzle: Pip and Ooma's Battle
summary: Pip Puzzle is an action puzzle gem game where you flood your opponent’s side with gems by smashing your own gems. Fight through Arcade, or play online against your friends. Find a character with a unique skill that best fits your play style, and battle through stages that evolve while you play!

name: Pinball FX: Tomb Raider Pinball
summary: Relive Lara Croft’s greatest adventures with two action-packed pinball tables. From the legendary halls of Croft Manor to mysterious tombs around the world, test your skills, uncover secrets, and play through iconic moments from the Tomb Raider franchise.

name: Pinball FX VR: Tomb Raider Pinball
Pigface
summary: You wake up with an explosive headache in a pool of your own blood. You're Exit, a terrible woman whose awful past has finally caught up to her. Fulfill contracts for the people who drilled into your skull — guns-blazing, slow and tactical — it doesn’t matter. They know you’ll do whatever it takes.

name: Pictologica Final Fantasy
summary:
Pictlogica Final Fantasy was a free-to-play action puzzle game developed by Jupiter for iOS and Android.

A Nintendo 3DS version, Pictlogica Final Fantasy ≒ (Nearly Equal), was announced and released in Japan on July 12, 2017

name: Pizza Tower: Fall Damage
summary: Adds fall damage to Pizza Tower. Just kidding. You don't take damage. You die a horrible death.

name: Pictlogica Final Fantasy: Nearly Equal
summary: A Nintendo 3DS version of Pictologica Final Fantasy, "Pictlogica Final Fantasy ≒" (Pictlogica Final Fantasy Nearly Equal), was announced and released in Japan on July 12, 2017, featuring new puzzles and a new game mode.

name: Ping Pong
summary: Remember the days where you would hold your Ping Pong racket and would try to bounce the balls as many times as possible? Now you can do that right on your iPhone and iPod touch! Challenge your friends to see who can hold the record of more consecutive bounces. To add to the fun, we added bonus items that you can collect to earn extra points! With simple and addictive gameplay, Ping Pong will guarantee you many long hours of fun.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Giri Jump Extreme
summary: Use Extreme Jump to get to the goal as fast as possible! You can't afford to be off your guard for even a second in this high-speed jumping action!

name: Pinball FX VR: Williams Pinball - Volume 1
Pinball FX VR: Williams Pinball - Volume 2
Pinball FX VR: Williams Pinball - Volume 3
Ping Pong Up
summary: Feel the tension of the big match breaking through the screen.

Each game provides cutting edge 3D graphics, missions, unique bonus games and ear-splitting riffs.

name: Pizza Clickers
summary: Be prepared for endless hours of fun and entertainment!

name: Pizza Tower: Scoutdigo
summary:
Pizza Tower: Scoutdigo Mod is a Pizza Tower Mod that aims to add new content akin to what a possible Pizza Tower DLC would feel like.

A fully playable campaign featuring The Vigilante!
Use an entire arsenal of weapons on a quest to complete a bounty on Pizzaface in a harder, more gimmicky playthrough.
Discover new friends and foes while ravaging the tower in order to deliver justice. Will you be there, or will you be square?

name: Pizza Tower: D&LC
summary:
Pizza Tower: Delicious & Luxurious Crust is a Pizza Tower DLC / Expansion mod that aims to add new content into the game while keeping it fresh and probably unique, examples:

* Brand new floors to explore, two of them you will be able to explore after floor 1 and in post-game

* Old content from previous builds are coming back, redone from the ground up as post-game content

* New playable characters that comes with their own campaign, like Doise, Mr.Stick, Dougie, etc

* New bosses to tackle and dunk, you might encounter a mimic gentleman and some hell spawn along the way

* Pizzacoins from SAGE Demo are back, kill enemies and these coins might drop occasionally

* New clothings, you might have to find a green creature to access his shop within the new floor you unlock after you beat Floor 1

* A sandbox mode, you unlock this by beating one campaign with any character, there are no limitations here, you can wear everyone's clothes as the character of choice?, check!, revisit levels with brand new challenges?, check!, you can fight Doise as Peppino without Swap Mode?, check!

* And new achievements, from the campaigns and Sandbox, good luck getting them all!

name: Pizza Tower United
summary:
Pizza Tower United is an online MOD for pizza tower, sitting on the full game with all it's glory and features!
With this mod you can:
-See your friend
-Play with your friends
-Taunt with strangers
-Meet people who aren't your friends
-Hate people who aren't your friends
-And much more social related features!

In a serious note, the mod introduces a smooth multiplayer experience that sits on the complete game as a mod, it features synchronized gameplay from the beginning until the end with shared destruction, enemy elimination and most importantly pizza time escape!
So grab your friends, install the mod and escape the pizza tower as a unit

name: Pigmalion's Angel
summary: In the game, you date an angel and need to increase your love bar with her and give her gifts and find some way to unlock the door at the end of the hallway.

summary: Make the Kessel Run in less than 12 parsecs with three exciting Star Wars Pinball tables: Relive your favorite film moments in Solo, deploy Imperial might to win the Battle of Mimban, and live a lovable scoundrel's life in Calrissian Chronicles.

name: Pinball Sniper
summary:
The new game from the creator of hit app ZigZag.

Pinball Sniper is a new kind of pinball game in which you have to hit and crush the gems with the ball. Collect as many gems as you can to unlock Monsters.

name: Pill Fight
summary: A minimalist wave-shooter, focusing entirely on the gameplay with 6 different maps.

name: Pixelburg
summary: Build your own castle, raise a powerful army, and reclaim the kingdom! Gather resources, defend your realm against enemies, and explore a dangerous world full of treasures and secrets. Will you rise as a ruler or fade into the shadows of history?

name: Pinchcliffe Grand Prix: Anniversary Edition
summary: Experience the magic of Pinchcliffe Grand Prix in this anniversary edition, now with even more exciting features and activities! The expanded version includes 8 extra mini-games from the 2000 edition, which, together with the classic gameplay, provide a complete and memorable gaming experience!

name: Picture Cross Color
summary: A mobile nonogram puzzle game using colors and logic to create cute pixelated images.

name: Piñata Go Boom
summary: A small incremental game about smashing piñatas, collecting toys, and climbing the corporate ladder as you unlock a vast upgrade tree.

name: Pizza Tower: Final Round
summary: Final Round is a merger of two previous Pizza Tower mods, The Final Course and Round Two! New characters, content, levels, and bosses await this expansion!

name: Pirate Royalty
summary:
Pirate Royalty is an open-world MMORPG set in the fractured world of Ascaron. Players begin their journey in Argent City, a coastal stronghold built atop the remnants of a sunken empire. As cadets, players choose from various classes, each with unique abilities and progression paths.

The game features a rich lore centered around the Sea Mother, whose disappearance during the Maelstrom War left the world in chaos. Players will explore haunted forests, elemental ruins, and dungeons swallowed by storms, seeking to uncover the truth behind the Sea Mother's silence.

Engage in epic PvP battles, team up for cooperative quests, and forge powerful weapons by socketing ancient gems. With a vibrant art style and dynamic environments, Pirate Royalty offers a unique blend of exploration, combat, and storytelling.

name: Pity This Busy Monster
summary: Pity This Busy Monster is a physics-based narrative game where you experience employment at Spanky’s Donut Fulfillment Warehouse, the least efficient donut factory in the world. Fulfill orders by throwing the correct donuts into boxes, keep your work area clean, and unwind after work.

name: Ping Profit: Internet Tycoon
summary: Launch your hosting company straight from your parent's basement! Buy servers, solve problems, and grow your profits as you climb from startup to tech titan. Keep customers online, boost your reputation, and build the ultimate hosting empire in Ping Profit!

name: Pick Race 3D
summary: Race, Jump, Crash, Repeat!

name: Pirate Anime Quest: One Boys' Journey, A Piece of Island Love
summary: Sail the seas of desire... and merge forbidden fruits to capture the heart of your ideal pirate.

name: Pirate Anime Quest: One Girls' Journey, A Piece of Island Love
Pixel Cross Stitch Color by Number Seasons Collection
summary: Relax and create beautiful pixel art with color-by-number and cross-stitch fun!

name: Pixelands
summary:
Pixelands is a 2D MMO sandbox where players can fish, farm, trade, and socialize in a player-driven world. Build and connect with others, grind quests, and have fun!
To play Pixelands, Join the Discord or Download through Itch.io!

name: Pilgrim of Darkness
summary: Explore a dark fantasy world, collect crystals, perform rituals, and survive demons before fear consumes you. Survive in the dark where fear makes you visible to demons. Rituals, upgrades, bosses—every step could be your last.

name: Pit of Fears
summary: Pit of Fears is an atmospheric horror, mystery, 2D platform, puzzle, action and adventure game, face all the challenges and dangers of the Pit of Fears, survive the bizarre creatures and solve the mysteries of this distorted alternative dimension to the real world.

name: Pixelegend
summary: In this fantasy world, you will become an adventurer, gradually understanding the world, becoming stronger through weapons and equipment, and gradually resolving various crises.

name: Pirate Parakeet
summary: Pirate Parakeet is a daring pirate themed 3D platformer. Navigate the ocean using Pirate Parakeet's ship, the Daring Feather. Slash your way through multiple islands to find treasure. Are you ready to face the challenges of the sea?

name: Pirate's Gambit
summary: Pirate's Gambit takes you on an unpredictable voyage, blending deck-building with Yacht Dice mechanics. Roll the dice in the dimly lit cabin, where fate shifts with every turn. Are you closing in on treasure or something far more sinister?

name: Pip Pepper Park Planner
summary:
Pip Pepper Park Planner is a cozy, strategy game in which you play as Pip, a tiny bird with a giant job: to design parks for animals to enjoy. Explore different habitats, discover the needs of diverse animals and fully customize your parks. Can you build a park that all the animals will love?‎

Create your own customizable park choosing different structures for each park area. With hundreds possible combinations, you get to decide what happens next.

Interact with a variety of objects and animal species. Learn about their unique needs and interests through engaging and fun dialogue sequences.

Explore a playground of possibilities. Did anything change after building your park? Take your time to reflect on your design decisions. You can always try a new combination!

name: Pixel Dash: Toast of Destiny
summary: Haruka Ran is a high school girl who runs with a piece of bread in her mouth. She is searching for her fated encounter in a side-scrolling, furious JK anime action game! Let's go meet the man of your dreams with the anime-style story and slapstick sprinting action!

name: Pizza Deathlivery
summary: Alone or up to 6 players, deliver pizzas to the survivors of a city where an oppressive mist has turned almost everyone into monstrous creatures.

name: Pin-Kod. Poluchi patent pervym!
summary: The twenty-third computer game based on the Smeshariki franchise and the second one that is part of the Pin-Code project. "Get a patent first!" gives everyone the opportunity to be an inventor and create an ingenious device themselves. The whole game is a continuous experiment; before each experiment there is a quiz, then a historical background, and then the experiment itself. You need to arrange the objects so that the experiment is successful, and after each experiment, a patent is issued.

name: Picture Everything: Puzzle Cross Galaxy
summary: A chilled out & stimulating nonogram puzzle game with endless logic puzzles to solve. Uncover a huge variety of 3D objects, and discover new puzzles - never run out of fun!

name: Pigkaboo
summary: Survive by getting dirty! You’ve been captured by a pig-like creature. Escape this nightmare alone or with up to 4 friends in co-op mode. Leave trails, distract the monster, solve puzzles, and find your way to freedom. But beware—the pig will find you, and when it does, there’s no mercy!

name: Pixel Fortress: Tower Defense
summary: Pixel Fortress is a retro-inspired tower defense game packed with fast-paced real-time strategy. Build your defenses, command powerful abilities, and unleash devastating energy blasts to hold off relentless enemy waves. Can you master the battlefield?

name: Pixgun
summary: Chexie is a teenage girl who, as a result of mysterious events, is transported to the virtual kingdom of Pixgun. There she discovers a magic wand that becomes her key to survival. Your task is to discover the source of corruption in the kingdom and the plight of its inhabitants.

name: Pirate Go: Bravo
summary: A turn-based strategy game where classic board game mechanics meet high-seas adventure. Roll the dice, conquer islands, collect treasure, and outwit rivals in your quest to become the ultimate pirate tycoon.

name: Pizza Shop Simulator
summary: Choose your ingredients, prepare the orders, sabotage rival pizza joints. The streets are crawling with crime, and the cops are on your tail... In this neighborhood, you either make pizza… or you get thrown into the oven. Are you ready to become the world’s most dangerous pizzaiolo?

name: PigUp
summary: The pig rebelled against the Heavenly Court and gathered its companions to climb up to the clouds.

name: Pixel Dungeon VR
summary: vr dungeon crew game with 4 player co op and a leveling system in it for buffs

name: Pixel Frontier: Tactics
summary: Recruit Heroes, gear up and face the threats of the Pixel Frontier! This engine-building, dice-rolling, turn-based strategy game has 36 Hero classes to choose from - each with their own sets of abilities, upgrades, synergies and strategies for near endless possibilities.

name: Pinball Neon
summary: This is Pinball Arcade Simulator game with modern graphics. You can use Keybord, mouse, touchscreen or Gamapad(XBox or Dualshock) Use “Tilt”, but do not use often, this is can brake the table. You can use GOLDEN BALL from inventory.

name: Pineapple
summary: Pineapple is a clicker game delivering mystery pineapple drops every two hours and an exclusive Rare‑or‑higher drop every twelve hours. Join the fun, collect rare varieties, and watch your collection grow!

name: Pixie Pleasures
summary: How could pixies possibly be bored? Yet poor Aisling finds herself exactly that – until she spies Dink the naughty Fae getting busy next door! What is that thick tool between Dink’s legs? And if Aisling asks nicely enough, maybe Dink will let her touch it – maybe even more!

name: Pick me! Visual Novel
summary:
"Pick Me!" is an atmospheric visual novel where every choice you make matters.
You decide whether to play as a boy or a girl, and create your character's name to fully immerse yourself in the story.

The plot begins on a dark forest road, where you and your friend face a tough decision — help a dying deer or walk away. From this moment, a chain of events unfolds that will lead you to either a good or a bad ending.

The game combines comedy, light horror, and romance. Expect unexpected twists, mystical scenes, moral dilemmas, and of course, friendship and love.

name: Pinball Arcade: Star Trek - The Next Generation
Pinball Arcade: No Fear - Dangerous Sports
Pinball Arcade: The Getaway - High Speed II
Pirate Trails: Tentacles and Treasures
summary: Arrr you ready for more puzzlin', plunderin' and perilous tentacles?

name: Pixel Par
summary: Putt your way through unique courses across a variety of modes, using upgraded abilities to assist you and overcome tricky challenges your way.

name: PikuPiku
summary:
A clone of PakuPaku — built using PICO-8, with no external sprites or assets.

It’s basically a one-button game:
Press any arrow key to flip your direction.

Eat pellets. Dodge the ghost — unless you're powered up.
Fast, focused, and minimal. Just pixels, logic, and a bit of chaos.

Made as a small learning project.

name: Pipeworks Puzzle
summary: Pipeworks puzzle adds a new twist to the classic sliding-tile puzzle! Connect pipes as you move them in a grid-based arena to match the blueprint. You can only move the pieces into empty tiles, so plan your next move carefully.

name: Pixicharm: Gravenguard
summary:
Slay skeletons and goblins in nonstop action!
In this fast-paced 2D action game, you control a fearless knight battling endless enemies across shifting platforms. Time your strikes, stay on the move, and see how long you can survive the onslaught!

name: Pirate Island Survival Simulator 3D
summary: Live the life of survivor trying to make this island his home! Enjoy peaceful island views - picturesque ocean, tropic forests and mountains. The only goal is to survive! Explore pirate survival island full of mysterious places such as sunken pirate ship and caves full of treasures! Salvage survival tools and weapons that may help you to explore the island! Hunt wild animals to make them your next meal, find weapons to protect yourself from predators, quarry resources and craft useful tools using special workshops. Use your survival skills to stay alive, avoid battling against furious island predators and discover the secrets of Pirate Island with amazing survival simulator in 3D! Hunt, fish or gather plant food to stay alive, build shelters to hide from predator and enjoy peaceful life on a desert island with Pirate Island Survival 3D game!

name: Pixel Empires
summary: Pixel Empires is a pixel-art real-time strategy game where you build and manage medieval colonies, automate resource gathering with intuitive AI, explore uncharted lands, and wage tactical battles to expand your empire’s reach.

name: Pierce the Sky, Zarparan
summary: Dive into a dark fantasy world torn apart by war. Command vast armies and construct mighty fortresses. Engulf opponents in volleys of deadly bullets. Pierce the Sky Zarparan combines real-time-strategy with shoot-em-up mayhem to define a new genre of gameplay.

name: Pixel Troopers

name: Pinball Crush
summary: Pinball Crush is a pinball dating sim, great for casual gaming and fans of classic pinball alike. Impress your crush and unlock over 300 unique character events on your way to a high score. Pick your favorite date and explore Pinball Crush's bonus stages, each with new mechanics!

name: Pinball FX3: Williams Pinball - Season 1 Bundle
summary: Play 12 authentic classics in the Williams Pinball Season 1 Bundle as arcade-perfect simulations in their original form or as remastered video game experiences enhanced with updated graphics, animated toys, and a host of new features.

name: Pinball Breeze
summary: A pinball game with 10 tables across 3 themes. It includes Table Modification (where the player places elements before starting a table), mission progression (so you can actually finish a table), a forgiving Tilt mechanic and Online Leaderboards.

name: Pinball FX2: Pinball FX Classics
summary: This Xbox 360-exclusive DLC included the Agents, Buccaneer, Extreme and Speed Machine tables.

name: Pinball FX2: Nightmare Mansion
summary: This Xbox 360-exclusive DLC was a spooky themed pinball table.

name: Pinball FX2: Rocky and Bullwinkle
summary: This Xbox 360-exclusive DLC was a pinball table about the classic squirrel and moose characters.

name: Pinball Soccer World
summary: A fast paced pinball game with soccer rules and realistic pinball physics that allow for real-world pinball techniques like post passes, ball cradling, nudging, and more. The game features an extensive and challenging career mode, hundreds of collectibles, multiple game-play modes, numerous ways to challenge your friends, and leaderboards where players collectively contribute to their national team's rank in the world.

name: Pirates: The Spectacular Treasure Trail
summary:
In this PC game, children aged 6 and over can embark on an exciting treasure hunt. Who will find the treasure in the end with a compass and map? The trail of a mysterious treasure map leads to a teeming pirate island in this CD-ROM adventure! Who has enough courage and pirate cunning to take on the legacy of an old pirate captain?

The future pirates are first given a detailed description of the person or flag they are looking for and also learn about piracy. With their compass, they use the cardinal points and the squares on the map to guide their search! With eagle eyes, they have to find all the secret hiding places and track down legendary sailors, because only then will the pirates get all the puzzle pieces of the treasure map they need to set off in search of the treasure with their own ship and crew.

If the treasure chambers are empty, the pirates must use their skill to steal the loot from other pirates. There are also pirate-themed games, information and extras to print out in the old captain's cabin!

This adventurous pirate game requires geographical skills, a sense of direction, eagle eyes and concentration in order to shine as a proud pirate captain with a full treasure chest at the end.

Players can continue their treasure hunt at any time from where they left off. The game is automatically saved under the respective name.

The totally crazy treasure map is a fun and varied computer game for primary school children that teaches knowledge about the popular pirate theme in a playful way and, in particular, promotes concentration and the first use of the computer.

name: Pinono and the Magic Fiddle
summary: Pinono, a girl who casts magic through music, sets off on a slightly free-spirited journey. In this turn-based RPG, you'll meet unique companions and explore a whimsical world. Your choices shape the story and ending, and melodies used in magic and events are procedurally generated each time.

name: Pigg Party
summary: A dress-up game where you can dress up your avatar, talk with friends, get special items, and find a community.

name: Pigg Life
summary: Harvest the crops you grow, cook and craft, and barter them with in-game characters to get rewards and develop your story.

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Enchanted Worlds Pack
summary: A pack of 10 free fantasy-themed patterns.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Volume 9
summary: Contains the classic pinball tables PIN·BOT, TAXI and WHO dunnit.

name: Pixicharm: Sparkrina
summary: In Sparkrina, play as a fierce sorceress sprinting through endless realms packed with deadly traps and demonic foes. Unleash magic, dodge danger, and see how long you can survive in this fast-paced fantasy runner!

name: Picture Treasure Hunt
summary: Hunt for hidden treasures in each picture! A fun and brain-boosting item search game for all ages

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: HacoPiyo
summary: Stretch, fall, and jump over obstacles in this action puzzle game! Join the mysterious HacoPiyo on his big adventure as he stretches and jumps!

name: Pixletters
summary: A daily word guessing game. Each incorrect guess reveals information about the letters contained within the secret word, and if the pixels from the letters in the incorrect guess are in the same position as the pixels of the letters in the secret word.

name: Pixel Wizard
summary: A medieval fantasy hack and slash adventure where you are a battle pixel wizard. Fast and frantic, fight hordes of enemies and defeat brutal bosses in any order to save the kingdom. Use deadly magic, powerful items and valuable loot to help turn the tide of battle.

name: Pinball Hero
summary: Defeat the rising enemies by launching pinballs! Aim for a higher score by mastering the unique traits of your pinballs and enemies, and strategically planning their upgrades and combinations to secure an easy victory.

name: Pikabuu: Stop!
summary: Beni, a loving husband to Nadia and father to Kaila, always ensured his family's needs were met with simple contentment. However, one day, an unwitting decision dragged his small family into a spiral that threatens everything.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Bioframe
summary: The number 1 jigsaw puzzler.

summary: The number 1 jigsaw puzzler.
