name: Pip Puzzle
summary: Pip Puzzle is an action puzzle gem game where you flood your opponent’s side with gems by smashing your own gems. Fight through Arcade, or play online against your friends. Find a character with a unique skill that best fits your play style, and battle through stages that evolve while you play!

name: Piczle World of Puzzles
summary: All your favourite logic-puzzles in one feature-rich package, Piczle World of Puzzles is the ultimate in picture logic-puzzling!

name: Pixel Rampage
summary: "Pixel Rampage" is an open-world game with day-night cycles. Fight monster hordes with precise shooting, dodging, and upgrades. Use 7-day login rewards to boost gear fast, enjoying intense combat and progression.

name: Pimp Up Dungeon
summary: Pack the Treasure and Master the Challenge!

name: Piscis x Machina 4.44 You are Fish
summary: The most unhinged fishing game you've ever seen! Fish and hookshot your way around trash island to collect the coherence cores to win! Fish you! You (are) fish!

name: Pine: Segment_01
summary: a trillion souls pine as a universe collapses.

name: Pinedrop Vale
summary: Let the wind guide you

name: Ping Pong
summary: Ping Pong recreates sport of table tennis with a gameplay similar of Wii Sports.

name: Pick Your Poison
summary: A roulette-like turn-based strategy where you play against an ominous bartender with high stakes, but even greater reward. Take turns risking fatal poisoning in this dark, noir setting to take back control over your life, and maybe even achieve something more...

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Summer Pack 2
summary: 20 summer-themed images to color by number or cross stitch.

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Summer Pack
summary: 10 summer-themed images to color by number or cross-stitch

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Menacing Monsters Pack 3
summary: 20 monster-themed images to color by number or cross-stitch.

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Enchanted Worlds Pack 2
summary: A pack of 20 fantasy-themed patterns.

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Flowers and Butterflies Pack 3
summary: A pack of 20 flower and butterfly themed images to color by number of cross stitch.

name: Pixicharm: Majestreats
summary:
In Majestreats, you play as a hungry holiday princess on a royal quest for delicious treats! Dash through sunny beaches and resort paths, collecting burgers, ice cream, and chocolate — but watch out for the pesky mosquitoes! Each bite will cost you precious points, so stay sharp and keep those snacks coming.

A lighthearted, fast-paced adventure full of yummy fun and royal flair!

name: Pitbull Dale 10
summary:
Step into the crib in the Dale 10 game Unlock missions, ride in El Taxi with
@TheMostBadOnes and get a taste of #Underdogs.

name: Picogori 2025
summary:
make shaved ice for animals at the festival!
(there's no ending! you just make shaved ice forever.)

name: Pixicharm: Spikoin
summary:
In Spikoin, every coin is a step toward victory — but one wrong move could cost you! Jump your way through tight corridors, deadly spikes, and tricky platforms in this fast-paced coin-collecting platformer.

Your goal? Collect all coins in the level to unlock the next one. Sounds easy? Think again.

name: PixelRulers
summary: PixelRulers is a fun, pixel-styled 2D real-time strategy game with simple yet engaging multiplayer gameplay for up to 96 players. Designed with simplicity as a core principle, PixelRulers focuses on easy-to-understand mechanics without sacrificing depth.

name: Pinsky Protocol
summary: Play as Agent 8085, the most advanced mining AI sent to asteroid 8085 Pinsky. Extract resources, upgrade your systems, and complete missions that affect the future of humanity. Your choices matter: promote unity, extinction, remain neutral. A sci-fi strategy game where your decisions have impact.

name: Pinball FX VR: Williams Pinball - Volume 9
summary: This classic Williams Pinball collection brings three iconic tables together - PIN·BOT, TAXI, and WHO dunnit - each delivering a unique design, theme, and gameplay.

name: Pigeon Guild
summary: Pigeon Guild is a non-combat, single-player action RPG where you play as Jules Corso, a rookie cadet in Cassandria's most prestigious airborne postal service. Navigate your flying cargo boat through a world of floating islands, where every delivery tells a story.

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Summer Pack 3
summary: Enjoy the last days of summer with a new image pack!

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Vacations Pack
summary: It's not over yet! Celebrate the last day of vacations with our free image pack.

name: Picaro
summary: Master the cards in this high-stakes card roguelike! Every decision is life-or-death as you navigate treacherous dungeons. Use every card to escape. Strategy, resource management, and nerve-wracking choices await in an endlessly replayable challenge!

name: Pinball
summary: Fantasy Pinball Arcade Games

name: Pic-A-Block
summary: Welcome to Pic-A-Block, a brand new puzzle game from TreeFall Studios. Pic-A-Block is a 3D spatial brain teaser game. The goal of the game is to recreate 2D images in 3D by positioning blocks in a manner that matches the picture you are given.

name: Pillar of Salt
summary: The deity of this world has decided to destroy it in three days. His avatar awaits the world's champion at the top of the Mountain of Power. Can you build up your strength in time and reach the mountain in this unique real-time tactical roguelike RPG?

name: Pigbert
summary: The Supreme Overlord has granted you the Award of Excellent Labour and you are required by law to accept it. Journey across the polluted, mushroom-farming nation to reach the palace, battling fanatics, enforcers, and desperate workers in turn-based RPG combat.

name: Picture the Difference! 2
summary: Even Cuter, Even Smarter! A Brain-Training Puzzle Game to Boost Your Thinking Power

name: Pigeon Coo-lette
summary: Pigeon Coo-lette is a part-puzzle-part-rhythm game developed by Northeastern University students. It focuses on the simple mechanic of following a pattern of bullets and blanks as they are loaded into a gun and then repeating them, with a "serious" yet "silly" story.

name: PizzaMaker
summary: Cats are customers too, and they want pizza. But for them, ordinary pizza is an insult for nine lifetimes. Make the perfect pizza by combining fish, ham, and delicacies for four-legged gourmets.

name: Picross-8
summary: Picross game with 12 easy (10x10) puzzles and 15 normal (15x15) puzzles.

name: Pips
summary: Pips is the New York Times' first original logic puzzle game. Players must arrange dominoes on a board to satisfy specific conditions. New puzzles become available daily.

name: Pieces to Find
summary: Search for anomalies! Use each chapter’s mechanic to solve short stories, uncover the truth, and choose your ending. Co-op mode lets you play together.

name: Pixel Place
summary: One giant canvas. Thousands of artists. Every pixel counts - create, defend, or destroy in the ultimate collaborative art game!

name: Pixel Ronin
summary: Pixel Ronin is a fast-paced hack-and-slash survival game where you face relentless waves of ghouls and monsters. Tap into powerful abilities and unleash devastating attacks. Outmaneuver your enemies with tactical precision to turn the tide of battle. Hold your ground—this will be a long battle.

name: Pirate Guy
summary: 2d platformer where player controls pirate character, mission is to avoid different enemies and traps and find treasuries end of levels and finish levels. Game contains also boss levels

name: Pica
summary: This is a casual jigsaw puzzle game. All you need to do is use the mouse to drag the pieces to the correct positions, and when you complete the puzzle and form a complete picture, you can unlock the picture gallery.

name: Pixelo
summary: This is a casual jigsaw puzzle game. All you need to do is use the mouse to drag the pieces to the correct positions, and when you complete the puzzle and form a complete picture, you can unlock the picture gallery.

summary: A pack with 6 cards given as a 80 point Club Nintendo reward in Japan.

name: Pixel Dungeons
summary: A turn-based pixel dungeon game where every move counts. Drop bombs, unlock doors, and outsmart enemies in short tactical levels. Easy to pick up, challenging to master. Play at your own pace with no time pressure.

name: Piña Rollada
summary: Roll your way through paradise!

name: Pitchfork
summary:
Discover a "Pitchfork", throw it into a wall and bounce off it to elevate yourself to higher grounds. This is the key to pulling off platforming feats as you attempt to make your way out of the depths.

From platforming around to activating switches, the pitchfork becomes a handy and versatile tool that you'll want for all your underground escapades.

Pitchfork is a short-but-sweet difficult platformer for both PC and Gameboy/Gameboy Color!

name: Pimby's Workaround
summary: Help Pimby get to the end of each stage of this puzzle platformer. Use Pimby's unique looping abilities and bananarang to navigate through confusing geometry and dangerous enemies.

name: Pinball Paladins
summary: Pinball Paladins is an action roguelike with pinball physics and rpg progression. Defend your convoy and power up your heroes using dozens of unique items. With an upbeat chiptune soundtrack and original handcrafted pixel art, you’ll find endless replayability.

name: Pixicharm: Brotillery
summary:
Grab your bandana and load up — it’s time for Brotillery!
Dash through chaotic warzones as a one-bro army, blasting enemies, dodging traps, and collecting coins. It’s a wild, fast-paced run ’n gun with retro vibes and nonstop explosions.

Simple controls, endless action, and full bro-power!

name: Pizza Blitz
summary: Prepare and Cook Joe's classic pizzas while drinking on the job. Deliver them while evading an active warzone. Make your mark as the worlds last chef / delivery driver! Uphold the distinguished Hungry Joe's Pizzas reputation!

name: Pickscover 2
summary: Build, Fight, Craft, and Transform your world while harnessing it's resources to become more powerful. Use a variety of weapons, from swords to magic spells, to fight off the darkness that plagues this world. Fight tons of bosses, both dark and light, to return balance to this land.

name: PixelTorque
summary: A retro-style 2D drag racing game where you build, customize, and race pixel cars across neon-lit streets. Tune your engine, master manual shifts, manage fuel, and rise through the underground to climb global leaderboards.

name: Pionero Capital
summary: You are an immigrant coming to a new city. No money, no contacts, but ambition. Can you get to the top? Work jobs, build your company, and reach to the top of the system. Hire employees, buy expensive cars, furnish you apartments and mansions.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Weapon User
summary: "WEAPON USER" is a 2D versus fighting game where you can unleash authentic combos with simple controls. Enjoy the game in "STORY MODE" for single-player action, or battle it out in "VERSUS MODE" with 1P vs 2P gameplay.

name: Pinball Dream
summary: Pinball Dream is an 80s arcade-style pinball and brick-breaker game. If you want to relax and relieve stress, this game is perfect for you. Get amazing power-ups, break all the blocks, and defeat the boss! Drop everything and play "Pinball Dream".

name: Pirate Chest Chess
summary: A pirate themed chess puzzle game where strategically placing a limited number of pieces is key to breaking open all treasure chests and completing each level.

name: Piso 6
summary: PISO 6 is a first-person psychological horror game with a low-poly aesthetic. After his father's death, Tomás returns to the apartment where he grew up. What seemed like a simple search for a will turns into a nightmare that pulls him back into the past.

name: Pizza Maker + House Painting
summary: Run your own pizzeria & transform homes with your artistic touch

name: Piano at 5 am Encore
summary: The paid, complete version of Piano at 5 a.m.. It includes additional episodes that depict the characters' pasts and narrated voiceover.

name: Pig
summary: In a final bid to cheat death, you challenge The Alleyman to a high-stakes dice game where every roll could be your last.

name: Pixel Sentry
summary: Do you have nothing to do? Don't want to load up a game where it takes a while to get into it? Well here is the perfect solution for you.

name: Picture Perfect
summary: WARNING 18+: You're a photographer who is close with three young women. There's 18 year-old Miracle who is so shy and introverted she won't leave the house without you. 20 year-old Sasha who dreams of starring on Broadway. And 22 year-old Paris who dropped out of college to mooch off you once more.

name: Pixicharm: Blaster Orbit
summary:
Welcome to Blaster Orbit, a high-speed pixel-art arcade shooter where survival and score go hand-in-hand.

Pilot your ship through an endless cosmic battlefield filled with hostile alien fleets, deadly projectiles, and shimmering coins waiting to be grabbed. Dodge, blast, and weave your way through beautifully animated retro space environments while racking up high scores.

Switch between precise shooting and evasive flying as you power up your ship, collect health, and chase orbiting coins for massive score boosts. With smooth controls, vibrant visuals, and non-stop action, Blaster Orbit brings back the thrill of classic shoot-'em-ups—with a modern endless twist.

How long can you survive the orbit?

name: Pipp vs Flupp
summary: Help the fluffy bird escape the dark fountain by pressing a button to dodge obstacles. Move quickly as the water rises and Flupp the fish tries to block your way. See how high you can go and beat your high score in this fun, fast-paced game.

name: Pig vs Box
summary:
It is finally springtime! The first flowers and grasses awakened from hibernation and a cute little
pig too.
Push a button to Jump!
Pig versus Box is a simple but addictive game. By pushing a button on your controller, the tiny pig
jumps. You always must land on a crate without being hit by its movement. If you're good, the
crates will stack up high into the sky.
Try to get as high as you can to beat your own high score and don´t be so angry if you lose ;)

name: PinBuilder
summary: Have you ever wanted to design your own pinball machine? Then build it? And then play it? You can do all of that and more with PinBuilder!

name: Pigeon: A Love Story
summary: Find one pigeon among millions in this needle-in-a-haystack sim that's about nothing and everything.

name: Pitty Meaty
summary: Pitty Meaty is a horrifying creepypasta survival horror game where you must survive in a dangerous territory under the constant threat of a menacing, swollen corpse head.

name: Pipe Down
summary: A pixelated puzzle game about pipes. Enjoy puzzles at various difficulties in four unique modes!

name: Pin-Bang-Shot!
summary: Pin-Bang-Shot! uniquely blends Pachinko pinball, roguelite, and turn-based strategy! Collect an arsenal of bizarre bullets and gear, team up with legendary gang leaders, and meticulously plan your ricochet paths and firing sequences. Clear the board in one glorious shot!

name: Pick Up the Waste
summary: Click on the bottom right paw to drop the garbage that is offered to you in the top banner. When a piece of trash falls to the ground, the game ends.

name: Pigeon Hunter
summary: Pigeon Hunter is classic hidden object game. Find the pigeons and other items in a series of beautiful hand drawn environments. Complete each scene and traverse though a dream like home.

name: Pirates of Justice
summary: Pirates of Justice is a strategic puzzle game where players help pirates destroy corrupt Marine buildings by placing objects to guide a bomb ball to its target. Use your wits to bring down the Marine's stronghold and rise through the pirate ranks.

name: Pirate Simulator: Corsair Skull & Sails
summary: Raise the sails and prepare to explore a world full of dangers and opportunities in Pirate Simulator - Corsair Skull & Sails! Step into the shoes of of Sebastian Roco and embark on a legendary adventure across endless seas. Explore tropical islands, conquer enemy ships, and uncover hidden treasures that could change the fate of the world.

name: Pick Up Your Masks
summary: Throw as many masks as possible into the garbage can before one falls to the ground in the 24 levels.

name: PinYuAn Tales
summary: PinYuAn Tales is a AVG with thematic elements of weirdness and sidekick adventures. After Bai Qiming is laid off from his company, he starts to conduct psychic live broadcasting activities, and during one of the broadcasts, he meets a strange young man, and the story of the two of them unfolds.

name: Pixel Gun Battle
summary:
Pixel Gun Battle - Top Down Shooter by Yaroslav Kovalev.

Brutal like Brutal Doom and beuty like Hotline Miami. Just go ahead and shoot anything that moves.

name: Pixicharm: Chromastronaut
summary:
Welcome to Blaster Orbit, a high-speed pixel-art arcade shooter where survival and score go hand-in-hand.

Pilot your ship through an endless cosmic battlefield filled with hostile alien fleets, deadly projectiles, and shimmering coins waiting to be grabbed. Dodge, blast, and weave your way through beautifully animated retro space environments while racking up high scores.

Switch between precise shooting and evasive flying as you power up your ship, collect health, and chase orbiting coins for massive score boosts. With smooth controls, vibrant visuals, and non-stop action, Blaster Orbit brings back the thrill of classic shoot-'em-ups—with a modern endless twist.

name: Pixicharm: Polar Outta Place
summary:
Slide into the fiery chaos in Polar Outta Place, an endless runner where you're a very lost polar bear dashing through molten mayhem. Dodge slimes, leap over fire pits, and snatch up shiny coins—all while trying not to become a toasted marshmallow.

With simple controls, fast-paced action, and a ridiculous setting, this is one run you won’t forget. Stay cool, move fast, and prove that even the most out-of-place bear can beat the heat!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Stray Witch and the Ghost Train
summary:
A witch who has lost her memory boards a train in an unfamiliar world
and travels to recover her memories.

name: Pioneer
summary: This is a game of [Third-person Action Combat]. The characters possess powerful [Add-ons], unique [Sets], distinctive [Swordsmanship], and strong [MODs]! You will play as a [Pioneer], combine your own [BD], and wipe out the enemy camp completely! Raise your blade! Embrace the glory of the warrior!

name: Pizza Slice
summary: More than just a simulator, Pizza Slice is a true Italian adventure! Take on the role of Tonio, manage your family pizzeria, bake authentic Italian pizzas, fight the competition and grow your business. See if you can win the title of the best pizzeria in the area!

name: Pickle Panic
summary: Steer the jar with your pickles inside. Roll through trap-filled courses! A 1–4 player physics-based co-op chaos: clear obstacles without shattering the jar, return to checkpoints, and try wild tactics with friends. Easy to learn, hard to master.

name: Pizza for Creeps
summary:
"Pizza for Creeps" is a horror-comedy that mixes body horror with romance and working-simulator elements.

You can date almost everyone, you can choose to be nice, rude or creepy (who's the real creep?), and you might also learn a thing or two about pizza making.

name: Pixel Harvester
summary: Pixel Harvester is a relaxing and satisfying game, created by a real combine harvester operator for those moments when you want to hop behind the wheel—even outside of harvest season.

name: Pirate Den
summary: Recruit your crew and sail for glory! In Pirate Den, a transparent idle pirate roguelike, climb the ranks to become the Pirate King while surviving dangerous missions and keeping your crew in line.

name: Pizza Syndicate
summary: Run your pizza empire in this quirky retro tycoon! Manage restaurants, hire staff, craft menus, and outsmart rivals. Dive into the underground syndicate—rob banks, hire hitmen, sabotage competitors, and use any scheme to dominate the city with humor and strategy! WISHLIST NOW!

name: Pixel Shinobi
summary: Become the Green Ninja. Step into the role of a swift, deadly warrior on a mission to cut down monsters, defeat powerful bosses, and uncover the darkness consuming the land.

name: Pictective
summary: Think you're good at spotting images and solving captchas? Join Doma, a curious little cat who's just started training to become a detective! Help Doma take on picture-matching challenges to prove your skills!

name: Pilot ni Narou! 2
summary: Take to the skies with Pilot Academy 2 for the PS2, the sequel to the acclaimed flight simulation game that puts you in the pilot's seat. Experience the thrill of flying with enhanced graphics, realistic physics, and a wide array of aircraft from commercial jets to combat fighters. Navigate through various weather conditions, master challenging takeoffs and landings, and handle emergency scenarios that test your skills and reflexes. With its expansive training modules, diverse missions, and multiplayer modes, Pilot Academy 2 elevates the flight simulation genre to new altitudes. Whether you're a budding aviator or a seasoned pilot, this game offers an immersive flying experience that captures the wonder of soaring through the skies. Strap in, throttle up, and embark on a journey beyond the clouds!

name: Pixicharm: Goo Patrol
summary:
In Goo Patrol, you play as a fearless knight armed with a trusty pike. You can’t move, but you don’t need to. Slimes charge in from both sides across three platforms, and it’s up to you to switch lanes and strike at the right moment.
Attack left, attack right, and survive the waves of gooey invaders. With simple controls, fast-paced levels, and nonstop arcade action, Goo Patrol delivers satisfying, slime-splatting fun in every round.
Hold your ground. Clear the goo. Repeat.

name: Pizza Restaurant Together
summary: Pizza Restaurant Together is a restaurant management game where up to four players cooperatively run a pizzeria. Players work together to prepare pizzas, serve customers, and manage the business by upgrading furniture and decorations to improve their restaurant's reputation. The game allows both solo and multiplayer operation of the establishment.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series Tyraels Ascension: Hell Walker - The Video Game
summary: One band's music becomes a thrilling action-adventure game!

name: Picronix
summary: Take a breather and challenge your brain with these calming logic puzzles

name: Pixel Cross Stitch Color by Number: Cute Pack
summary: A pack of 10 free cute badges to color by number or cross stitch.

name: Pixel Cross Stitch Color by Number: Landscapes Pack 5
summary: 20 landscapes to color by number or cross-stitch

name: Pixel Cross Stitch Color by Number: Cute Pack 2
summary: More cuteness! 20 more little cute badges.

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Back To School Pack
summary: School is starting again and we're offering a free pack of 10 images to celebrate it!

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Tiny Vehicles Pack
summary: 20 cute tiny vehicles to color by number or cross stitch.

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Simple Nature Pack 2
summary: 20 mosaic-like images to color by number or cross stitch

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Simple Patterns Pack 5
summary: Another pack of 20 colorful patterns to color by number or cross stitch.

name: Pine Creek
summary: Something strange is happening in Pine Creek on an autumn night in ’86. Your wife has vanished without a trace. Will you find her? Explore the outskirts, solve randomized puzzles, and evade the gray aliens that stalk and attempt to abduct you in this story-rich sci-fi survival horror.

name: Pizzaïolo-Ninja
summary: Pizzaïolo-Ninja is a 'Die & Retry' platformer with 100 levels, a global speedrun leaderboard, a Streamer Mode to play with your Twitch chat.

name: Pixel Survivors: Defense
summary: Pixel Survivors: Defense is a pixel roguelike defense game where you fight off endless waves of monsters. Collect skills, upgrade your heroes, combine items, and survive as long as you can!

name: Pixel Pegz
summary: A vibrant arcade game inspired by pachinko and coin droppers. Launch balls, hit pegs to fill your energy bar, unlock new characters by collecting cards, and create combos in colorful pixel art levels with custom level editing and endless replayability.

name: Pixicharm: Cavrielle
summary: Run, jump, and react fast! Cavrielle is an endless arcade-style runner where one brave girl dives into a dangerous cave full of coins, traps, and surprises. Easy to play, hard to master — perfect for quick sessions and high-score chases.

name: Pin Strike 2
summary: Knock down more than just bottles! See what else you can do to have more fun. Find out how this game differs from classic bowling.

name: Pih
summary: Pih is a really simple game that you can play on PC or VR. Complete each level by collecting all the food , without being killed by the enemy pigs. The game has 64 levels and 4 bosses. Ragdoll physics, platforms and good music. No story, no loading screens, no cutscenes, just gameplay.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Shiki-Shiki! Haunted Dungeon
summary: Can Shiki, a ghost-hunting apprentice, escape from the high-rise apartment building that has become a realm of the supernatural?

name: Pixicharm: Ribbiverse
summary: You’re a fearless frog in an astronaut suit, stranded on a mysterious space station. Your mission? Hop between platforms, switch between yellow and blue, and collect matching gems while avoiding deadly lightning bullets.

name: Ping Of Death: Odyssey Live
summary:
You’re driving down a remote country road when suddenly your car breaks down. As dusk settles in, you decide to head toward the nearest town to fetch a can of fuel from the local gas station. Instead of following the road, you take a shortcut through the forest—because honestly, what could possibly go wrong? As the light fades and shadows thicken, something catches your eye among the moss on the forest floor. Is that… a phone?

This is where your Odyssey begins.

name: Pieceful Gallery
summary: A classic jigsaw game—each puzzle is a stunning work of art, replicating the operation and difficulty of traditional jigsaws. Come experience Cyber Puzzle now!

name: PiPu Party
summary: PiPu Party is a chaotic party puzzle-platformer game with a shared 3-slot symbol backpack. Pick and put symbols to alter the level. Co-op or outsmart your friends.

name: Picnic Girls
summary: A puzzle game featuring tons of cute Picnic Girls enjoying the autumn season is here!

name: Ping!
summary: PING! brings together classic arcade like games with roguelike progression.

name: Pigment
summary: All of the color has been wiped from Huey's world! Run, jump, dash, swipe, and pogo your way through this hand-drawn platformer to restore color to the land.

name: Pixel Combat: Zombie Shooter
summary: Pixel Combat Shooter is a pixel shooter where you have to fight for survival in a world plagued by zombie apocalypse. Defend your home from waves of zombies, build a time machine and fight unique bosses. Crafting, upgrades and a nostalgic atmosphere.

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Autumn Miniatures Pack
summary: Time to get cozy with the new free autumn DLC!

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Tiny Vehicles Pack 2
summary: A pack of 20 vehicle miniatures.

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Christmas Baubles Pack 3
summary: A pack of 20 Christmas baubles

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Christmas Pack 3
summary: 20 Christmas-themed images to color by number or cross stitch

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Autumn Pack 3
summary: 20 autumn-themed images to color by number or cross-stitch.

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Enchanted Worlds Pack 3
summary: A pack of 20 fantasy-themed patterns.

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Halloween Pack 2
summary: 20 Halloween-themed images to color by number or cross stitch

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Halloween Minis Pack
summary: A free seasonal pack of 10 Halloween-themed images

name: Pixicharm: Vesprax
summary:
Arm yourself with a massive gun and face endless waves of hostile wasps! Each enemy carries a colored marker — fire the matching bullet to bring them down. Quick reflexes and sharp aim are the only way to survive the swarm!

Switch between three platforms, time your shots, and don’t let the wasps close in. The hive won’t stop coming… but neither will you!

name: Pinball Strike Arcade Rampage
summary: Pinball Strike Arcade Rampage is an endless pinball experience where every flip counts. Smash targets, collect shining diamonds, and rack up huge scores in pure arcade chaos. Dynamic backgrounds keep the action fresh while new bumpers appear to test your reflexes with every run. Easy to pick up, hard to master – how many diamonds and how high can you score?

name: Pieces of the Kingdom
summary: What if Chess…was a roguelite? Assemble your party and battle your way across a broken kingdom in a fantastical, tactical take on Chess. Loot epic gear, recruit powerful pieces with unique abilities, and strategize your way to victory.

name: Picross S Capcom Classics Edition
summary: Characters from retro Capcom console games are making an appearance in the Picross S series! Numerous nostalgic scenes from Capcom games, from 8-bit action and shooting games to 16-bit beat-'em-ups and fighting games are available for discovery as pixel art illustrations.

name: Picross S SNK Classics & Neo Geo Edition
summary: Characters from SNK's arcade and NEOGEO library are coming to the Picross S series! 50 titles are included - from arcade heroes of the past to iconic NEOGEO characters whose "100 Mega Shock" impact can still be felt in the modern day.

name: Picross Date!
summary: Reveal hidden pixel pictures by solving logic puzzles.

name: Pixicharm: Knightritious
summary: Charge into the depths as a fearless knight on a fruity quest! In Knightritious, every run is an endless dash through perilous dungeons packed with bats, slimes, and devious traps. Collect as much fruit as you can while staying one step ahead of danger.

name: Pixicharm: Hallowkinz
summary: Hallowkinz is a lighthearted Halloween-themed runner for all ages.

name: Pixicharm: Celestibun
summary: Celestibun takes you on a whimsical run through an enchanted forest, where a brave little bunny girl dashes beneath glowing canopies to gather shimmering stars. Quick reflexes are key as buzzing wasps swoop and slow snails block the path, but every leap and hop carries you farther into the magical woods. Simple to play and endlessly replayable, it’s a charming adventure for anyone who loves fast, lighthearted fun.

name: Pigmen's Challenge
summary: Two Piggies in one wild restaurant. Chaos, pressure, panic — served fresh!

name: PinPow
summary: PinPow is a turn-based roguelike pinball RPG where you play as a hero sucked into an other-worldy pinball machine - battling your way through chaotic dungeons, and enemies to defeat the evil Pinball Wizard. Strategize your shots, upgrade your hero, and bounce your way to victory!

name: Pizza Agent
summary: Pizza Agent is a co-op simulator combining pizza shop management with undercover alien investigation. Craft delicious pizzas, manage your stock, keep customers happy. And secretly scan customers to catch shape-shifting aliens. Cook, serve and scan !

name: Pixplorer
summary: Pixplorer is a top-down sandbox action-RPG. Explore biomes, conquer dungeons, craft, build, fight, mine, farm, catch fish and insects! Enjoy the game's atmosphere and complete freedom to shape your own adventure.

name: Pingbert's Snow Ride
summary: Slide, soar, and deliver! Join Pingbert, the upbeat penguin mail carrier, in Pingbert’s Snow Ride—a fast-paced, platformer where you'll slide down snowy slopes to deliver mail at high speed!

name: Pizzapocalypse 2
summary: A 3D platformer with a pizza moveset that's accessible & engaging to all skill levels! Explore different countries, and put a stop to the evil corporation ruining Pizza!

name: Pitchforks and Daggers
summary: How far will you go to keep your crown? A branching court politics drama, where every choice matters. Navigate treacherous lords, scheming family members, and angry peasants- all while trying to secure your kingdom’s future.

name: Pin Strike 3
summary: You know all the rules and possible combinations, so just enjoy new levels and new obstacles! This bowling is still not the classical one.

name: Pixicharm: Orunex
summary: Orunex revives the spirit of early handheld shooters with a fresh arcade feel. Guide your starship through dangerous space sectors, dodging relentless enemy fire and striking back with precision. Simple to pick up yet challenging to master, Orunex delivers fast-paced action and nostalgic green-tinted pixel art for fans of retro space adventures.

name: PinKeep
summary: PinKeep is a pinball deckbuilding roguelite – use the ball and flippers to collect resources and defeat your enemies! Place buildings from your deck on the playfield to defend your Keep. Create powerful synergies to eradicate the hordes of attacking Knights!

name: Piczle World of Puzzles: Old Masters
summary: 200 challenging Piczle Cross nonograms over 12 collage puzzles based on the works of the Old Masters.

name: Piczle World of Puzzles: Starter Pack
summary: A grab bag of puzzle packs! Tonnes puzzles and extras to get you started!

name: Piczle World of Puzzles: Into the Puzzleverse
summary: More than 200 Piczle Lines puzzles that formed the story mode in "Into the Puzzleverse" (only released on console)

name: Piczle World of Puzzles: Piczle Cross Adventure Pack
summary: All the puzzles from the critically acclaimed Piczle Cross Adventure to solve in Piczle World of Puzzles!

name: Pirate Sagas: The Golden Age
summary: Yarrrgh! Embark on adventure in three narrative-driven campaigns set in the Golden Age of Piracy. Engage and battle enemy ships in a mix of turn-based and real time combat. Battle enemy ships, defeat crews in combat, raid ports, loot, pillage and lead your ships to victory!

name: P.I.S.
summary: This is a steampunk puzzle game where you click or drag with your left mouse button to solve puzzles and free the protagonist from difficult situations. There's no text in the game.

name: Pip's Tale
summary: Hop and jump through an enchanted forest.

name: Pingorile
summary: An indie retro-style 2D platformer where you play as a penguin collecting yellow budgies to fulfill his dream of flying, featuring both traditional jump'n'run as well as JRPG inspired elements.

name: Pixelance
summary: Pixelance is a turn based roguelike adventure RPG with permadeath and multiple quests within dungeons and a vast overworld.

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Women At Work Pack
summary: A pack of free images dedicated to the Dames4Games showcase.

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Simple Nature Pack
summary: 10 free nature-themed images in stained glass style.

name: Pico's School: Love Conquers All
summary:
This is the Love Conquers All edition of Pico's School; a re-telling of the original story in a split reality where one small decision changes the course of events.

This game replaced the original Pico's School on April 1st, 2021 but now they both exist together as alternate timelines.

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number - Cats Pack
summary: 20 cat-themed images to color by number of cross stitch

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws: Forests
summary: Pixel Puzzles Traditional, setting the standards for online jigsaw puzzling.

name: Pichenette
summary: Pichenette is a fast-paced flick-fighting game! In intense matches, you have to attack, dodge, or block your opponent’s flicks. You can play on your own or locally against a friend.

name: Pixel Gun Plus
summary: Pixel Gun Plus is a Pixel Gun 3D fangame that focuses on enhancing the core gameplay while also keeping the style and charm of the old versions that people love with content spanning from across multiple versions. It also includes general improvements such as quality of life changes and graphics upgrades like post processing and better lighting.

name: Piczle Lines Super Puzzle Turbo Bundle
summary: Piczle Lines 1 + 2 and all the DLC puzzle packs in one incredible bundle!

name: Pilgrim: Unto Shadow
summary: Pilgrim: Unto Shadow is a 0D RPG that mixes action and strategic elements. Traverse the final day of the Holy City, now shrouded in unending night. Journey through a deadly world using 0D combo-based action combat. What path will bring you to your end, Pilgrim?

name: Pin Test Party Psychology
summary: Laugh, guess, and reveal your true colors in this psychology party game!

name: Pintorino
summary: Ready to challenge your brain? Pintorino is a grid-based puzzle game where you guide a player across the board, aiming to pass through all the required blocks - each with its own unique purpose.

name: Pilot 6174: Orbital Survival
summary: Navigate star systems using real orbital mechanics. Pilot a cockpit with controls inspired by the Apollo command module. Manage heat, energy, and trajectory.

name: Pic Happens!
summary: Players upload photos and/or memes to match the game captions/prompt and vote for the funniest ones!

name: Pigmarines
summary: Pigmarines is a co-op social deduction game where pig sailor buddies choose between sabotage, cooperation, or betrayal while trying not to sink the ship

name: Pinball M: Bethesda Pinball
summary: Bethesda Pinball combines three stunning tables based on the most iconic Bethesda franchises: Fallout Pinball, DOOM Pinball, The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Pinball.

name: Picker 3D
summary:
- Drag Picker to right or left
- Collect everything and open gates
- Reach high scores
- Unlock powerups, skins and themes

name: Pico-Ball
summary: Play solo or together in a mashup of tennis, volleyball, squash, and wallball where the only rule is: two bounces on one side is a point for the other.
